column1: Bunny Rabbit. I put in an ad for a bunny rabbit for a job as a plumber. I had the idea of doing some landscaping work. The job was really hard. But I got the job. My rabbit was a happy rabbit.

Good Terms. I bought a new router last week for $400. I was looking forward to trying it out. I got the shipping company to deliver me the package. They took several minutes to arrive, and arrived within minutes. After I had finished loading the router and plugged it in, it took forever to charge.

What And Itch. Jim has always hated the smell of the cobwebs. One day he went to the store and bought some old cobwebs. It's what Jim hates most. Jim goes home and begins to smell the cobwebs. He decides that it is better to go outside.
Empty Club. Amy was having a birthday party. She decided to throw a birthday party. She invited all her friends. On her birthday she got a cake. Amy was very happy.

Wrestling. Mike has always been a great wrestler. He has been a champion since he was in high school. Mike trained at a local gym every day after school. Mike was very successful on his first try at the local level. Now Mike is the best and the new champion.

Magical Fruit. There was a magic fruit tree growing out of the ground. It was a small tree. It had a large sprig of green leaves. People liked this tree so much they would come and visit. It was the only real magic fruit tree in the world.

Schedule. A man asked for his family's yearly financial aid check. His wife did not believe him and didn't take it. Then she told him the check was for him. The man called the number and gave it to the woman. The woman paid the man's check for what he asked for.
Candy in the dirt. Gina put the candy in the dirt. The dirt was not in the bag. She dug in it for awhile. After awhile, it dried up. She put in her bag.

Robins cruel exit. Robins hated when his brother took him to the ER. His doctor told him that he had stage 4 diabetes. Robins was upset and told him he'd be in for three months. When the doctor saw the picture Robins had of his baby brother he was devastated. He was then diagnosed with stage 4 diabetes.

Good Fences. There were bad fencing walls in my school's playground. I decided to learn how to properly fence my kids. I got to the lesson early to teach my kids. It took a while to learn how to do it, but it was all worth it. When I got to class, they gave me a standing ovation!

Carnival Games. It was the final of the carnival rides. Mary and her friends were excited. They were going to ride all the rides together! As Mary was in line, she saw many horses on the tracks. Mary decided to ride all the rides at once instead of waiting.

New Neighbors. Cara was a stray cat who liked to be alone. Her owner took her everywhere she went. One day she saw another cat who had no owner. Cara decided to look online for new people to adopt. Cara found a nice apartment in a town near her home and moved on.
The Face Wash. Tim had been in the mirror for hours now. But one thing kept him up all night long. He was sweating. He needed to take a shower. Then he got a new pair of sweatpants.

Bill started a company. Bill is an accountant. Bill's job is to run a business. Bill's wife hires him to run a retail store. Bill gets to run the store for a large amount of money. Bill loves his job and decides to quit his job.
Pool. Tim was invited to the pool by a friend. He went with his friend. He filled up the whole pool. Tim's friend didn't like that. So Tim decided to do it anyway.
Megan sees a ghost. Megan was at a park. The kids were playing on the swings. A squirrel jumped out. Megan ran over and grabbed the squirrel. She ran back to the park.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine has an ear infection. She is afraid that her ear piercing will hurt her. The piercing does not seem to hurt her. Francine's doctor tells her that she is not allergic to needles. Francine is thankful and continues to buy earrings.

Penn. The man decided to go fishing with his girlfriend. He saw a big lake and thought about what to do. He decided to go ahead and catch a big catch. The next day he went to the lake and caught a rainbow trout. His girlfriend was disappointed and felt very bad.

Flower Shop. Cody was in his kitchen. He saw a flower shop he had never seen before. He picked out a beautiful blue flower and brought it home. Cody opened the flower shop. He was amazed at the beautiful flower.

Shoes. Bill was in the kitchen trying to make dinner. He had left the stove on for too long and it burned. Bill called a repairman and the repairman came. Bill called his wife to come and get the stove fixed. They bought him a new pair of shoes.

Spare Change. Tom was in his room late one night. He noticed that it was raining heavily. He put the water in a cup and drank some water. When he was finished he went to pick up the phone. He got the phone and took the water back.

Balloon Fight. My friend took me to see a balloon fight. It was a fun trick for us. I made a balloon with my name. Everyone was on the same side. I won a lot of money and I decided to practice it every day.
Stripley. A new baby was born. His mother wanted a stripley baby. She bought him a stripley blanket for him. He grew up without a stripley blanket. Soon he was a big stripley!

Milkshake. Benny had just returned from a party. He was invited to the party by an older woman. However, she was not happy with him. When Benny tried to introduce himself he was mean. Then he introduced himself as an older man.

Vintage toy. Tim was very picky about toys. His son was a bit too picky about one. His son's favorite toy was a cartoon. Tim put the cartoon in the bathroom. Tim's son loved the cartoon and loved the cartoon again.

New Underwear. Dawn decided to get her daughters in shape. She bought them some high-quality new underwear. She wore them out and walked to school. She forgot to close the door behind her. She went back home and put them back on.

The Psychology of Grades. Earl was a hard working man. He had a very big family and worked for a large company. He was working on his first job and did his best. He was never given an award for his hard work. Earl had to drop out of his job to become a psychologist.

New Dog. Jade bought a new dog, named Jade. Jade liked Jade and would pet him if she saw him. Jade would chase a squirrel as he went outside. One day, Jade heard the squirrel barking. Jade immediately ran to his friend to get Jade.

Music Band. Sam was a musician. His first band was called The Green Grass Band. Sam practiced playing music for a couple of weeks. He practiced for months. Sam was able to get his first band a Grammy.
The Concert. John wanted to see a band. He had never been to a concert before. He went to see a few bands there. He saw some new artists. John really enjoyed this experience.

Dinosaurs. I started reading dinosaur books one summer. My friend invited me to his library. I had the book with me when I went. I sat there looking at the dinosaur books. I then asked him to tell me I could borrow his book.
Pickles. A man took his wife to pickles. He told her he loved pickles. He said he had to keep her out of trouble. His wife said he wouldn't. She told him to just eat pickles in peace.

Raking Leaves. Tod went outside to see if he could rake leaves. He decided to rake the leaves. After picking the leaves, he set them in the pot. He had left the pot on the stove all morning. The leaves were very ripe.

Dangerous Campfire. I was at a campfire with my friend. I put my hand on the handle and I felt something. It was a small black stick. It seemed like a big knife. I immediately went back to play and put it away.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca needed a change in her appearance. She went to the salon for a change in style. Bianca did a thorough and thorough wash and dyed her hair. Her friends complimented her hair. Bianca was happy to see her hair brighten up.

Dancing. I was excited to see my first Dance competition in the park. I looked in the stands and saw that my friends and I had the honor of being the judges. I was hoping that the show would make an impression on other people. I was so excited that I got to participate. In the end I won by a large margin and won a silver ribbon.
Buying a New TV. Sam loved watching movies with his friends. He decided to watch a horror movie. Sam went to the movies in the theater. There, he saw several horror movies. Sam loved his new TV.
Deaf Kid. I just started college. My teacher made me listen to music. I learned a lot. I learned many songs. I learned a lot.

Race. When Mike was in tenth grade he was in his first race. He was not very good at it, and his mom taught him not to race. Mike was sad because it took so long for him to learn. In fifth grade he was able to beat his dad. Now he has a great car and will go on to become a world champion.

The Puppet Show. John was the puppeteer for a famous puppet show. The audience were very excited. John was able to perform a very large role. However, his work was not what it should have been. The puppet's performance was a huge failure.

New Hobby. Dan and Dan were in the same band and were having fun playing. When Dan got home, Dan was a bit upset about not getting some music. Dan tried to explain to Dan that it was a birthday and Dan forgot. Dan went to the store and bought some toys. Dan had fun playing with the new toys he bought.

No Jumping. The family tried to jump high into the ocean. They had never done it before. They tried jumping and swam the entire way. Unfortunately it was too hard. The family had to stop in order to get better.

Comparison. Kelly and Beth were on a road trip. They had just been driving around and needed to make a new stop. They had gone all over the place. One of Beth's cars didn't feel like it had driven well. Kelly and Beth decided to call the dealership to help them out.

seafood. Benny loved seafood. His mom always taught him the recipe. One day his mom saw a lobster on the kitchen floor. She realized she had forgotten the recipe. Now Benny has to do some cleanup of his backyard.

Burritos. My husband loves to eat burritos. Today he was eating a burrito. He felt a small pain. He decided to eat the burrito on his way home. It was okay, he only felt pain when he took the burrito.

Spinach. One day at the store I saw a lot of spinach at my house. I decided to give it a shot and buy spinach. I brought home spinach from the store. I boiled the spinach and the spinach dried out. I had spinach for dinner.

Exercising. Tom had a crush on a girl he liked. They were going on a date together. Tom decided to get involved with her and ask to do something with her. When she got to school she was too embarrassed to do anything. Her crush knew she was getting her in trouble for it.

New Year's Resolution. Janice woke up early the next morning to get ready for the New Year. She set a goal of going to the mall to buy presents. She went to Target and bought five boxes of chocolate milk. On the way home she received a phone call saying she was missing some presents. Janice was able to get the presents at the store.

John Buys An Umbrella. John was running late for work one day. He decided to buy an umbrella. John put a zip on the umbrella and ran. He found that his feet had a tiny leak. John took the umbrella back to the store for help.

Embarrassing Mistake. Susie was at a restaurant. She tried to take a bite at a food item on the menu. But a line started to form near her. Her mother came over and apologized. Susie had to take a picture of her face.
Greenery. I went to the store for some wood. I saw a lot of pine needles, I bought several trees. I picked up some and put them in my house. We spent the night relaxing and enjoying our new trees.

The Weight Loss Expert. Jim hated going to the gym. Jim hated the constant pressure to lose weight. He had to start eating healthy. Jim started eating fruits and vegetables instead of junk food. Jim lost weight and his health never changed.

Library Book. Meredith was going to the library. She needed a book for her exam. When she got to the entrance, she checked all of the books. She found a new science fiction book for class. Meredith was thrilled to find the book in the middle of the exam.

Low Blood Sugar. I had been trying to get a low sugar diet for months. I had never been able to find a diet that would help with my blood sugar. In the beginning I started trying different things. After two days I realized I had low blood sugar. Now I have a low blood sugar diet.

Broken Nose. Susy went to the pet store and tried to get a pet. She went in the aisle to buy a puppy. The man's face had a terrible nose. Susy begged the man to get his nose fixed. The man got it fixed and Susy was happy!

Eternal love. Sandra was in love with a man. She decided to surprise him. She was at dinner with her friend and they were getting married. Sandra thought he would be her husband. He came and they are happily married.
Lost Phone. Tom lost his phone. It was in the drawer. He took it to a store. He was happy. He bought another one.
Eviction. Jim's girlfriend needed help sleeping. Her car was being towed. She called her son. He said the car was totaled. Jim drove over and fixed the car.

Thunder. I was driving my car around town and noticed thunder. I sped down the road trying to be safe. Thunder clouds became more and more severe. Eventually the rain stopped. I decided to drive to work and get ready for the rain.

Lost poncho. I saw a flyer for a poncho in Chinatown. It had only two strings and I decided to get one. I went to the shop and bought the two strings. I opened the package and my nose had a weird pop. I had to go home and call for a repairman.
Swim. I was swimming in my pool with my friends. All of a sudden I got hit by a rock. I started bleeding. I had to be taken to the emergency room. I ended up in a lot of pain.

Sticky. Mary went to the store to get ice cream. She found that she was running out of milk. Mary decided to make a cup of milk. Her husband took her to the grocery store. Mary bought a cup of milk and enjoyed it.
Mother. My mother was at the hospital. She was very sick. I asked her if she had been in a bad accident. She said she had been at the doctor. She thanked me for the help.
ID. Alicia and John were driving down the road. They suddenly saw a car pull into a street that was closed. John tried to find an ID. Alicia saw a photo of her son with his ID. They pulled over.

The Inheritance. Rosa was about to move into a new apartment. Rosa wanted to buy a house. Rosa's brother gave her the best deal on a nice house. Rosa got a lot of money for her new house. She gave the money to her brother and his wife.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike was out with friends one night. His friend told him to wait until it was over. Mike waited and drank some wine. He got angry and started drinking black. Mike realized that drinking white wine made him very sick.
Broken Bike. Dan was riding his bike around the block. But his chain caught on a bump in the sidewalk. Dan had to pull over. He realized he had broken his bike! Dan was very upset!
The Blind Date. Sally had a blind date for a friend. The date went well. It went well. Sally asked a man on the phone to dance the night away. They went to the movies for the night.

The Stormy Day. Jim's friends told him he was going to fall into a big storm one afternoon. Jim did not listen. When he awoke it was raining hard. Jim went to the store to buy a shovel and snow boots. Jim fell asleep before the storm was over.

White Cast Christmas. I was celebrating the holidays in 2011 with friends. The last Christmas I ever had was in 2011. Everyone asked me if I remembered my white cast Christmas card. I confessed to the friends and I was thrilled. I was so happy to have made my best Christmas ever.
The volleyball accident. Cathy went to the tennis court. It was snowing hard. Cathy was nervous. She kept trying to play. Eventually, her arm got sore and she had to sit in the bench.
Turtle Fears. There was a turtle on the beach. He was very frightened. I took him to the shore. He had to be put in an animalarium. He was very grateful.

Shoelaces. Tim wanted to change his shoelaces. He searched online for a good pair. Unfortunately Tim's shoelaces weren't perfect. He didn't have any ideas. Tim bought an online shoelace replacement service.

Easy mac disappointment. Susie's favorite restaurant was open daily. But that was only half of it. Susie thought they would try to do something new. But it just kept getting worse. Eventually they decided to just close it.

Puppy Litter. My wife is excited to have a puppy litter. I invited my dog to her yard with her. We set up some litter boxes. She brought her puppy home from the yard. She brought her puppy outside and my wife had to clean it.

Old Friend. Tommy was a very lonely young boy. One day he went out with his dad and his friends. Tommy's dad surprised him by picking him up at his mom's house. Tommy's dad had no idea what he had seen at his house. Tommy's dad had just gotten a car and was very sad.

The Easter Parade. My neighbor went to the carnival. He had a special tradition for Easter. He would bring baskets to collect Easter eggs. On Easter morning, the kids loved playing in the carnival. It was a very special day for everyone.

No Littering. Amy went to the trash and picked up some trash. She left her phone on the counter but went to the kitchen. The trashman picked up the phone from her. Amy was disappointed with her purchase of the phone. Amy looked online for the best price on the phone.
Ham Sandwich. Sam had a small ham sandwich on the counter. But he didn't want to eat it. So he went to the store. He bought all the ingredients. After a while, he ate the sandwich.

Confession. Jenna was on the phone with her sister in college. She was going to tell her best friend about a secret. Jenna told her best friend to take her out to dinner. The girl took her to dinner. Her best friend confessed.

Janet. Janet was scared of being out alone. She decided she would go out to play with people. She met a friend who went out to play with her. Janet felt very lonely. She learned not to be afraid and to try out.

The fishing trip. The kids were taking a fishing trip. They set up their line in a small fishing boat. They caught the fish and put it in a bucket. They took a few pictures with the fish. They put them up on their Facebook page.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex wants to eat healthier. He decides he needs to drink more water. He eats a healthy meal everyday. Rex is happy that he has reduced his water intake. Rex is glad he drinks more water.

Scared Teddy. Teddy didn't have a clue how to tell the truth. He was afraid it was impossible for him to answer. His mother made him work hard to learn. The first day of school he finally made it to the end. Teddy was relieved to see his teacher in person.

Power Outage. Kelli was working at her apartment. She noticed a bad energy bill on her phone. She called the bank and explained what happened. They were able to help her pay for the bill. Kelli was glad she didn't have to worry anymore.
A new hobby. Randi decided to start a hobby. She had a great idea. She made a video about her creation. Many people loved it. They made money and kept making videos.

Photo. Kate wanted to post a photo. But she couldn't afford the expensive equipment. So she called a local newspaper. But they refused to publish it. Kate felt cheated and decided to just post it anyway.

The Deadline. I went to the bank and called my credit card company. I went into the deposit account. When I called my bank, they told me that I was supposed to deposit money. I sat there for a minute before I realized I was being shorted. I did not make any payments at all!

Wine tasting. Tim was out at the bar one night. He was having a terrible night drinking wine. Suddenly Tim stopped for a glass and fell asleep. When he awoke his wife was crying because of it. He tried a few different glasses but it was too strong for her.
The bed. The baby sat on the table with his bed sheets. He snuggled closer to the baby. He kept on breathing. The baby's eyes opened wide. The baby had a huge, big tummy.

The saxophone. Kelly was learning to play the saxophone. She put a little tape in the front of the saxophone. She then began to play the melody on the saxophone. Kelly heard the melody come on the radio. Kelly was so happy with her learning!
The Farm. Dan was looking for a new farm. He looked everywhere. Dan called and emailed. When he got home, he looked everywhere. He finally found the farm and was so happy he called.

Outside the Window. Sue's dog would come outside every day. Sue knew that dogs had gotten into the house. One day, the dog ran into the window. Sue called 911 to tell her dog to come outside. It took days to find the dog's owner.

Making it gluten free. My mom told me she wanted to try gluten free products. I said I would make a gluten free version of my homemade cereal. We went to the store and bought all the ingredients. We were able to make our own cereal by mixing together the ingredients. I hope my gluten free cereal makes us all feel better about eating gluten free foods.

The plane trip. My wife's daughter had been missing in Chicago. When she was last seen, she was in NYC. She had gone to NYC with her friend. My wife was sad but we were too busy with work. My daughter's daughter returned home two days later.

Jen's Game. Jen was playing with friends at the park. When they were about to get back, Jen's friend started following her. Jen kept following him, trying to beat him back. She eventually ended up losing her first game of the season. She was very upset, but felt great about the results.

More Alone. Sara decided she wasn't going to get along with her new neighbors. She decided to go to the store and buy new clothes. On the way there, Sara stopped to ask the clerk for a discount. The clerk smiled, and Sara didn't mind. Sara was thankful that her neighbors weren't as confused.

Theme park excitement. Kim and her family wanted to go to a theme park. The kids wanted to go to Disneyland. Kim's parents said no because it was too dangerous. They decided to go to Disneyland. They rode rides to the theme park and had a great time.

Futsal. Jill always wanted to get a raise at work. She had a family who did not have an unemployment benefit. So she asked the worker if she would work extra shifts. She received a great response. She did her work and got an extra raise.

Bluebirds. Natalie woke up one morning with a blue bird in her cage. She grabbed it to release it to her cage and lay down. The bird was so small that Natalie couldn't move it. Then the nurse put a bird into Natalie's cage and let her free. Natalie was so happy to find out her bird had finally been released!

The Trip. Kia was excited to take her sister to Disneyland. At the park, her sister went to a big race. While they were in the race, Kia won! She was so excited she fell asleep while the car began to start. Kia was so happy when she saw the sign.

Carnival Ride. When I was a kid we went to the carnival. We saw a few great rides. We really enjoyed riding on the slides. I'm thinking of going back and watching a movie about dinosaurs. I hope we do it again next year.

Lost Throughout the Process. Jim's work was being called off due to his phone connection. He had not called since he was too busy to call. A company representative asked Jim to go to the store. Jim had no time to go to the store but had to wait to call. Jim was disappointed to find out he had to wait a few hours.

The Murderer. Tara was a very sad girl who loved nothing more than to cry. She was walking home from school one day and saw someone laying on the ground. She jumped over and grabbed a broom to clean up the mess. She went to the neighbor's house and called her mother. Tara was very happy to help out in the process.

Home Run. John was running in the middle of the outfield. He saw that he had a homerun. John passed the ball to his teammate. His teammate threw a ball into the plate. John hit the ball and it flew in.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg was very excited to visit the zoo. He was very excited to see the lions. Greg had never seen a lion before. When he saw the lions, he was amazed. He had never been to the zoo before.

New Shoes. Alfred has been wearing his new pair of shoes. He feels that they're way too comfortable. He needs a pair of heels to wear them out. He decides to start wearing them out at night. He feels much more comfortable wearing them out.
Cole. Cole's parents divorced the same woman. Cole moved to a new town. Cole had a lot of problems with his parents. Cole struggled to change his lifestyle. Cole now has two young kids.

Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley was trying to put a small baby in a coffin. Her husband had the coffin caved in but she couldn't get it out. The coffin was very large and she decided to pull it out to get a picture. Her husband was not paying attention, so he pulled the coffin out in his direction. Shirley was mortified, but the doll was no where to be found!

Patty's Sleepover. Patty wanted to have a sleepover with her friends. But her friends were not allowed to. Patty decided to do it anyway. Her friends came over to stay with Patty and watch some movies. It was such a fun time!

New Shears. Kara went to the store for some new jeans. The store was a little out of her budget so she went back to work. Her boss handed out coupons so she could get them. Kara purchased the jeans and was very happy. She was glad to see her boss giving her the coupons.

As I Sit Here. Kate was driving through town. She saw a car that she thought was very funny. As she sat on the side of the road she began to laugh. She heard a little voice nearby. As she was walking towards the car she realized she had to stop.

Going to School. My friend and I decided to go to a summer school. We were all so nervous, but excited for the first day. I really liked the idea of going. We all got on their bikes and rode all around the house. It was fun.
Hit. Tom was taking a test. He accidentally hit a parked car. The car did not move. Tom tried to run but ended up losing his grip. Tom was in a big wreck.

The dog. Beth and Sally went for a walk. Sally picked the perfect puppy. Beth decided to adopt Sally. After two weeks, Beth and Sally started to bond. Now that Sally's home, Beth and Sally are happy and happy.
Fears. Beth was having a great time. She was drinking lemonade with friends. A friend had taken Beth out to eat. She called Beth's mother. She wasn't able to go home because Beth was alone.

Driver. Molly was excited to be a driver. She was trying to get her license but was too embarrassed. When her driver's license was ready to open, she drove. The driver said he liked Molly as much as he did. Molly was delighted and so excited to be driving again.

Man's best friend. Tim met a nice man for lunch at a cafe. He told Tim he would hang out with him at the cafe. Tim was very attracted to the handsome young man. Tim was upset about the date but understood. Tim had a nice afternoon at the cafe.

The First Birthday. I was starting my third birthday. It was a big one. I am very sad to have to tell my friends and family. I decided to surprise my parents and get myself a gift. I am excited for my next birthday.

The fair. The children loved the outdoors. They went every year to the fair. They played the merry game on swings, slides and floats. The adults got a lot of snacks. They did it so much fun that they all decided to go again.

The Bison. My favorite thing to do at the zoo is go to the enclosure. I love my Bison as an animal. I would sit and cry because he's so big. I love to feed him when he goes around and I'm sad. I love to listen to the bison sing.
A Good Samaritan. Tim was walking to work one morning. While walking, he found a homeless man. The man had a flat tire. Tim called the police for help. The man got into the back of his car.

Pictures. I decided to take a picture of my grandpa. I picked out a beautiful bouquet of roses. I was planning on taking a picture at work one day. While working, I realized my picture was not good enough. I decided to get another one.
Appendicitis. Lenny was playing with his friends. They were taking a bath. He had a bad cramp. He went to the doctor and got a cast. The cast made him feel good!
Money. Tom worked hard for his allowance. He had saved up his allowance all month long. He made sure he was ready for payday. On his last day he received a check. It's his allowance!

Genre Disagreement. John was going to the movies with his friends. They were all in the theater and he asked the usher if he could take his seat. The usher told John that the movie was a disaster. John was upset because he was in the middle of a movie. He walked into the movie the next day in disgust.

For a Five. Kia's family was going on vacation. She and her sister needed to buy a house for the weekend. Kia and her sister went to the store but found a very expensive house. They went to an affordable store. Kia found a very nice, very cheap house with a large yard.

Sardines. Abe was going to get his daughter a bouquet of grapes for the school prom. He called the store and waited for the store to arrive. He realized that he could not find any flowers he needed. As he waited in line, Abe came back to find a large bouquet. He put the bouquet on the table with his daughter and was able to go home.

Too Curious. Amy was walking home when she saw a man with a black hat and glasses. He told her he'd saved his money and she needed to make money. She decided to take him out and make money. Amy's hard work paid off. The money was enough for her and she was so happy.

The School Fight. Tim was having a snowball fight with his cousin. He accidentally spilled water all over the playground. The principal decided to close the school. Tim was upset that his cousin would be bullied. Tim left the school after being accused of being a bully.
Video Game. John was a huge gamer. He spent hours playing games all the time. One day he got really sick. So he decided to quit. John quit playing video games.
Milkshakes. Tom bought chocolate milkshakes. He was really hungry. Tom bought a milkshake. He enjoyed his chocolate milkshake. Tom went back to eat.

Bad Haircut. Lilly was excited for her hair. Her mom was having a hard time finding a new style. But she decided to go to a salon to pick a favorite hair color. She went to the salon and selected her favorite color. When she was done, her hair was all over her face.

The New Airplane. I was flying a new air plane to school one morning. I had to climb a ladder up the stairs. All of a sudden the plane crashed. I had to get up for my lesson. Thankfully a firefighter saved me from the plane wreck.
Bruised Knees. Sammy always tried to do tricks on his friends. It always got him in trouble. One day, he tried to bend his knee. It was terrible. Luckily, a friend eventually helped him up.

Heavy Belly. Kate was walking home from work one morning. She was having a hard time maintaining her running pace. The wind blew very hard so Kate was swept up in it. Kate began to sweat heavily in the air. Kate decided to rest a bit so she wouldn't have to work.

The STained Glass. Gina decided that she wanted to clean out her house. She looked in a closet with her dirty dishes. She found the stained glass. She cleaned the glass. She realized that it had broken when she touched the glass.

The pregnancy prank. Gina had a baby boy. When she was pregnant, her baby boy had been very cute. But he fell pregnant and had to have a baby girl. After she started to cry, she didn't tell her parents. Finally, they let her know.

Special Treat. Jill took her dog to the vet. They had a very special treat for her. Jill thought the dog looked great. She thought she might be getting a puppy. So she decided to get her puppy with her.

A Ship Without Direction. Tom was sitting in a cabin. He looked up at the stars with a telescope. It was very far away, but he still took a look. A ship was about to go through the telescope. It was approaching them and Tom was very relieved.
Bad decision. Kate went on her first day of Kindergarten. She was excited. When the bell rang the school was closed. She was so excited to go home. She realized she had to wait for school to restart.

Unicorn. Timothy had always liked the outdoors. It was always perfect. Timothy decided to plant a tree in his yard. Timothy took out a bag and planted a tree in his yard. Timothy had a tree in his yard that was perfect.

Egypt. Roxy was driving along a nice desert road. All of a sudden, she dropped her phone. Suddenly, the phone shattered on the ground. A man came out to help her. She picked it up and gave him a quick tip.

Office job. Bob needed to work for a large company. He asked his boss if he could take his job. His boss gave him an interview. He thought about his options. He called Bob's boss and told him he could go.

Wrong Number. Tom's car was parked in a lot on the side of the street. He had to park behind a large building. He had to use a handicapped parking spot. He didn't like how the lot was set up and made a mistake. Tom was left with a ticket.

Date Ditch. Sue was ready to go on a date. She knew that she was going to be late. She drove all around town. But she couldn't find any spots she liked to go. She decided to just wait till she could catch up.
Soldier. Dan was working for the army. He was promoted. He got a promotion and did very well. But he was worried about his health. Dan was sick of working for a recruiter.

Applying for a Job. James had just moved to Alabama and applied for his first job. He was so excited to hear about all the jobs he had. He spent several hours researching and reviewing all the available applications. Finally, he was interviewed at the top hiring agency. James was so happy he had been given a job!

The New Fish. Joe was fishing on a river with his friends. While they were fishing a big storm rolled in. The river was closed due to a heavy rainfall. Joe's friends thought he was going to die. Joe decided to just fish instead.

Service Dog. Jill has a very small dog named Tim. They were together for 3 Year's. Jill went to visit Tim at the vet. Tim was having a lot of problems. Jill took Tim home and treated him the same as the dog she loves.
Pie. Kim wanted to bake her own pie. She didn't have enough money. Kim spent all of her spare time to make her own pie. Kim had an idea. She made the pie and it tasted delicious!

Bow and Arrow. Tim was a bow and arrow hunter. Tim went out on a weekend and went hunting. He saw a bear running across the woods. Tim shot at the bear but it kept trying to climb the tree. Tim stopped and watched the bear, now in pain, fall away.

Delicious ice cream. Karen loved ice cream. Her favorite was a cone that came in an envelope. Karen made it with the envelope in the freezer. When the envelope was opened, the ice cream was there. Karen enjoyed the ice cream and ordered a dessert at the next door.

Noise. Kylie was sleeping in her room. Suddenly she heard a scratching noise in the room. She looked outside. There were lots of bugs in her room. She called her family and they rushed her to the hospital.

Worthless. Tom's girlfriend, Lisa, is married to a man who is a criminal. Tom has been in a long term relationship with Lisa. In a panic he breaks her heart and breaks her heart. Tom feels terrible and is unable to care for her. He leaves her a message on the internet and she apologizes for letting him down.

The melted balloon. A boy was having a hard time falling. He took some balloons out of his pocket. His dad helped him pick one. He put it on and made him sit on it. His dad gave him a new balloon and it was too loud.

The Renovation. The old mansion was being demolished. A group of local residents gathered at a protest. The neighborhood residents called for the demolition of the old mansion. The residents were very angry. The residents took their anger out on the citizens of the city.
Special Assessment. Jill was studying chemistry. Her friend offered to tutor her. Jill studied hard for the test. Jill passed the test. She was awarded the lead in the class.

Matt's Keys. Matt wanted to keep some things cool. Matt had an idea for a new keyboard. Matt took the idea to a professional to decide what keyboard he wanted. He bought the best keyboard he could find. The professional did a great job with his new keyboard.

Cell Phones. Gina was very old and had to go to the mall. She looked at the racks of cell phones on the rack. She found a brand she liked and ordered it. She went into the store and bought it. She took it home and was very happy with her purchase.

ET. Tom was driving home from school. When he got to the stop sign he realized a gas light had popped. The light was indicating to pay attention. Tom drove past to buy a new car. He ended up paying $600.

Bullies get served. Dylan went to the local supermarket to buy some food. He noticed a bunch of dogs. When he got his meal he didn't recognize the animals. He asked a girl who was nearby what the dogs were doing. When he came back, the lady said the dogs were eating his food.

Grandmother's Cookies. Gloria needed some cookies for her grandchildren. Her grandma decided she would bake her a cookie. She put her cookies in a hot pan. When she was done she put the cookies in a bag. Grandma loved her cookies and they were good.

Regret. Gina's friends were having fun. They all threw a party. Gina was excited but she didn't want to be friends with any of her friends. She decided to invite all of her friends to the party. Gina was not happy with the party and didn't invite her friends.

One dollar. It was a hot day and John was walking around the park. He saw a sign that said it would be closed. John decided to walk for a few minutes and saw a woman. John decided to get her coffee. When John finished his walk, he got a dollar!

Tim's Band. Tim was always very careful about what he wore. He told his friends he always was not going to wear it out. One day someone asked Tim to be a part of his band. Tim was nervous but accepted. Tim had his best performance ever.
New Minivan. Sara needed a new car. Her old one was too small to drive. So Sara got her friend and her son to the dealership. They bought a new minivan. They drove home with a new car.
Shark. Tim went on vacation in Costa Rica with his family. They went to a beach to swim. There was a shark that ate a lot of food. Tim was able to get away with it. The shark ate his entire paycheck.

Germany. Neil went to Germany for a month in his bicycle. He took a trip with his family. They went for the long walk up the mountain. There, they saw a nice boutique on the way. Neil was glad he bought his bicycle!

Armando burns the tacos. Armando was so hungry! He took out all of the last taco shells. He took out the meat and put it on the stove. The taco cook said the meat was raw. Armando had to eat the raw taco.

The Bank Teller. I went to the bank on a business day. I asked for a deposit. The teller told me I needed to deposit an amount of money. I went over the deposit amount and saw it was $90. I was very excited to see how much I got.

Scary Customer. Tom was walking around with his friend. There was a woman in a green shirt who asked if they were on a date. Tom kept checking his watch as he walked around. Suddenly, he heard a growl from behind his friend. He ran home, scared but then he remembered that a customer wasn't looking.

The Termination. Cody went to the doctor to get his blood work done. The doctor told him to take a bath. Cody told the nurse she needed to do an X-ray. The doctor gave Cody a plunger, and a plunger. Cody began to feel better after a few hours.

sweet tooth. Allie was playing on the porch of her house. Her neighbor gave her a few candy bars. Allie ate the rest of the candy without paying attention. Then she got very sick. She had to go to the doctor for her bite.

Short Cut to BC. It was April of next year. Beth was so nervous that she hadn't eaten all month. But she decided to try to eat all month long! And on her birthday, she felt much better. Now Beth feels much healthier.

Window Seat. Bob was waiting for a bus. He did not hear anything as he walked through the streets. The bus arrived at his door to let him in. He was greeted with a couple of nice people. Bob had a great time waiting for the bus.

Bunny's Toes. Kate was very tired of riding the school bus. When she got off, the bus would not let her use her toes. She called in the bus company. They offered to help her out. Kate was able to walk the bus.

Showing Online. I went to the mall and found some nice items. I got home and was very happy with my purchase. However, my phone did not work well. I was upset and tried to call my manager to complain. He did not help me after that.

Hurricane. My parents brought home a big package of groceries from the grocery store. I was very excited for it. When it arrived, it was big and full. I was very scared and very excited. I was so happy to finally see the hurricane in person.
Driving. Joe was nervous at school. He was nervous about going to class. But when he got there, he didn't have any fear. He was a driver. Joe knew he would pass and pass well!

Way too hot. There was a lot of thunder. A man was getting ready to go outside. Suddenly, it started pouring and he lost his footing. He fell and broke his ankle. I took him to the hospital but they were unable to fix him.

Switch Plates. I found a few nice old switch plates. I bought one for my wife's house. I put a load of them into the dishwasher to do the dishes. The dishes broke when the plates hit the water table. I put the plates in the dishwasher and cleaned them.

Paint Bar. Remy had been painting her house since she was little. She hated her old house, though. She would paint all day and night and she never got to clean it. She had a huge mess to clean up, though. She decided to paint the whole house and make a big mess of it.

Big Waves. I lived in New York City at the time. I had been on my way to Queens from Boston. I was sitting near the subway. The waves came so loud I began to cry. I went to the emergency room and cried tears of joy.

Baseball cards. The man took a baseball card from his locker. He put the card in his pocket. The card was for a baseball game. The card was for his girlfriend's birthday. She asked him if it was a gift for her.
Cat Rescue. The kids were scared of cats. They wanted to go see a dog walker. They looked everywhere for a cat. They found one in their neighborhood. They went and rescued the cat.

Cleaner. It was the first day of school. Kara was cleaning her bedroom. She realized she couldn't get her shoes in the dryer. She tried scrubbing her feet with a broom. The dryer worked for a little while but the shoes smelled bad.

abusive. It was a hot day outside. There were many flowers in bloom. I tried to make sure to enjoy them so that I won't make any mistakes. It turned out that my house was full of roses. Luckily, the owner was not mad.

Cooking. Joey decided to cook his own meal. He set it up in the oven to get out of it. The fireman started the fire when it began to get very hot. The cook got a piece of bread to eat for dinner. He took the bread and ate it with his favorite sauce.

Roger the Dog. Roger was walking to a field. He noticed something odd in the distance. He looked over his shoulder. A dog had taken a hole in Roger's field. Roger looked over his shoulder again to see how he was doing.
Sally Likes Pie. Sally is at a diner. She loves to eat fast food. She ordered a large pie. It was huge and beautiful. Sally is very happy with her meal.

Second Date. Gina was at the pool. There was a guy in black. She did not recognize him. She had to ask the guy in black to introduce herself. The guy said he wanted to introduce himself and she agreed.

umbrella. I was walking in a field when a bee stung me hard. I felt a bit of hot sweat coming off. I went up to get it and put my umbrella down. I picked it up and took it home. The bee stung me in the face and I got a lot of stitches.

Accident. A young girl was playing with a doll outside. But when she stepped into the house, she broke the doll! She cried and screamed all day. The mom was worried that it was her sister. But she took care of it and put it away.

Track. Dan wanted to try running and found a trainer. Dan decided to try out for track. Dan trained hard for 2 weeks before his final try. After 2 weeks of training Dan ran and scored a record of 2nd place. Dan was happy with his record.

garden. I used to enjoy going to the garden every day. I loved the wild plants. The plants were just beautiful. I would plant my own garden every morning. I was sad I didn't have time to go to the garden.

Weekends. The school was having a new student who was afraid of the weather. One of the kids asked if he could play outside on the weekends. It was so hot outside that he decided to go for a walk. He walked in the grass and began to play outside. He made it to his parents who brought him lunch.

The forgotten cereal. Tom was sitting outside on his patio drinking coffee. All of a sudden he remembered his cereal. It was full of cereal and stale. Tom was upset. He got home and searched and searched for his cereal.

The Bar. Jane loved her small town in Texas. She was visiting a local bar with her husband. They had some great food and a good atmosphere. They also had a good deal on wine. Jane was glad to be visiting again.

Triumphant Return. Tom had a hard time staying awake. One night he went out to eat after work. Tom was able to fall asleep. Tom was forced to stay awake for 3 hours. When he woke up he had a nightmare.

Delivery. Tom ordered a pizza online. The delivery man said that Tom needed delivery service. Tom had to call to pick up his order. The man drove Tom to the delivery man's house. Tom waited for the delivery man to arrive.

Repaired Laptop. I wanted a new laptop to replace my old laptop. I went to the hardware store. There were a bunch of laptops that I could get. Then I looked at the reviews. The computer I wanted had been fixed a week ago.

Flat Tires. Sally's car was recently totaled. She was going to a gas station and she didn't know where to start. Sally was nervous about parking it out. She waited until she got there to take a look at the flat tires. Sally saw that her tires were going flat and she could not park.
Free Pizza. Caleb had to eat pizza for dinner. He got distracted while eating. He threw it away and left. Caleb was very upset. Luckily, the pizza got home and Caleb was able to return it.

Easter Bunny. Anna was excited to make her first Easter bunny gift. Her mom took Anna out to buy the treats. As she opened the package she saw an Easter bunny. Anna was shocked and excited about her gift. She was sad when her mom returned the gift.

Henry. Henry was driving home from work. He saw a sign for Henry's favorite store. He went inside and asked the employee what was going on. The employee answered that Henry needed a new car. He drove Henry home and was happy that he got his new car.

Going to the Mall. Susie and Tim were shopping together. They went to the grocery store. They bought a few things for the mall. They then got home and set them up. After dinner they left for the mall.
Roll Over. The boys were playing. They rolled over in the dirt. There was a roll in the dirt that had been hit by a car. The ball went in the dirt, and hit someone's head. The kid got arrested.

Ben's First Time at the Beach. Ben was excited to spend his first week at the beach with his family. Ben felt the excitement of being in such a beautiful place to swim. Ben decided to swim in the waves. Ben went home happy and happy for the first time. Ben was so excited to go to the beach with his family.

Cane Tips. Bob was in a parking lot. He had a job where he could make some decent cash. He called a cab and decided to take a quick nap. He arrived at the car lot just in time to see the driver pull out. Bob laughed because his boss told him to get out.

Hot Air Balloon. Cora's family had been invited to the zoo to see a hot air balloon. They decided to buy a ticket and see one. On the way to the zoo the balloon took off. It exploded in the air and they all landed inside. There they all had to ride the hot air balloon.

The first guitar. Jody had to buy a new guitar. She couldn't afford it. She called a professional and asked them to help. The professional gave her a great guitar. She was very happy with her new guitar.
Bonus Round. Liz was playing basketball with her friends. She was playing to win the game. Her team ended up winning. However, Liz's team was losing by one point. Liz was very angry.
Dead Battery. Tom was getting ready for work. He got a phone. He went into his work computer. He saw an outage on his network. Tom called his company.

Goofing around. Sam went to the store to buy food. He walked by a huge line. He decided to walk back to the checkout area. He saw he was late but he just had enough food to eat. Sam started to walk back.

Jarvis Takes a Nap. Jarvis has been looking forward to going to the store. It is finally time to get him a drink. Jarvis decides to take a nap. He lays down on the couch and waits. Jarvis is happy he took a nap.

Playing in the Bathroom. Janet loved the outdoors. She didn't like running in the bathtub. Janet decided to go out for an hour every day. At the end of the day, Janet could see clearly. She decided she would enjoy the outdoors more in the tub.
Harassment. Maggie got her friend's cell phone number. She called the number, worried about it. She didn't remember what it was. Then she remembered her friend's phone. It was not her phone.

In the store. Cara was hungry, but the store was closed for the day. She looked outside and could not find anything. Cara checked the racks and saw she could not find anything. Cara decided to go buy a food bag for dinner. After dinner, she was glad that she found a bag for dinner.
Pool Party. Kelly went to the beach with her husband. The beach was full of lifeguards. Kelly got on the beach. The lifeguards made fun of her. She decided to go home.

Birthday Girl. Gina was always afraid of her birthday girl. This was especially so since her mother told her it was for her. But the first day of school was much different for her. Gina wanted to be the first in line to buy a present. The school announced her birth to the principal when she arrived.

Old Pipes. I was playing football in a friendly game. It was my team's last game of the season. Suddenly, I felt something burning in my hand. The old pipes had burned. I had to call a plumber to get it replaced.
Sound off. The couple went to a concert. The singer asked them to play some songs. The singer agreed. The couple enjoyed the concert. The singer had fun at the next show.

Steve's Tattoo. Steve was having a party at a fancy restaurant. And he wanted to hang out with some friends. He called a friend that needed some help. And he offered to help Steve get the tattoo done. Steve got the tattoo, and everyone was glad he was able to hang out with his friends.

Ant Bites. There once was a bee who bit Charles on his hand. He got so upset, he cut his hand! Charles learned to never let any ants out of his hand again. He never let any ants get into his house again. Now Charles never sees ants get into his house again.

Blank mind. Marge and her family were excited for her birthday. She was having a blast playing on a computer game. Her eyes rolled in when she saw a cute girl playing a game on her TV. She asked if she could sit next to her on her own. The girl hugged her with great smiles.
Make Up. Susie really liked makeup. But she hated to be left out of her friends. Her mom made sure her makeup would look good. So she put her favorite makeup on and was done. Susie had a great time.

Bubbles. My girlfriend loves to bubble bath bubbles. She told me the first time I went I was so disappointed. When I got home I went to the bath tub to take a bath. I took a couple bubble bath bubbles and felt something cold in my chest. My girlfriend told me that I should stop bubble bathing.

New Doll. Juanita wanted to play with a new doll. She went to the toy store. She picked out a black and white doll. She gave the doll a name and toy number. When the doll was delivered, Juanita loved it.

The broken ice machine. Tim was driving down the street. He noticed a strange crack in the ice. Tim took a deep breath to see what it was. He saw his car on fire, and he got out to check on it. It was stuck in the middle of the road and he couldn't see it.

The New Car. Gina and Kim were both excited to get a new car. But they needed to be more careful about who they buy. Gina's mom had told them they'd have to get it in one day! Gina was excited but worried about what she'd get. Thankfully, Gina picked a bright red Corvette that they both liked.
Fire Drill. Drew was playing the guitar. It was a big storm outside. The sky turned dark and he was scared. He started to make a fire. It burned all over.
Learning to Surf. Tom was a fast learner. Tom was taking courses online. Tom found that his skills were lacking. Tom applied to many schools. Tom landed a job teaching surfing for free.

Museum. I bought a new pair of shoes today. I went to the museum to buy them. When I took my shoes off they were very dirty. I went to the store and bought new shoes. I will not be returning my new shoes.
Spilled wine on table. Anna was at a restaurant with her friends. All of a sudden, a girl approached her. She spilled her wine on her table! She started yelling at Anna. Anna got embarrassed.

Selena. Selena was having lunch at a restaurant. She decided to ask the waitress if she could have lunch with her. As she was at the restaurant, the waiter noticed her. Selena was shocked. She knew that she should have been paying attention.
The Birds. I was walking my dog outside. I saw a little black cat. He was sitting next to me. I decided to get him some treats. After that I thought I'd never saw him again.

A Broken Mug. Rita's grandparents said they needed a new one. They thought Rita's grandmother didn't like old ones. The grandmother's aunt kept putting them out. Then Rita's grandmother gave in. But Rita's grandmother hated them.

Gym Rats. Jane was a vegan who likes to eat healthy. But the city recently passed a ban on gym rats. Jane called animal welfare groups, who asked if she could run a gym. Jane learned that a local gym would be a great place for gym Rats. She made a list of things she could do on a weekly basis, and started running.
Food fight. The food fight had broken out. The other team won the fight. They had to go back. They tried to go home. They all laughed at the food fight.
Flour. Tommy was making a cake. He poured a cup of water in a bowl. The cake broke. He had to clean it up later. He bought more water to get the cake again.
Daddy. The family was going to a party. Mom and dad came over with lots of gifts. They bought a lot of decorations. The kids all got to have fun together. The family was glad to have a fun time.
Pamper trouble. Jill was a great cat. One day her owners caught her scratching one. She was terrified! But her owners let her keep and she loved it. She got a job as a pet store clerk!

Cat with no Meow. It was my friend's birthday, and she wanted to have a cat. She asked me if I knew how to make it. I didn't, so I made the cat with a special treat. It was my favorite. I'm happy that she finally has one.
The New Couch. Mikey bought a new couch. It was too expensive for him. He tried several different ones online. They seemed a little bit better. Mikey now has the couch he needs.
New Car. Kimmy was in a car accident. She couldn't afford to buy a new car. Her sister had saved up money to buy her a new car. Kimmy went out shopping with her sister. Kimmy bought her first car.

Online Rant. Sam was making a new video game called Minecraft. He told his friends to get him a copy of the game to play with. But they couldn't afford it, so he posted it on Youtube. His friends were too busy making fun of him. And Sam's friends all saw it and felt bad.
Dirty Carpet. John was washing his car. Suddenly, he noticed he was getting dirty. He went into the house to find his dirty carpet. He took the carpet to a cleaner. John then cleaned his carpet.

Morning Jog. John was tired after working hard all morning. John went to his desk and asked his supervisor for lunch. His supervisor was busy, but John was happy. John ordered a breakfast cereal and toast. John had a great lunch at lunchtime.

The Animal Report. Trent needed to study animal behavior for his science class. He decided to see a video about how to do it. After a few minutes, he knew how to do it. He made it a point to go out every weekend. It was good to see that he didn't need to study.

Loose Tooth. John's son had a loose tooth. John tried to ignore it, but it kept growing. John had to replace the tooth with a band aid. John was worried he might have to be a lot older. John was relieved when it didn't hurt.
Scholarship. Barry was interested in college. He wanted to get into a college. He studied very hard. He decided to apply. He did.

Sofa Cover. One day, I was looking to make my wife the perfect Christmas present. I went to the grocery store to buy the covers. After the shopping, I found the perfect cover. Afterwards, I went home to make her the perfect cover. I wore the cover to her Christmas dinner party.

No more rules!. Tim was running a neighborhood bar. He had not had a drink in 2 months and it was now late. He had to sit down and listen to his bartenders for a minute. Once they were over he realized his bar needed new rules. So Tim had to give them back.

Buying a new computer. Tom was looking for a new computer for his house. He went to the computer store and looked around. Tom was impressed by everything he saw. Tom decided to buy a brand new computer. Tom was able to get the new computer he wanted.

Balding Head. Bob was watching a movie with his family. He got up early and started the movie. Bob's head was getting very dry. He tried to run to see what was wrong. His head was actually getting bald.
First Job. Eli was at the grocery store with his new boss. He was so nervous. He started getting very nervous. His boss called his manager right away. Eli was fired and left without a job.
Flowers. Lily was walking through the park one day. She saw a cute yellow butterfly. Lily took a photo and wrote a poem. It read, "Flowers love flowers. She wants flowers for a long, happy life."

Drunk. Drunk!. Jane had a crush on a girl that she knew. Jane decided to ask her out on a date. Jane was not sure she would have a date with her. Jane asked her out. Jane was happy that she asked her out.
James needs glasses. James needs glasses. James's wife lives in a bad apartment. James doesn't want to give up sightseeing. He goes to the mall. James meets new friends.

Government. Tom was in a government job. It was his first job and he was nervous. He thought he would get bad grades. Unfortunately it turned out he had a hard time with computers. He wound up passing out in the cafeteria because of it.

Speed dating. Kate was trying to meet a man for a date. Unfortunately Kate was too young to meet. She just had to meet a new guy at the grocery store. They decided to meet at the new spot. She ended up meeting a nice guy that she really liked.

Going Pro. Tyson was a high school student in the city. He always wanted to see what the local talent scene was. Tyson decided to try out for his school's student council. Tyson was excited and joined. Tyson was voted into the student council for his hard work.

Being Bold. The family decided to go for a walk in the park. They had packed everything for their trip. The first stop was the park's giant oak trees. It was time to head out, they decided. The kids were happy to leave with a good sense of humor.

No More Leaves!. Bob's backyard was very messy. It started to smell too bad. So he decided to leave his yard bare for a while. Bob's yard smelled really good, and he got lots of compliments. Bob is glad that his neighbor didn't smell so bad again.

Children's books. Lydia loved reading children's books. She would bring them to school and read them from memory. Lydia was excited when the children got in the library. She sat down to read from memory. Lydia loved reading for a long time after that.

Lori's Date. Lori was nervous about starting a new boyfriend. Her friends told her they were going to invite her out. On her first date Lori met a guy named Bill. Bill and Lori went out for drinks. After they talked Bill asked Lori to be his girlfriend.
Sleeping Over. Tina was sitting on a bench. But she was tired. She decided to sleep over. When she went to get her sleeping bag she found out she was broke. Tina was heartbroken.

Cooked Too Much. Jenny had a test on a week long diet. She took it for a few hours every day. Her doctor told her she should have just cooked. Jenny realized she was too unhealthy to cook. She decided to eat healthier from then on.

Shattered Dreams. Joe woke up to his dream sound coming from inside his house. He walked over to the sound and checked his windows. There was a scratch on the carpet. Joe ran to his bedroom to clean it out. The scratching made the scratch and the scratch is gone.

The Glasses. Jared had always wanted a pair of glasses. He was going through a lot of shopping to see what to get. He looked through his options online. He settled on a pair of eyeglasses. The pair fit Jared perfectly.
Used Item. Tom bought a new laptop. He didn't have a lot of money. He went to the store. There was no one there. Tom didn't have anything for his laptop.

Quarterback Keeper. Jim was the quarterback for his high school football team. He was always asked to be the quarterback during the team's running game. Jim worked hard to become the best he could be. He was called in to play in his first game of football. Jim made his first Pro Bowl and he was very happy.

The Sleepover. When Joe woke up he couldn't stop thinking about his sleepover. He called his brother to help him. He had made a promise to not be late for his first sleepover. When Joe woke up he looked around nervously. He was expecting his first sleepover at the end of the month.

Plane Tickets. Kate and Lisa decided to go on a cruise. They decided to take a private plane. The plane took them to the terminal. They got to the terminal and walked around the grounds. There, they ate dinner and rested.
The Flood. Molly went to school. The water was so high. The roof of the building fell. Molly's school didn't have any water. Molly had to walk back to her house and see her sister.

Boat day!. When the bus came around the corner it was gone. The bus had run down the street. All of a sudden it started to rain. They all rushed over to see what was happening. It was the dock that got flooded.
New Puppy. My parents bought a new puppy. It had a collar. He had a lot of fun in the house. We would often take him out for walks with the dog. He did not want to be there alone anymore.
Wedding. Diana had just gotten married. She was nervous about the day off. The only downside was that she had a big surprise coming up. She was going to be a bridesmaid. Diana was so excited!
Avoiding the In Laws. Jill was arrested for using her car's ignition key while driving. Jill was caught on surveillance camera. Jill has been in jail for five days. She got caught. She got suspended.

The New Kitten. I had just got my son to school in my town. My son liked playing with the new kitten I saw at school. I looked up the description of the kitten online. I found out the kitten was a new kitten named Fido. I adopted the new kitten and named him Fido.

Saturday Night Live. Lance was getting ready for the weekend. He had decided to sing his heart out for a song. When he opened the show he was blown away by his singing voice. He went up in the air like he had never seen before. He sang his heart out and was even more blown away by his singing voice.

Spoiling niece. Bobby's niece Sue was having trouble getting her hair done. Bobby did not want to upset her with her hair. So he gave Sue a box with a picture of a fish. Sue did not like the fish. She thought Bobby was trying to be sentimental.

Broken Eggs. Drew and Tim were in the market for eggs. They saw someone in their driveway selling eggs. When they looked over their eggs, they saw some bread. Drew told Tim they were broke eggs, and he asked Tim to help fix them. Tim agreed, and they both enjoyed their egg bread.

Basketball Practice. I was watching a basketball game with my sister last week. We saw the game between teams and we thought the buzzer sounded. We all had a great time watching the game. As we exited the arena we began to feel sick. Luckily our trainer brought us medicine and I felt better soon afterwards.

Huge Debt. Tom was very poor. He needed a steady paycheck but couldn't afford to pay off his credit card. He looked at his credit cards for months. Finally he had enough to get his monthly loan. He paid off his credit card.
Diplomat. The Diplomat was an official. She worked at a department of the embassy. She worked in a field. She was very busy. She didn't like her job.
Phone call. Karen was calling with a call from her friend. It was from a relative. Karen's phone went off the air. She called the person at the other end. They both agreed to meet for lunch later.

Hit. My friend Jay had just started in the marching band. He was an excellent trumpet player and did great. He always gave us bad feedback on performance. I asked Jay if he would record us and have it back. His performance went great and Jay and I signed autographs.

Go. I was going to the airport for my final exam. I was ready to board but nervous about what to expect. I asked my flight attendant what I should get out of the seat. She was really understanding. She offered to let me board, even though I was nervous.
