Chicken Soup. Sam was hungry, so he ordered a chicken soup. He picked it up and brought it to his room. It was bland and almost like it was cooked out. Sam ate it without thinking about it. But when he finished, he was sick.

Return to sender. I received a message from the sender's computer. It was a message from the owner of the computer. The owner had contacted the owner. I had an appointment for an attorney. I called the lawyer and he told me he would meet with me.
Future Engineer. Tom was at a friend's house. Tom got a job working in the office. Tom started a new job at his new job. Tom got a great grade on his test. Tom decided to apply to join the college.

Growing Plants is Hard. Sam loved to garden. He was able to grow vegetables without getting sick. One day while gardening Sam ran out of water. Sam had to go to the hospital. Luckily the hospital came and helped Sam.

No Patience at All. Sam had to take his dog out for a walk to get to the park. He forgot his leash. The park manager had to get a friend to keep Sam in the park. When the park manager saw Sam he gave him a bad attitude. Sam decided to get more people to come.

New Attitude. Ned went out and bought an expensive new bicycle. He got his feet wet and tried to change in his socks. The next day, Ned saw a girl he thought was cute on the bike. She had seen him in person at the coffee shop. He smiled and offered her the bike.

Careless Accident. Tim always walked alone at night. But one day he fell asleep in a tree. It took him about two hours to reach the side of the road. The branch fell and broke his leg. Tim was forced to walk on a ladder because of it.

School Play. Tom and Sue were trying to figure out which class would be best. They decided to do an old fashioned play for their friend's birthday. It was on a Sunday night and everyone had to go to school. It was so boring that everyone knew the score and sang. It was the best birthday party Sue ever had.

Champ. Tim was at a party. Suddenly, a man asked if he could meet up with Tim. Tim walked over to the man and introduced himself. The man was impressed by Tim's friendly manner and said thank you. Tim thanked him for his friendship and went home.
new boyfriend. I met a new boyfriend at a bar one night. We talked for a long time. He offered to meet with me after I left the bar. We began to flirt. I decided to call and meet him later.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee has a big lead role in her new movie. The lead actress is very excited about the movie. Sydnee's singing skills have been questioned lately. The lead actress is not used to singing. Sydnee decides to change her ways.

Novel. Susie was having a birthday party for the new year. The party was taking place in a very fancy area. As a result Susie was not invited. Susie had to wait to be invited for the next party. Unfortunately the party was a week away.

Water bottle. Sam was at work drinking water from the sink. Suddenly, he heard a loud thud. He got very scared and ran to his boss. His boss took him into a security guard's office. Sam was quickly grounded for a week.

Bad Joke. Ricky had a friend over who was famous for being a comedy star. He told everyone he was working on an autobiography. He was going to tell his story in front of a crowd. However he was cut off by his friend's friend. Ricky ended up crying at the end.

The Speaker. Jim had always had a bad habit of talking in front of the crowd. He always wanted to impress the people at a party. He started to listen to the music of other people and even the people's opinions. Jim began to become a good speaker. Jim's company became a big hit after he sold 100 thousand albums.
Visit. Tim had a few dates. It was a nice weathering day. Tim planned out his weekend. He bought a car for the trip. He was excited to go.

Sleeping Early. Tom was a freshman at his school. He was supposed to be sleeping but he was really tired. He started to cry. He woke up on time and tried to sleep. But when he got to school he fell asleep.

The Noisemaker. Joey was taking a class on chemistry. He asked his friend for advice on using noisemaker. Joey learned how to use a noisemaker. Joey was proud of himself for his efforts. Joey is now a noisemaker.
Banana Peel. Bob was on vacation. So he thought of ways to spice up his banana. He looked up a recipe online. He put the ingredients in blender. And it turned out great.

Soggy. Amy was eating cookies at a restaurant. Suddenly, she noticed a foul odor in the oven. She called the manager to complain. The manager gave Amy a cookie and told her to come clean. Amy cleaned the oven quickly to feel better.
Fencing. The Smiths decided to enter a fencing tournament. They had been practicing for a week. They practiced hard all week. They won and felt very prepared. They could not believe they did!

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul was a very creative cat who wanted to be the next Charles Xavier. He decided to get his own new costume. He bought a new sweater and took off his new clothes. He went outside to his favorite food truck. He found the perfect shirt for his cat to wear.
Pool trip. I took a pool trip. I used to swim in the ocean. I tried to swim as fast as I could. My dad stopped swimming. I ended up getting injured.

New Kittens!. A little kitten had been missing. She decided to ask her mother for a kitten. They got together and decided on a cat. They brought the kitten home and played with it daily. The kitten was happy to have a new friend.

Black Friday. Allie wanted to go to the Macy's Thanksgiving parade. She wanted to dress up as a superhero. She had a costume on. She thought it looked great. She was very happy with the way it looked.

Puppy. Liza took her family to the park to ride their puppy. When the puppy came out she started playing fetch. Her mother started to pet the puppy. Her little brother loved the puppy. She decided to keep the puppy.

A dog. Jane was walking down the street one day. There was a stray dog nearby. Jane picked him up and took him home. Jane brought him home, fed him, and took him to her house. They were happy to have a new dog!
Ready Supper. Sam was ready to make dinner. He prepared some spaghetti. He put the spaghetti into the oven. The meat started to cook. The meat was burned.

The Dress. Sam was supposed to be going to his sister's wedding. However, he was stuck outside with no way to get to the dress. He finally got there in time to get the dress. When he got to the front of the building the dress was ruined. Sam could not wait to get his wedding dress.

Teased. Jill went to school in a rush. The teacher noticed her in class. She wasn't happy that she didn't find her cell phone. Jill took the teacher's phone to a store. The teacher returned the phone and Jill was in class.

Paws. Gus had a dog named Spot. Spot was a very shy dog, and Gus was trying to find a family pet. Spot wanted Gus to teach him to run around. Gus was not really sure if Gus should teach him a trick. Gus said no, and Gus couldn't run around anymore.

No makeup allowed. Nate was having his first makeup day. He got really nervous. When he opened the bottle he spilled a ton. Unfortunately he accidentally spilled the wrong makeup. Nate was disappointed.
Super Mario. Tina wanted to become Super Mario in school. She started playing games at home. The game became addictive. The Super Mario machine got too hard to use. Tina quit playing Super Mario.

False Alarm. Abe woke up one night in the dark with a cold. His alarm clock had caught on fire. Bebe grabbed the lighter and went to smoke. The fire alarm went off and Bebe didn't see his alarm for a while. Bebe had a huge panic attack and ran to the bathroom.

The Card Collection. Rina wanted to collect card sets. Her favorite was a set of 16 cards. Unfortunately she only had six. Then she looked at several online shops. She found a card set that was so large that she had to spend more.

Migraine again!. When I was a child, my grandpa said that he hated headaches. I was born with tonsils. He always told me that it would be better to be in bed and not in pain. However, he always told me that it was better to be in bed and not in pain. My parents had never understood, because he was an old man.

Snake in the grass. My family decided to take a trip to the park for a week. It was a cold, rainy, hot summer day. We were all afraid of snakes. I was scared, and I couldn't walk to work. It was the best way to pass the day.

Too Much of a Wait. Ava was going on a road trip in the evening. She wanted to eat, but didn't have enough time to sleep. Her father let her take a shortcut out of town. But Ana was nervous. In the end, she was too full for the rest of the trip!
Erin and the dog. Erin got up to go eat at a restaurant. He went to his favorite restaurant. He ordered a pizza. The pizza was way too spicy. Erin ate the pizza.

Statistics. Kelley's college roommate, John, had a terrible math test. John failed his math exam and did not study on the weekends. Kelley decided to go out and have a party. John went out with friends that night and had a blast. Kelley never went out again.
Comeback. Kya had a bad hangover. She was upset at work, and went home. Then she went to get some ice cream. Kya felt better after a few minutes. The next morning, she had made her first comeback.

Tadpoles. The family decided to take a bus for a long trip. They decided to ride the bus to work on the main street. The bus took them there in the morning. Once they got to their work, they were very excited! After the trip they were happy they had made a trip to work!

Big Test. I went to the doctor for my first test today. The doctor told me to take a big test. My body was not ready for that test. He had given me too much of an F. I decided to stay home after that.

Space Heater. Tom was looking forward to a new telescope. He went to the store and bought the perfect one. He then went to a toy store to buy the telescope. He loved the astronomy looking toy at the store. After buying the telescope Tom had a good day in his home.
Perfect polish. Amy was working with the dog. But the dog did not seem to notice. She decided to put glitter on it. And then she painted it. She loved it.

Free Food. Dylan made pancakes for a friend in class. He was excited because he made so much food! However, he did not have any milk left to use. Instead, he had to use peanut butter and water. His pancake ended up being too small for him.

Family Strife. I found out that my parents were out of town this weekend. So, I went to the mall to look around. I found a store that sold teddy bears. I purchased them and wore them out to the mall. Now my parents were grounded.

Reader. The young couple wanted to make new friends. They hired a tutor to help them study in the library. After a few months, the tutor became good enough to help. He helped the young couple plan out their future with the tutor. The pair felt so good that they decided to visit again.

The Bank Robber. Bill was making his way through the cash register. Suddenly, someone knocked his money out of his hand. Bill was terrified, and tried to run back inside. The person behind him tried to give him a large amount. He was forced to punch Bill in the face.

Roadtrip. Tina decided to take her family for a roadtrip. She did not want to wait because she could be late for school. Her brother and sister decided to drive to the nearest park. When they got there, Tina was very tired. She was sad that she would have to wait that long.

Stinky Feet. When I was in high school my mom said no because of my dirty feet. I was a little too sensitive to that. I told her I could only clean my feet once a week. I refused to let her keep them and then I decided to try to do it. Luckily, my feet were fine the next week.

Awkward Shave. I always get the job of shaving my head. I've tried different types of cuts on different skin types. However, one day I tried using a different style. It's funny how people don't like shaving on skin. I've realized that shaving is not the same as shaving off.

The Free Burgers. We went to the grocery store to buy some groceries. I tried to make tacos. I had to make them out of scratch. We had to wait until they were done for them. It was so funny to watch the food burn!
Cookies. Sam was on vacation. He found a few cookies he didn't recognize. He got to try them and was really impressed. He ate them and loved it. He got to eat them afterwards.

Runaway Dog. When my dog Spot came out of the house, he was gone. He had been gone all day and his owners were very upset. The dog ran out of the house. Spot walked in the door of the house. He looked all over the house for his owner.

Small Box. Kerry and James were playing in the snow. Suddenly, they saw a small box on the ground. James said that he would open it, but Kerry said no. Kerry was confused. She asked James what the box meant, but he didn't answer.

Gas Station Blues. Mike was late to work and was getting ready for work. He arrived at the gas station with only his wallet in hand. The gas attendant asked Mike if he has a spare. Mike told the attendant no because he has a car. Mike was late for work because he lost his wallet.

Gus the Zombie. Gus is a zombie. One day he went to a party. He was so hungry and tired he forgot what he ate. He couldn't find anything, but he thought he had forgotten something. He was sick, but he gave it a try.

Clean Numbers. Gina wanted to learn how to count the digits. She put the numbers in a box. She put the numbers on a paper. She counted the digits and counted the words. She had a good idea and used it to memorize the numbers.

Cold Shower. Sasha woke up in the morning and went to the bathroom. She washed her face, then put on her favorite makeup. When she got out the shower, she immediately fell asleep. She had never seen such a cold shower in her life. She woke up a few minutes later with a cold, hard, pink body.

Runner. Marlene had been running her best lately. Her coach was impressed with her. She decided to race at a local bar. She practiced every day. Marlene won the race and made it into the local runner's championship!

Trial. Tiffany was very nervous about her test. She was not prepared. She took the test anyways. When she passed it, her teacher saw what she had done. Tiffany was relieved.

New Crush. Liz had a crush on Ray. So she invited him to a party. She went to his place and tried to ask about Ray. Ray laughed at her, but Liz kept trying. She finally had to admit she had a crush on Ray.

Poetic Success. Tyson wanted to write a book on magic. He took the library and a book-seller to the library. They filled the bookshelf with books on magic. Tyson finished the book. He went on to become a famous magician!

The big storm. Remy was out on the beach. He heard a storm moving nearby. He looked around and saw lightning moving up close. A strong storm came and he ran home quickly. He was safe until the power was cut off.

Searched. I went to the beach yesterday. I spent a long time looking at the water. A nice girl came by and asked if I want to go out with her. I said yes and she went home. She went and talked to me for hours.

The movie. John loved watching the movies. His favorite was Rocky Horror Picture Show. John was looking forward to seeing more movies. John finally found a movie to watch. John couldn't wait to see his favorite Rocky Horror Picture Show movie.

Eyesight. Tanya lost her eyesight in the fourth grade. At the age of twenty, she decided to switch to the eye doctor. The eye doctor told her that she needed glasses. Tanya had to go to the doctor's office to get glasses. Now she is very comfortable with her new eyesight.

Lifting Weights. The coach of the team announced that our team was to lift weights. Our coach told us to work out. We were told that a lot of weight lifting would be done during the day. I was discouraged. I decided to do less work that day.

Cookies. We woke up this morning with several packages for our favorite bakery. I opened the oven door and looked around. The oven was empty! I opened the lid and found a bag of cookies. I opened the bag and got to eating the cookies.

The Grand Slam. Eloise had been working on her basketball skills ever since she was a child. Her dream job was to win a Slam Dunk contest. She worked her way up to the second round of the event. She won the slam dunk contest on first place. After finishing her dream job she took a year off work.
Sam. I had been dating Sam for a few Year's. We both had a lot of issues. Sam got sick of it. She kept fighting with him. Sam and I decided to get counseling together.
Rain OUt. Sally had a bad fall. She decided to wear a rain coat. She fell in. The rain fell on her face. Sally went to the doctor.

Dessert. Tina and her family were having a party. Tina wanted to make a cake for her favorite holiday. Tina was afraid of heights. Her mom helped her build a giant cup for everyone. Tina's family loved the cake!

Box of Candy. I am a heavy metal fan. I've decided to try to make a box of candy. I mix together some old food and a lot of fruit to make a chocolate wrapper. I put a box of Candy inside and mix all the ingredients. I wrap the box and make some delicious candy.
Spy. Nancy was a spy. She wanted to be a spy. She made plans to spy for the president. When she got to the palace she was nervous. When she got to the palace she discovered her plans were false.

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine had just given birth to her first baby. When her second baby arrived, Jasmine was surprised. He was a beautiful little dog with a big black tabby. Jasmine was very excited to see him! The baby did not seem to get the same reaction.

5 Years. Jack was in love with Diana, his best friend. The two got together in 1975 for an anniversary party. The party was held at the Beach House in a nearby building. When Jack opened his door to Diana, Diana was pregnant. Jack and Diana had a baby.
hostage. There was a small storm that year. A lot of mud was pouring out of the roof. There were mud puddles on the ground. A person lived under the roof. He fell and died.

Cheesy. Ginny wanted to eat some fried chicken. She tried everything but none were healthy. Finally she made some and thought she'd eat it all. She ate it anyway. Her chicken felt even better!

Jay at the concert. It was Jay's birthday and he wanted to show his friends. But there was nothing fun to be had at the concert. Jay went home and put his favorite band on the radio. But he realized the band had just started and he was having trouble. Jay decided to just sing in a way that made people laugh.

Gun range. My grandpa was a professional bullfighter. He won a record 100 meters. His opponent in a competition was disqualified. The disqualified man shot my grandfather dead. We now practice every year.
Stylist. Tom was a piano player. He wanted to be a stand-up comedian. Tom signed up for a podcast. Tom's new show was a success. He was able to sell more copies than he did on his own.

The Garden. I bought a house with a lot of gardening equipment. I watered the vegetables daily. One day the hose broke. I didn't have the money for repair. I bought a garden hose that I used a week later.

piano lessons. My friend Bob joined a local jazz band. He played a beautiful piano solo. Bob practiced a lot to prove his point. Bob practiced the entire day and night. Bob has improved a lot in his piano skills.

Special Ingredient. Sandy needed to get some candy for her birthday. She bought all kinds of treats. She added to the mix as much as she could. When she ate it, it was full. Sandy was very happy that she had put all her treats into her treat.

Too Busy. When I was driving, I went to my car. There was a problem with the front bumper. It had broken a few times in the last week. We had to wait in line. My car finally arrived in the parking lot.
The bus ride. My family and I were on our way home. I went to pick up our kids. Suddenly, I heard a loud noise. There was a fire and we ran to check. They said the bus had burned down.

Best Formula. Toni went to the doctor for her yearly checkup. The doctor said there was a problem with her heart. Toni was unable to go to the Doctor's office. The doctor wrote Toni several more heart issues. Toni decided to leave her doctor alone.

Card Games. Dan loved playing card games. He was playing them on the couch with his friends. After a few minutes Dan realized he had forgotten his own money. Dan decided to change his credit card information and change the address. Dan had to make all of his money on the new card he had stolen.

Dunkirk. Maggie found a way to make money off of Dunkirk. She worked hard all summer. On Easter, she made money in Dunkirk. She had the money for a party at her parents' house. Dunkirk was her new best friend.

A Lap of Coffee. We sat down to talk about how we got started. I had a craving for coffee this morning. We drove to the barista for some. He offered us some to drink. I said I was sick but he helped me out with my latte.

Rated R. Briana was in charge of making coffee. She made it all in one day. She made all the delicious coffee. She was pleased with the results. She was happy that she did not lose sleep during her next cup.

Gossip. Karen's father had just passed away. She went to see him once a week, and he was on time. Karen sat with him and talked with him all day. When he went to school, she saw a homeless kid. Karen cried tears of joy.
Ikea Store. Ikea was in a grocery store one day. There were loads of items there. I decided to get some chips. Ikea ate the chips at first. However, they were a little too expensive.

Spree. My family and I were getting ready for summer. We rented a plane ticket to the island. We boarded the plane and started taking pictures. It was going to be a tough trip, but we were excited. When we arrived at the hotel, our eyes lit up with excitement.

Jenny walked out into the kitchen as a family gathered around the table. Jenny looked around her room, but nothing was found. Then Jenny realized her missing pie was her favorite chocolate cake.

Gratitude. Cindy was very proud of her accomplishment. She was proud that she had finally gotten the award. She took it off her shoulders and congratulated her on her accomplishment. She felt so proud. She felt proud of herself.
Annie's Test. Annie was a high school senior. She was going to go to the test. She forgot her test. She was worried she wouldn't do well on the test. She did very well on the test.

Little League, Big Dreams. I went to a baseball game with my dad the other day. The game was a Little League game between the minors. As I was on the mound I hit the ball up for strike two. My arm got caught up on the bat by two other players. We ended up having a game on TV for a few days.

Soccer. My friend Joe is very soccer obsessed. He is very skilled at soccer, but he is not good at rugby. One weekend Joe's friend called me to tell me how much he likes rugby. I told him I couldn't beat him with soccer, so I made him my team leader. I beat him, and I felt great about it.
Breakfast. We made muffins last night. We made brown sugar cookies. We made all kinds of things. All of the sudden the muffins were black. So we had to start over from scratch.

Messy Studio. John needed to make some money. He needed to hire a professional. John researched the studio online. He found one that seemed perfect for him. John hired him and began making a decent profit.

Trying To Stop A Thief. Tom had been looking for a house for days. Tom thought he had enough evidence to call for help. Unfortunately, the cops had yet to catch a thief. They had a warrant out for Tom's house. Tom was able to give them his house in an hour.

Icy Roads. Jane and Beth went to a local gas station. Beth told Jane that they need to see what she can get. Jane was upset. Beth took Jane's advice and decided to ride on Jane's car. Jane got off the gas and walked to her car.

Pool and ice cream. I wanted to buy a special pool. I picked out some colors and I set the temperature. I got into my car and drove to the store. I went there for hours. I saw a good deal on pool products.

Too Old To Trick Or Treat. Jane decided to make cookies for her son to make. She got a box and a mixer and a pen. Jane then put the ingredients in a bowl. After mixing, Jane set the cookies for them to bake. When it was done, Jane realized it tasted like baking sugar.

Messy theater. I took my kids to the new theater. They played a lot of different musicals. I really wanted to watch it but it was too expensive. I went home to make dinner. I still wanted to enjoy it.

Nick Goes to England. Nick was interested in going to England. Nick bought a ticket. Nick bought a plane ticket to take the plane. Nick had fun on the plane and took the plane back. Nick was happy with the trip to England.

Breakfast Noodle. Alicia made a healthy breakfast for her family. She decided to share it with her family. Her family enjoyed the healthy breakfast. It made Alicia's family feel better. She thought she was a terrific breakfast option.

No Self-Service. Jane and John got into an argument. Jane realized they didn't like each other. Her boyfriend thought she was a bit weird. He ended up leaving and the two got into a fight. They both quit together.

Car Keys. Bob had to use his car keys to drive to work. He didn't have a car key. Bob looked through the spare keys in his car. Bob found a way to use his car keys. He had the keys for work and the keys for home.

Wide Feet. Jane was walking across the street one day. Her feet hurt badly. Jane called the doctor. The doctor told Jane she would have to get glasses. Jane was relieved when she got her glasses fixed.

College. Amy went to the library for a new book. Her first stop was the library entrance. She walked the first door. She saw a boy holding the book. The boy asked Amy to go after school and Amy said yes.

Summer Reading. Samantha decided to go for a summer reading. She was excited, since she had to work all day. But after a while, the day was cold and she kept running late. She couldn't fall asleep as her brother was trying to help her. Luckily, he was okay and it was all just a memory.

The Lottery Win. Allie got into a car accident in Las Vegas. She was lucky. But she lost her husband because her car wouldn't start! She did not care so much because her husband lost his home. She never lost his car.
Ben starts a food fight. Ben is at the fair. He is trying to beat his friend. Ben makes a big fool of himself. His friend beats Ben. Ben is happy he won.

Too Much Rain. There was very heavy rainfall in a very hot area. I was afraid that I would be late to school to get there. However, it was still cool. After the rain stopped, the road made a smooth and scenic journey. I ended up getting there around the end of the day.

The Drums. Gabe had been practicing his drums for Years. He was finally ready for a gig, after months of practice. During a lull, he went into his mosh pit. He played so much that he got injured. The ambulance did not come to save him.

The Basketball Team. My friend Joe has just come back from a long holiday. Joe was playing basketball in a game with his school's basketball team. His team made it close to the championship game. Joe's team was extremely proud. He and his team are a part of this championship team.

Salvation Army. Tim lived in the same area as the Salvation Army. He was homeless because of his house and his life. Tim decided to take the Salvation Army to serve the needy. He made lots of donations to the needy. Tim felt that he could finally use his money to save people.
Rainy steph. I had a shower, but was really thirsty. My mom made me sit near a water fountain. The water fountain was not working. I decided to drink some water. I felt much better after my shower.

Quitting. Karen is a stay at home mom who has to get her son vaccinated. Karen is sad that she does not have time to stay home from work. She gets an email from her husband saying they are no longer on their honeymoon. Karen goes into her husband's room to see if he will be home or not. Her husband is allergic and she doesn't go into the house for days at a time.
Missing Cake. Anna had her cake set. Suddenly, her cake started to burn. Anna was mad. She had to go to the store to get an epoxy. Luckily, her mother got her to buy another one.
Disco Dance. I bought a Disco Dixie dance set. I went with my mom. My mom and I danced all night. By the time the disco came, the dance was too long. She told me it was too late.

The Bunny. The Bunny was a bunny living on the street. One day a man picked her up and took her home. The man said she was a baby bunny! He gave her a small stuffed bunny. The Bunny became so happy that day.
Mango. I decided to eat mangoes. I didn't eat a mango for the entire day. I was hungry for five minutes straight. The mangoes had gone bad. I ended up calling my mom for dinner.

Stuck in the mud. Tim was hiking in the mountains. While hiking he tripped and fell. He went to the nearest emergency service. There he was helped to get up and put down his phone. Luckily he did get out and they had to get him to a hospital.

Gerald. Gerald needed to find a car to take to the city. His dad got a job on the weekends and he worked out for hours. Gerald worked the extra hours and met his boss. Gerald was given a brand new car and he couldn't wait to take it to work. Gerald was proud of his new car and gave his boss the job.
The Puppy. The man took a puppy out to play. The puppy got too close. He started barking loudly. The puppy tried to get up from the ground. The puppy yelped and ran away.

Entertainment. I loved to play videogames, especially Monopoly. The competition was fierce, especially with other competitive players. I had to play at least five times for a quarter. After about four hours I had to sit in front of a computer for ten hours. I never played videogames again.

Bitter exes. Barry hated getting new tattoos. His mom warned him not to do it anymore. He started doing it anyway and it got better. Eventually his friends were happy with it. He loved how it turned out.

Pictures. There was a man who always had a lot of pictures of his best friends. Alicia was looking forward to seeing a picture. But when she got up and walked to the door, she felt very sad. She tried to smile but she couldn't. Alicia cried and ran back inside the house to watch pictures.
Eye Infection. Sara's cat had pooped on the carpet. It got up and ran away from her. Sara looked outside her window for her cat. She saw it sleeping. Her cat had eaten an egg.
Broken heel. Tanya was walking down the street. She tripped on a broken heel. The pain made her go for the ice cream. She was in a lot of pain. Tanya had to walk home before it was too late.

Driver. Tim had just made the cut at the end of the marathon. He was nervous that he would not be able to do the race. The day came and Tim had to make a decision. He went to the doctor to check his shoulder. Tim had a back injury.

The Spider. The family decided to see a spider in the woods. They went down the path to get their camera. They found the spider in the bushes. They looked up and saw that it had been in a bush for quite awhile. The family took pictures of the spider for years afterwards.

Too expensive muffins. My daughter was visiting in Mexico. We were looking for some healthy muffins. She asked me if I would like some so I obliged. She told me that her boyfriend had asked for her muffins. We decided to go to a Mexican restaurant for the muffins.

Jeff and his house. Jeff and his family had taken a trip to the local flea market. They decided to have a pizza party at the local pizza parlor. Jeff and his family arrived at the place and began eating. Jeff's wife got very upset when she asked him to stop eating at the parlor. Jeff was not upset with his wife, as he had no pizza at the parlor.

The Sushi Chef. My friend's friend was getting very old and had lost his job. He had recently retired and needed a new job. One day, my friend was visiting and invited me to a restaurant. He decided to make sashimi so I agreed to help him. I had a great time so I will never forget.

Long Hair. Kathy was trying to look very girly at work. So she decided to get a long hair brush. She got it from the store and wore it everywhere. Unfortunately she accidentally bumped her head against a wall. Kathy decided to just shave her head right away.

The Amusement Park. Today, I took my kids to the amusement park. We rode a roller coaster and a roller coaster and a horseback ride. We went in a giant water slide. I fell over and had to get up quickly. Thankfully, we were able to ride the ride.
Baked apples. I wanted to bake apples. I bought all of the ingredients except the apples. I waited all day. I baked the apples. They were delicious.
Sand. Rita loved sand. It made her feel alive, just like the rest of her people. She bought a large amount of sand. It kept her skin from getting infected. She still likes the sand.

The teacher at the store. We had a class for kids at the beginning of the semester. We wanted to surprise them. So we dressed them up and put them in our classroom. One day, they didn't see their teacher. They never knew the teacher before we told them.

Leaky Roof. Bob was playing in his yard. His neighbor's grill got a little dirty. Bob realized that he had to clean the grill in order to play in the backyard. He decided to clean the grill in order to go for a walk. Bob enjoyed his walk and had a great time playing in the backyard.

New transportation. Tim took the bus to work every morning. But it was very late at night. He didn't know how long he would have to wait before he got there. After ten minutes he went to the bus stop. His boss thanked him for his hard work and said he would get a promotion!

Exam. Amy was nervous that she would not win. She studied and studied for a couple of hours. She finally decided to enter the final exam. Amy was very relieved when she received her paper. Amy had the best grade she had ever gotten.

Dan the candy man. Dan is a candy man. Dan has a birthday coming up. He wants to make a huge chocolate cake for everyone. Dan asks the family to make a giant chocolate cake. They are successful making a huge cake.

Goldfish. Ethan was fishing in the pond with his brother. Suddenly his brother ran across the pond. The fish bit him hard! Ethan ran over and broke his brother's arm! He had to take his brother to the doctor to get it treated.

Can't Come In Today. It was an hour before my son finally got to go to bed. He could barely see and he had been very scared since he was eight. I finally came in and he was so excited he ran away. I had to pull him over because he was too scared to come to sleep. He told me it wasn't his fault so I decided to let him go.

Disastrous Diana. Donna was at a friend's house one day. She saw a strange cat wandering around her. Donna called the police to investigate. The police found the cat and arrested him. Donna was grounded for a week.

Fussy Cat. The kids were playing outside when they heard a loud noise. They saw a kitten wandering around the yard. They ran to see where the kitten lived. There they found a cat sleeping near the fence. The kids quickly picked the cat up and brought it home.
Boating. My niece has an 8 month old. She loves to go boating. Last summer she went boating with her friend. The kids got drunk on the water. She was able to calm down the whole time.

Fashion. I wanted to make a nice dress for my daughter's birthday. I went to her mom's house for a little look-alike. She told me about a design that I should try out. I immediately tried it out, and found that it was much different than I imagined. After several weeks of testing, I was able to make the dress perfectly.

Marie. Marie was a very active girl. She always slept on the floor. One day, her mom found out she broke her ankle. Marie couldn't walk for a month. Marie was forced to take care of herself on the streets.

Popsicle drip. I was at the restaurant and got some popsicle for lunch. I decided to make my own popsicle. I tried to put it in a bowl, and it fell off. My coworker had to clean it up before I made the popsicle. I told him that it was okay since it was the wrong kind.

Whistling Tea Kettle. Beth loved to drink coffee. One morning, she woke up very sick. She went to the hospital for help. There she met with her doctor and she went home. She felt much better on her own.

Peapod. Kia had never ridden a peapod before, but she loved it! Her friends took her to try it out, and it was very fun. She got very attached to it and began to feel comfortable riding it! Soon it became quite popular and Kia had several friends over! Kia loves riding peapod for all of her friends!

Garrett's Baseball Game. Garrett loves to throw baseballs for baseball game nights. His favorite team was the Phillies. The Phillies won the game by seven runs. Garrett threw the baseballs hard and hit his home run. He celebrated by wearing his old baseball uniform.

Star Quarterback. Tommy threw a football and ran fast. It fell on the floor and bounced everywhere. Tommy kept running. He threw the football and ran faster than anyone. Tommy was able to get a touchdown.

School Dance. I was a freshman in high school. One of my favorite things to do was make my friends dance. I invited friends over for a party. The next day we made dinner. Afterwards, my friends danced with each other.
Body Transformation. Jane went to a beauty pageant last month. She was nervous about it. It was a very intense contest. Jane won two hours. Jane made it through.
Charging my phone. I had to use the charging station on my phone. My charger had broke a few weeks ago. I was really upset at my mom. She finally bought me a new charger. I was so happy!
Bike Ride. Tom's friend gave him a special gift. He got a bike. Tom drove to the right in a big circle. Tom put his bike in the circle. He got there very fast.
The Nail. Timmy went to the nail salon to get his nails done. His nails were all done and looked great. Timmy put on his new nails. Timmy was happy. He really loved his new nails.

The Whale Problem. Jules and Sue were watching a movie. The whale suddenly swam towards them. The movie crew heard them swim. They grabbed a pole and set up a camera. The crew caught a whale and captured it.

The Model. Kelly was a model for a local pageant. The pageant asked her to dress up as a model for the contest. Kelly did not want to but knew that she was ugly. Kelly decided to dress up as a caricature of a real woman. Kelly was accepted as a contestant in the contest.

That Star. Tara was very nervous to be watching her favorite show. She was very worried the producers were going to pull it off. However, during the filming of her own show she actually got a cool look. The producers loved the look. Tara enjoyed the moment very much!

Fairy-tale. Tim was watching a movie with his friends. He had never been into fairy tales before. He really liked the idea of being able to see them. He asked a friend what they had been up to. He was excited to finally be seeing a scary movie.

Sick from fajitas. Tom had an order for the same dish. His house was so busy, he had to stop at a gas station. He tried the food and realized it was so cold! He was so hungry and his mother told him to leave. Tom quickly had a nice dinner instead.

Excitement. When I went into the kitchen, I was very excited. I didn't know where my grandma lived but I decided to go. I got there in a row, ready to leave. We walked down the aisle and I saw my grandma, sitting there. I couldn't believe my eyes when she said hello and waved to me.
Hot weather. Amy was going on a camping trip. She bought a tent and some food. She walked along the campground. She hiked up the mountain. Amy was glad she had a warm campground.

Walden. Walden had been with the military for 5 years. He worked extra hard for his promotion to a senior enlisted man. He was called up as a major to lead the Marines. He was sent to Afghanistan where he served a life sentence. His life was spared when the Marines captured him.

Visual Genome. Cameron worked as a scientist for several months. He got tired of his boring job and quit. He searched for an open source DNA software. Then he downloaded a kit and discovered his discovery. He quickly discovered his DNA software was very fast.
Diet Soda. Trey's doctor said he should stop drinking soda. Trey didn't like soda. Finally, he tried eating some. Trey ended up liking it. Trey went to buy more soda every month.

Cactus in the Window. I was looking for a great Christmas gift for my parents. I saw an acorn in the window and decided to try it. I opened it and it was actually a coconuts tree! I couldn't wait for them to grow! I then decided it was time to buy them.

All work all play. I work at a local college. My roommate Joe had a crush on an actress. I decided to meet up with him at a local coffee shop. Joe met up with me at the coffee shop and introduced himself. We then went on the ride home.
Gymnastics Flips. Joey loved gymnastics. He could lift hundreds of pounds. Joey decided to join a gymnastics gym. Joey trained for three months. Joey never got into trouble with the club.
Prank calls. Jack had been feeling guilty lately. So his friends decided to prank him. They played a prank on him. Jack ended up getting fired from his job. So Jack didn't feel so guilty after that.
Prank. Tom was working on his computer. He had a lot of problems. It started to rain one day. He started to run it over. He ran it over again.
Slow down. Tim was tired of his job. He asked for help and could not. He decided to take a nap. After a few days Tim started to feel tired. Tim was relieved to see that his nap was finally over.

The Bus Driver. Jack and his family loved going to the mall. The drive was an hour to get to the store and they needed to buy snacks. There were so many cars, so they had to split them. They split and brought snacks on the bus. The drive was worth it.

Duran Duran. Duran Duran's teacher gave him an A on his test. He studied hard all day. His grades were perfect. However, he was never given an A in the class. His mother was sad that his test was not a B.

Fresh lemonade. Lydia was planning a visit to her friend's house. But she hadn't bought any lemonade! So she spent a night in the fridge looking for something. But she had no luck. When she got home, she found nothing but lemonade!

Marcus Makes a Sandwich. Marcus had just finished eating breakfast. He noticed his favorite breakfast was starting to smell weird. So he made a sandwich with all of the cereal he ate. It was just a little gross and he didn't want to throw it away. After he finished his sandwich, his mom made him a peanut butter sandwich.

Lost love. Dale and his mom decided they wanted to go to the beach. So they both went to the beach. Dale went with his mom. Dale's mom was upset when she saw his mom's phone. Dale's mom looked so disappointed she threw it away.

Smelly Cat. Sally was running around in the alley. She noticed that a cat was scratching her. Sally looked everywhere for it. Then, she noticed the cat wasn't eating anything. Sally felt embarrassed and went to the shelter.

Start your fight!. Tom was tired of playing basketball. Tom had not played in a week. Tom's dad made him do chores for a week. Tom felt better in the following weeks. Tom felt good about his dad's advice.

Toothpaste. Kia's dentist told her that they'd just had a tooth extraction. Kia was not excited but it would be worth it. She spent a long time brushing her teeth. When she got it down she was almost a hundred percent. Kia's dentist said she'd pay twice as much for a toothpaste.

Talent. Tom was a high school sweethearts talent scout. He put himself up as a talent scout and wrote a paper for his school. He also worked with an advisor. A year later he got a job as a talent scout at his school. He became a professional talent scout at his school.

Ingredients. Anna was walking home from school. She saw that the stove was burned. Anna looked around and found many other places to store food. Anna called her local store to look around. They had all the groceries for her in one place.

Wild Rosebush. Beth was out in the woods for the weekend. She saw a wild rose bush. She decided to climb up to the top to see if it was a rose. Beth fell down and sprained her ankle. Beth was in the hospital for a few days.

Swimming. Jim had never had a stroke, he was at the beach one day. He had been taking slow water jacks for awhile. As soon as he went into the water, he fell out. He scraped his knee. Jim had to go to the hospital immediately to have the operation.
The first kiss. Sam went on a date with a boy. They had a good time together. They decided to go to the mall. Sam decided he should try out a new shoe. They went to a dance.

Melvin's Dog. Melvin's dog was being chased. Suddenly, Melvin's dog heard a loud crunch. He looked under his hood and saw a dog jumping. Melvin told his dad how his dog was chasing a squirrel. His dad told Melvin how the squirrel was chasing Melvin's dog.
Jason's decision. Jason had lost his wallet. He went to the store. He looked at a wallet and saw a card for him. Jason put the card into his pocket. Jason was excited to buy his wallet.
Stunt. Tom was a very competitive car racer. He would often go off road races. Tom didn't want to disappoint his friend at a race. Tom joined the race team. Tom took the championship trophy.

Huge. Tim was on a road trip with his wife. He was driving down a busy highway. He was stopped by a stranger who had cut off his lights. Tim was not paying attention. The stranger drove off, then turned the light back on.

Lost Car. Bob was driving his car to work one morning. Bob's car ran out of gas and Bob called a tow truck. He was so relieved to have his car towed to work. Bob decided to wait until he was late to work to see if he could get the car towed. When he got to work, Bob's car had been found.

Frozen Ice. I wanted to freeze the ice cream from the freezer for dessert. So I did the math and worked on the ice cream. When I finished I put the ice cream on the counter and it was frozen. Since I wasn't sure what I wanted, I threw it in the garbage. So I decided to make the ice cream out of frozen ice.

Close call. John and Sara were going out on a date at a restaurant. Suddenly, John and Sara noticed that it was late. The waiter told them that the restaurant was closed due to heat issues. John and Sara went to the restaurant to get food and drinks. John and Sara had a wonderful time at their new restaurant.

The Alamo. Sam and Tina decided to go to the Alamo for their vacation. Tina asked Sam if he wanted to have his own tent. Sam said yes and Tina showed up. They spent all of their money on a tent. They enjoyed their trip to the Alamo.

How Shelly Broke Her Toe. Emily's mom told her to shave her toe by going to school. Emily didn't want to do that. She begged her mom to shave her toe by herself. Emily's mom agreed to do it for her. Emily never got hurt from that.

Jelly Shoes. My daughter is afraid of the sea. She lives in the south. She always wears her own shoes. My daughter has a pair of jelly shoes that she loves. She loved them so much that she bought her own pair.

Astronaut. My brother asked me to play catch in the park one day. I couldn't believe I had to do so well to win the game. I went up to the park to check the ball, so I played. It was a huge game! I had won and felt good about my performance!
The Move. My wife was moving into a new house. She got tired of her old house. Her new home was on a different block. She decided to move out. She bought a house on the new block.
A Kingdom Betrayal. Rosa was a princess with a big family. She liked to play princesses for fun. One day, the family decided to move to England. Rosa became a king. The family was so happy.

Breakfast. John had a breakfast for breakfast on Saturday. He had eaten at most of the ingredients except eggs. He decided that he would make eggs for breakfast. When he opened the eggs he realized they were toast! John decided to only buy eggs for breakfast and the rest for dessert.

Biggest Fan. Travis was the star of a popular local television program. His favorite character was Big Ben, who was a bad football player. He was always a loud, mean and mean character. After a while Travis became the star of a popular local movie. Travis had one of the biggest dreams of his life.

Stretching. Joe was a bodybuilder. He could not stretch his legs. One day he noticed that his leg muscles were weak. He decided to get new stretches. His new flexibility was not as bad as he had hoped.

How I sprained my ankle. One day I decided to go for a run. I sat on the bench and jumped into the air. I ran for two miles with no more injury. The doctor said I did not sprained my ankle. I felt very happy and I thanked God.

Gym. I started out a very active weight lifting program. I didn't do any cardio at all. So I kept practicing every morning. When I got into the gym, I learned the ins and outs of the program. I still lift more than I should but it feels good.

Stolen Jewelry. Jane loved to knit with her mom. But one day her mom took her to a craft store. She found a beautiful silver ring! Jane was so thrilled! And she made her mom a new necklace for her birthday.

Michael's Collection. Michael loved to collect antique and antique cars. Michael took a vacation to the Bahamas for an extended vacation. Michael's first stop was the old, abandoned cars. Michael drove to the car dealership to purchase a rare antique car. Michael's favorite car is the Ford Fords, and he will always cherish them.

Two Fans and Their Favorite Show. John and Jim went to the beach one day. They were having a great time swimming. Jim saw John enjoying himself in the water. He started to wave around him. John ended up jumping to the side of the water in the water.

Racing Cars. I wanted to get my friends and family to race cars. I had an idea and I wanted them all to race race. I decided to research the local streets. I found all the racers who drove by the same time every day. I also researched speed limits, and made sure I was at least 21 miles per hour.

Fishing. It was late at night, so I was tired from a long day. My parents decided to take me fishing at night. While fishing I noticed something strange. I couldn't swim because of the heavy water. I had to swim to get back home to the pool.

Paint Cover Up. Tim's school had a huge art contest. They wanted the best painted cover up cover up posters. Tim had to guess who should be painted first. He figured it would be Mary and Mary would win. They all started painting each other up, and Tim didn't win any.
Kitten Friends. Jane's kitten was a stray. Jane asked her neighbors if she could have a pet. Jane's neighbors said yes. Jane named her kitten Charlie. Charlie liked Jane because he was so happy.
Cross country. My wife's friend took her to the cross country. They did not know the distance. We went to the airport to meet her. She was running very fast. My wife was delighted.
Great birthday. I woke up in the middle of the night. I knew it was a great day. I couldn't sleep. I threw up. I finally slept well enough to remember.
Josh. Jake had a bad test in the afternoon. Jake ran to his room. His teacher told him not to worry. Jake was nervous since his teacher was a teacher! Jake went back to his bed with the teacher.

Drive-thru. When the car was going through the stop sign the radio stopped working. I looked inside to see what was wrong. I looked inside to see what it did and found my license plate. I gave my license plate back to the mechanic. After my license plate was checked and the radio worked again I gave my license plate.

Best Trip Ever. Amy's friend invited her to go to a country club. Amy thought that she wouldn't want to go but she was sure she was wrong. The club was packed and Amy got in line and waited. When Amy arrived, she got a free ticket to the club. She was disappointed that it was packed but the girls enjoyed it!
Lovers and Flowers. I woke up in the morning. The sun was setting in the morning. I took some coffee to get out of my bed. Then I went to the bathroom. I got some sunflowers and flowers and ate them.

Steve's Award. Steve has been nominated for a prize in his school's annual Art Museum. He decided to get to vote on a piece. He spent the day picking out pieces he really liked. He waited all day for the winner. Finally, he had to choose between a statue of himself.

No Biting Please. Jim wanted to go to a movie. His parents gave him some advice. It was time to go home and get some sleep. Unfortunately he didn't listen to the advice. The movie was too loud and messed up his sleep.
Calling In Sick. Jill needed to call in sick. She overslept while checking into work. Her boss called her in sick. She got a call back the next day. Jill was given detention for a week.

The Surprise in the Creek. Tim was playing in the creek with his father. Tim saw a black bear and heard a lot of crying. He thought he saw something in the creek. The bear came out of nowhere. Tim's father and mom laughed about it.

Fell in the lake. I was swimming in the lake with my boyfriend. I was really tired of looking at my phone. I went to get dressed. I went out and found my phone and took it home. I told my boyfriend I would call him.

For Victory. Mason was a member of the marching band. He wanted to win tickets to the concert. He drove to the concert and took them out of the drive. He put them in his car and drove home. He was very upset.

New Horizons. A few months ago we went to the new Horizons museum. It was so much fun to visit and the staff was so nice. I wanted to see all the animals. They put out a big exhibit. The next year we went back to that museum to see all of the animals.
Instant Exit. Tim was an instant exit ticket tester. He did not have a car. He had to go through a traffic light and get his car! He drove to a police station. He had to pay a $200 ticket.
Bad haircut. I got a new haircut. The pain was terrible. I had to get a new comb. It took forever. I had to give up the job after a few days.

Old Prison. Gina was a prisoner in the Boston Prison. One day, she was in charge of a parole officer. The officer said Gina was no longer needed. Gina was given an adult supervision. Gina was so glad she was able to go to work.
Vegetable Garden. We went to my local garden center for the first time. I bought some tomatoes from the salesroom. I watered them at home. They worked for an hour. I loved them!

The Cracked Cup. Amy was cleaning her car when she spilled juice on the carpet. She was embarrassed to bring up the cup she cleaned the floor. The cup smashed into Amy's floorboard. Amy was afraid her cup wouldn't stop bleeding. Luckily she had a sponge that helped to keep the spilled juice from spilling.

Big Money. John's favorite game was baseball. He decided to play against some of his best friends. He was able to score enough points to win the game. John bought tickets to his first game in the arena. He had the game to win the game and made it into the finals.
Pet a Fish. Travis was at the beach. He found a huge pet fish. He named it Pet a Fish. The fish was very big. He took the fish home.

Cookies. Sam went out with his friends to make cookies. They had never made them before. He looked up a recipe for making the cookies. They all had the ingredients and went to the store. They all tried out the cookies and they both loved them.

The Freezer. A farmer decided to have a farm. He opened his freezer and saw a lot of things. He thought he could make some homemade food. After a few days of doing it he got the food. It tasted delicious and sold fast.

Ooh That Smell. Kelly was looking forward to coming home to a relaxing day. Her husband brought her a gift he found online. The gift was a bottle of perfume. Kelly did not know if she would like it. Kelly did not go to the store for that bottle.
Hair. Ava decided to change her hair color. She did not like that her hair would turn white. Her mom recommended she dye her hair. Ava went to the salon. The salon dyed her hair red.

Louvre. Tiffany was walking to the museum. She walked over to the display case and flipped it. The slide fell down and was falling again. Tiffany went to grab her favorite book and read. The slide finally came to life and Tiffany was very happy.

Wedding Video. Kelly and Rob were going on a date. Rob was nervous. Kelly was going to ask Rob's number but Rob got nervous. He told Kelly he's only going to ask him if she wants to marry. Kelly felt very silly and got the whole episode cancelled.

The Pet Trial. The man sat down and read his favorite novel. He then went to the living room and sat back down. He read for 30 minutes. The man felt a bit tired. He took a sip of his beer and took a rest.

Marco Jumps Rope. Marco was running a little down a track. He tripped and twisted his ankle badly. Marco had to walk to the doctor to get his ankle checked. Marco was rushed to the hospital where he received treatment for his ankle. He was able to walk on the track with his ankle!

Early Dismissal. The man sat down at his desk. The boss sat on his lap and looked down at him. The boss gave the man his notice. The man sat back down in the chair and felt the tension increase. The boss noticed the tension and fired the man.

New friends. Sally and her family moved to a small town. The town was small and it took up a lot of space. They moved back to their old houses and renovated the area. They had a lot of fun together. They will always have a lot of fun together.

Linda starts a garden. Linda is very picky about her fruit. Linda decided to start a garden. Linda planted a bunch of her own flowers. Linda's fruit was the perfect size to be eaten. Linda had a garden of the highest quality!

Lost Tools. Tim's car got caught in a mud puddle. It took Tim several days to return his tools. After some time he finally got back to his truck. Tim had found his car and was ready to use it. Tim took it to the store to buy more tools.

The steak. Cindy decided to make a steaksicle for the Christmas meal. She was only 8 but she thought it was pretty. She put the steaksicle in a pan and cooked it. Then she added the ingredients to the pan. She went home, and it was delicious!

Erik's First Kiss. Erik was going on a date with a woman who was in love with him. She went on his first kiss. Then he kissed her. Erik was so excited that he left. But the next time, his girlfriend went on a date with him.

Round Food. I went to buy some bread at the grocery store. When I got to the store, I bought some bread. The bread was large and brown, so I couldn't choose. I ate the bread as quickly as I could, and felt sick. The bread became rotten in my mouth.
Envious. Amy was having trouble walking. She decided she didn't want to do it in front of everyone. She looked around. Amy wasn't sure what to do. Amy then realized it was a sign of disease.
The Scientists. Sam was a scientist. Sam was working on a report for a university magazine. He came up with a simple idea. He would take pictures of a volcano. It would help get national attention.
Going Blind. Jack wanted to go blind. He wanted to look like a ghost. He thought about going to an art museum. Then, he went to a park. He became scared.

dinner in the woods. Joe went to the cabin of his dad to cook dinner. It was a nice quiet summer day and Joe was enjoying his lunch. When Joe woke up, he realized that his dad had been there the entire time. Joe went into his bedroom to pick up his meal. His dad had just cooked dinner for him.

Joey. Joey lived a life of constant fear. His dog broke out of a leash and ran into a house. Joey was afraid of dogs. One day Joey got very lucky and broke a leg. His owner and friends never told Joey again.

Cat kisses. My cat was sleeping during the day. Her cat decided to kiss the window on the other side. Since the cat was awake, I couldn't see anything. I tried calling for help. But no one came.

starfish. Amy wanted to fish a starfish. But when she brought it home it started freezing. Amy's mom tried to help it, but it wasn't able to. She finally bought her a plastic bag to fill it with water. When Amy caught her new starfish, she was excited to catch it!

Treatment. My cousin had a stroke at 16 months. He went to the doctor for a checkup. The doctor told him he needed surgery. The doctor told him his symptoms were gone. He gave him an IV drip and some pills.

lost boy. I went to the mall to buy a game. I found it on sale on Amazon. After several hours of searching I found it in my lap. It was so cool that I bought it for the day. I cannot wait to play the new game with my friends.

Free Samples. I've always wanted to take samples of food. I really wanted to make some but they are expensive. I thought I would make some for my friends. I went to their website and got everything they had. They were selling out in minutes.

Drinking. Tim had been looking forward to a concert ever since he was a kid. One day, he went to a restaurant and got a great deal. The line to go in was very long, though. He ended up at a place that only had a few seated. Tim had a great time.

Dead end job. Bobby was a college student. He was offered a job at the end of a class. After some negotiation, Bobby was offered a new job. Bobby worked for an hour a day to prepare for his new job. After being offered the job he did so well he got promoted to be Dean.

Bar. Tom loved to play outside. His father told him to always get a bar of soda. Tom always drank soda until he was old enough to play. Tom eventually became a very good swimmer. He started a family on a diet and loves his soda habit.

Facebook Drama. It was one of the first dates of our anniversary. It was awkward. When the date came, I felt really nervous. Thankfully, there was no drama to worry about. It went well until the date turned into a huge fight.

Christmas Problems. When my nephews birthday was coming up I had to go out to buy gifts. I went to the mall. On Christmas Day I got out my Christmas cards. I went and looked in the window. I decided to get a gift instead of going to the store.

Sleazy. When I was in college, my roommate hated to work. I always felt so lazy in class because of it. We were always so bored. I learned how to use flash cards. I now use flash cards to solve problems at school.

Pizza Place. I went to a pizza place in NYC for the day. The food was great, the wait was long. The waitress was kind to the waiter. After a while, he asked if I wanted a salad. The waitress gave me a salad.

The Big Win. Sandy decided to be a contestant on the Miss World pageant. She was only eleven and still hadn't won. She entered a contest but decided to just not play. She won the contest but did a good job. Sandy won the pageant for her hard work and hard work.

Picking a Movie. Amy was going to a friend's party. She couldn't decide which movie to watch. She asked if there was a movie she liked. The movie had a new villain she wanted to see. She decided to go home.

Itching. I was at a party when my brother took a huge pain in his arm. He kept saying it wasching and couldn't stop it. I asked him to go to the doctor to get a band aid. The doctor gave him a band and I tried it. I can't believe it's a band aid!
Bracketology. Dan played against Steve the day he was born. In the first game Dan went first in the tournament. Steve did not do well and lost. Dan played a bit better then. He lost the next game.

Lion. Tina loved her pet lion. She knew she wanted a pet animal to keep her company. So when her son's dad found out, he decided to buy a pet lion. Tina took him outside and his dad took care of the lion. Tina was so happy and happy.

Fred. Fred is a little boy who is very big. He is the smallest of many of his classmates. He has to play fetch for his team. One day Fred's team wins a game. He is very happy that he got to play football.

Repaying the Pastor. Gina was having dinner with her boyfriend. His wife was taking care of her daughter. Gina felt uneasy at the same time. She decided to ask the pastor to come help her. The pastor gave her a cup of warm tea to relax.
Writer. Tim's dream was to be a journalist. He enrolled in a class to take a course. It was hard, but he got it done. He went online and applied. He was chosen to be a writer for a local newspaper!

Birds. I was walking around downtown. Suddenly, a flock of birds came around my block. I tried to get away but there was no one to stop. Eventually, I found a friend who was in the park. I told her I'd had fun and I'd be back next week.

theater. The playwright began writing a play. He had written it on a sheet of paper. When he was finished, he went to the theatre. They had a free concert for the audience. The playwright enjoyed his free performance.

Drawing Class. I am really interested in designing buildings. I decided to make my own drawing class. I worked very hard to learn the materials. Finally I had to build a building from scratch. I have been doing this for 2 years now.

job interview. Tom was the best in his class. He wanted to get a part in a band. He practiced all summer long for the test. On the day of his interview, Tom's band was invited to play. He had an amazing time and got the part.

sick day. Kelly was at the bar. She thought it would be nice to have a drink. Kelly decided to try some. Kelly loved it and she bought a glass of it. Kelly was feeling better afterwards.

Facebook isn't for everyone. Tim had no one around. He just used facebook to get to know people. But he was no good at it. He spent his day trying to do better. Eventually he got some people who like him more.
