Bull Ride. We had to take a bull trip to the zoo. We sat in the car with our son and his dad. We rode for hours, but had to stop around noon. Then we went back home. We were so happy we went back to the zoo.
Declined. Tom was taking his daughter to school. Tom had to wait for the bus. Tom found a car. Tom stopped at the local grocery store. Tom was able to buy his daughter a snack.

Ride Along. Jim wanted to go to the park with his parents. But they said they couldn't afford a car so they would walk. Jim decided to take the bus to the park instead. And it was fun for Jim to take the bus back home. He was happy he decided to take the bus home.

Stainless. I went out to eat a burger. While my fries were gone, the grease on my finger and tongue stained. I looked down and saw a stain on the burger. I went to the store to buy a new stain remover. I purchased the stain remover and used it on my finger.

The Nickname. Timothy's friend's birthday is tomorrow. His name is Timothy, and he does not like nicknames. Timothy asked his friend to try to make a name for himself. His friend said that Timmy hates nicknames. Timothy is going to hate himself tomorrow.

John's Social Life. John needed to meet a new social worker. He drove over to the store to apply to jobs. John began working on his social life after meeting with the social worker. The social worker found John very tired and didn't take him home. John felt really guilty that he hadn't met his new social worker.

Jailbird. Sam was so good with his guitar he decided to take it to school. He asked his mom for the guitar but she did not have it. He put it in the car and drove home. He learned all the chords and he played it every day. After many years of practice he was very good at the guitar.

Swap Shop. Tom was looking for a new sweater. His sister was upset that the store had out of the perfect sweater. Tom decided to go with a discount. Tom found a very nice sweater that fit him perfectly. He decided that he'd go back to the store to buy it.

Stuck in traffic. Jake was driving to work one afternoon. His car was stuck in the middle of a road. Jake had to stop. Jake called for help to help fix his car. Thankfully, his car was fixed in the car.

Chicken and Waffles. It was the last day of school and Kim didn't have any food. All the students were hungry. Kim ordered fried chicken and waffles. Kim was sure she wouldn't get any food. However, there were still a few left.
Pizza. Tim was at the grocery store. He went to the pizzeria. He picked out a pizza. He ate it. He couldn't believe how delicious it was.
The lake storm. It was sunny and windy. The Smith family decided to go to the lake. While they were there they saw a huge storm. It rained for hours! They had to stay indoors.

99. It was a cold night and I wanted to get home. I thought I would look under the blankets. I crept upstairs into the living room. When I did I saw the mailman. I put up my mail and he was late for work.
Caught stealing. Jane was running late for work. She wasn't paying attention and caught a thief. Jane was punished for her crimes. She received a large reward. She never got caught again.

The Phone Call. Jane was very upset at her phone bill. She called the bank. The bank was not aware. Jane had to cancel the phone call. Jane realized she should not have made a phone call in the first place.

Interview. Joe needed to speak to a candidate in the election. Joe found a local newspaper interview at a local coffee shop. Joe went to the coffee shop and spoke with a candidate. The candidate spoke and Joe was happy. Joe got the job as the party's candidate.

Retirement. Jim decided to retire early because he loved to work. He did not have money for a retirement fund. He decided to get one for himself and save it up. When he went to the retirement fund, they gave him free money. Jim still used his money for years.

Across the Alley. The alley was jammed with people. Alicia was very upset. She yelled at the person running through the alley. She went outside, and yelled to the person next to her. The person yelled at her for not stopping.

Dishonest. Susie bought a bunch of frozen baby food at a thrift store. She bought some to eat in the afternoon. When she got home she noticed she forgot the ingredients. Susie asked the cashier to return the food to the store. Susie was caught red handed and had to pay $300 for the meal.

The Shoes. Candy was supposed to have her first pair of shoes by Christmas. When they arrived at her house, she got very excited. Unfortunately, the shoe she received was broken. She immediately ran to the store to buy more. They had to refund her for a pair of bad shoes.

Dehydrated. Susie was on the bus for work. She woke up and felt dizzy and dizzy. Luckily she was able to eat breakfast and drink milk. The bus stopped for lunch and she had to stay awake. She was very grateful for being able to eat breakfast.
Building the shed. Allie loved to make crafts. She decided to start her own garden. She planted all the vegetables. Then she had it ready. Then she had it ready for the next potluck.

Handing out candy. Kim was excited to be out for the candy store with her mom. She walked over to the aisle to pick up a piece. Kim got some candy from the counter and left. Kim returned and started to make dinner. Kim forgot to buy some other food for the holiday.

The Pasta Dinner. Jill's mom made her spaghetti for dinner. It was time to cook it, but she hadn't realized it was already done. Her mom brought her a plate of pasta to eat. She put it in the oven, then threw it out. She had to go to the store to get her pasta.
Music. Tom bought a new guitar. He went to the shop to buy it. He went to play some music. He did not want to play the same song. He tried to play the same song to the store again.

Tutoring Help. Jim was going to be tutoring for his English class. The class is very hard at first. However, he decided to try and improve his english. Jim spent an hour per minute learning new words. Jim was pleased with his progress.

Dave needs a new car. Dave is a great car mechanic. He works as a mechanic for a lot of businesses. He was recently offered a job at a new dealership. Dave was so excited to finally be a mechanic for a new dealership. Dave was glad to be getting a job at a new dealership.

Local Ad. Kim was getting ready to buy a gift. She wanted to be as excited as possible. She decided to go to a local coffee shop for coffee. She picked out some good coffee. After she ate her cup, she went home and opened her gift.

Too Much Soda. One night, I tried to wake up at noon. I was scared of soda and ran upstairs. I was afraid that it was the wrong night's time. After a few hours, I sat in bed to take a drink. When I came back, I had too much soda and fell out.

Dog. Kia wanted a puppy, so she went to the pet store. She looked up many different breeds of dogs, and found a perfect one. Soon, Kia had a dog that loved to hunt and do tricks. Her husband gave her money to buy a new one, and Kia took it home. It was a very long time, but she was very happy.

Doves cry. When I was a kid, I went to play outside with my friend. My neighbor wanted some ducks. He said they couldn't fly. I refused to go near them. When I saw the ducks, they couldn't fly at all.

The Earthquake. When the news got back from the newsroom, everyone was stunned. The news anchor was a huge fan of the local news. He started a talk about earthquakes on his television. Everyone was scared that an earthquake might hit their town. In fact, it was just a very small earthquake and nobody was injured.
The musical student. It was her turn. She made a song. It was an old song that had been written and performed at home. It was the band's song. The band loved it!
Rita chokes. Rita was a terrible cook. She cooked her family's favorite chicken for dinner. They decided to go to the store. They bought the best chicken ever. Then, Rita forgot about her chicken.

Large Ego. Mia wanted a new look. But she couldn't decide which one to purchase. She decided to try to find a brand she liked. She looked through a few of her favorite brands. She finally settled on one she liked.

Beer run. I went to the store and bought some beer. The owner was so excited to have beer on the counter. She had a lot of people waiting for their order. I waited a while for a few minutes. Finally I found a nice spot near the back of the store.

Tom the Drunk. Tom was a drunk at a bar one night. A drunk man came out and began knocking on Tom's window. Tom got up and was asked to leave. The man told Tom that he was the drunk at the bar. Tom was not happy that he had to get in trouble.

Tim gets in Shape. Tim was on his first hiking trip. He felt very energetic and confident. His trainer warned him to stay on his feet. Tim took a few deep breaths to get ready. Tim had a wonderful week and felt much better.
Criticized. Tom got his mail. The mailman had not found it. Tom called back. He complained to the mailman. The mailman finally had it back.

Stale Dale. I went to the dentist to get my teeth whitened. The dentist recommended a flat iron stain from my teeth. I had to remove the stain myself. It was too heavy for me to handle. I bought a plastic lint stain for the same stain.

Bathrobe. Gina was cleaning her room. She needed to change out her bathroom. She looked through all the clothes she needed. She needed to change the diapers. She then changed out the bathrobe for the baby.

Teaching Lesson. Ricky was struggling to learn a lesson in Spanish. He decided to teach it to his best friend. Ricky's friend suggested a lesson about teaching Spanish. The friend taught Ricky how to read his friend's book. Ricky began to feel good about himself after that lesson.

seeing eye dog. Kenny decided he needed to see a dog for the weekend. His dog seemed so friendly, he decided to take him for a walk. It turned out that he was right near the dog eating hole. Kenny's dog ate all of the food and ran away from Kenny. His dog ran to Kenny for safety but was attacked by the dog.
Fire. The woman woke up the next morning. The alarm went off. She went to her bedroom. She checked on the floor. She opened the door.

Veteran's Day. Sam was a retired college graduate who was very passionate about his career. He wrote many articles and spoke about his passion to become a professional. The college made Sam's career a success because of his work. Sam was excited to learn that he had been chosen to be an intern. He will be coming to America tomorrow for his final job interview.
Hitting the curb. John was playing outside. He was really enjoying himself. Suddenly a car hit him in the head. It scraped his shoulder. John had to get a cast on it.

Travel to Hawaii. Bill was going on a trip to Hawaii. He wasn't sure if he should get on the plane or not. When he finally arrived in Hawaii he was very excited. When Bill arrived he was greeted with many new people. Bill was very glad that he took the time to visit Hawaii.

Married. Dawn was getting married at her new apartment. She was excited to be a mommy. However, her husband, a new man had a new girlfriend. Dawn was so nervous that she fell in love with him. She decided she had to make a choice before he could get married.

Turtle Violation. Dale had a pet turtle that he kept in his house. He put the turtle in a bowl and put it in his bath. The turtle died when it reached the top of the tub. The owner called a pest control company and got the turtle cleaned. The company is no longer making a turtle infestation.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. My best friend Andy and Larry decided to get married. Andy said he wanted a boy but Larry didn't believe him. Andy said Larry was an adult, not a child. Larry asked Andy if he can go to school and Andy said yes. I was so proud when I got to go to school on Sunday.
Bad purchase. Kim was on a blind date with her date. She really wanted to get a tattoo. She bought a bad one. But when she looked at the picture she couldn't see it. It was on the shelf for awhile.

Sisters Fighting. Lily was on a hike with her older sister. She was out hiking with her sister. Suddenly, they noticed another girl walking on the trail. Her sister ran over and broke her leg. Lily realized that she was not hurt, and that her sister was a little jealous.

Stomach. The boy was eating raw salmon. The stomach was sore and it upset him. He began to wash his hands and do other chores. His teacher gave him a lecture on raw fish. The boy began to clean his stomach afterwards.
Spot the Dog. Jane went out to a park. She saw a dog licking the floor. She decided to get the dog in a bowl. The dog bit Jane's hand. Jane did not know how to get rid of the dog.
Nasty Attitude. When my dog ran away she got mad. So I called the police. We went to investigate. The police found the dog. They arrested the dog.
Lake. I always wanted to go fishing. I had never been so far out of the lake. One day, I decided to go. The rod caught many fish. I now fish for a living.
Bagpipe. Gina's boyfriend broke into her apartment one night. She was devastated. She called her husband. They talked for hours. He answered their phone, and then Gina went to sleep.
NYC. A man was on a blind date. They went to the park together. The man told the woman he was from NY. The woman was confused. The man said he had never been there.

Italian Food. My wife and I decided to go to a Mexican restaurant. I was really looking forward to it. Once we arrived I had to wait in line. When the waitress came, we got a refund and food. We were able to eat on time and got it again.

Skydiver. I worked at a local airline. One day there was a fire on our air wing. The plane was going for about 15 minutes. When I got there, there were people on the wings. I realized that I was flying in the wrong place!
Trapped Dog. Tasha lost her dog. She was so sad. Then, she saw her dog. The dog seemed happy and happy. Tasha cried with joy.

Broken Television. Roxy's television was on a blackout alert. She looked online to see what was up. She saw that a repair shop had broken the television! She drove to the store and bought a replacement. Unfortunately, her television wouldn't turn on.

Hamsters for All. I was working late at work on a report. As I was working, I noticed my hamster was chewing up my food. I realized I had forgotten to change his food at home. I tried to return it, but he wouldn't eat my food. I realized that he was going to eat the food he forgot.

Not what expected. Allie was sitting at the table. She was really enjoying herself and watching her friend. Suddenly she saw her friend was sitting near the table. He wasn't wearing a tie so she didn't feel uncomfortable. Luckily her friend came by and gave her a hug.

Friend. Jim needed a new car. He went to the dealer and looked at various options. Jim eventually found a Subaru with an Accord and a Ford. He decided that this was the car he wanted to buy. Jim was excited to get the car he wanted, though he had no idea how.

Shane goes to a play. Shane has never been a dancer before. He has never been afraid of it and decides to go to see one. The play has great seats. Shane can't wait to go back next week. He hopes to see it again next year!
Chalky. Jill had a nasty cold. She wanted to drink coffee. Her mom told her to stop drinking. Jill refused. Her mom made her drink tea.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge is an excellent cook. He wants to try a new recipe. He finds it difficult to prepare but he works. Finally Jorge makes beans with all the beans in his can. He feels satisfied eating beans.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack was very interested in cars. Jack visited a car parts store. Jack learned about several cars with a red sticker. Jack bought a new car. Jack went home excited to find a red car he liked.
Not Mad. Tom was playing outside. He dropped his backpack on the ground. His backpack got caught in the mud. Tom cleaned it out with some sand. His backpack got covered in mud afterwards.

Pool. Lila had always wanted to go swimming at the beach. So she decided she would start by taking a pool lesson. At first she did not like swimming at all. Then she learned about water safety. She went to the nearest pool and learned how to swim again.

Cheap Move. Bobby was the CEO of his company. He sold his company on the internet. He went to the dealership for a cheap deal. The salesman bought a Cadillac and a Porsche. Bobby was very happy with his deal.

Safe and Sound. Tom was at a store with his kids. There was a line outside of the store. Tom didn't know who to sit with at all. His child asked him to pick up a box of candy. Tom wasn't sure what to pick up at all so he just smiled.

News. Dale was a star football coach. He was at the championship game against Miami. All of the players were excited. Dale's team lost by over six points in one half. Dale knew he would be there when he felt confident to make it.

Broken Arm. Tanya was walking her dog on the road. She slipped and fell onto the sidewalk. Luckily, her arm wasn't broken. The next day, she couldn't walk again. Now, Tanya needs to get some work done.

Mary's Kitten. Mary went to the store with her toddler. The toddler grabbed a cat to feed the kitten. Mary felt sick and sleepy and ran to the kitchen. Mary's cat started to cry and her mother helped her pick her up. Mary's cat was not sick so she fed the kitten.

The Mattress. John went shopping for a new mattress. He needed a new mattress but he couldn't find one. He went to the store and looked around. He found a brand he liked. John decided to purchase a new mattress.
Tooth. I was getting a new tooth. The pain in my tooth was excruciating. I went to the dentist. He recommended they get it checked. They gave me the wrong tooth.
Migraine. My wife went to the doctor for a migraine. She was concerned about taking a pill. She said she would be fine. My wife started taking the medicine slowly. Soon her headache was gone!
RMV. Ava wanted to lose weight. She trained for months. She had her weights on all week. She lost four pounds in six weeks. Ava was happy.

Basketball Rim. Dan's basketball team was down by six points. The referee came out and told them they had to shoot. Dan and the other team kept trying to shoot, but nobody made a shot. The referee apologized and made it a point to try and shoot. The coach went in and scored with his team!

To much of a good thing. My friend and I have been dating for 2 years. We are excited to get engaged. We went to a restaurant last night. We ordered a hot dog. We are both excited and have been dating for months.

Rotten Luck. Alicia liked to play in the snow. She loved to ski. One day she decided to take the day off and sled down the mountain. She fell down into the snow. Her face started to swell up all over.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly had been drinking and driving a very long time. She decided to try to go for a run. She was afraid the drive would hurt her back. However, she took the first steps very slowly. When she came back to her car, she was smiling in delight.

The Gym. John's gym was going down a creek. He decided to go to the water park. He got out his car and headed to the water park. He decided to play in the river. He felt better after playing in the water.

Reading. Alex's family was at the mall with friends. But Alex found himself missing a lot of homework. He wasn't paying attention, so he couldn't go to class. And he was very sad as his teacher told him he couldn't do it. Alex started to study and write about his life.

An unexpected accident. Sandy had just gotten home from work. Suddenly she noticed a dog coming up to her door. She ran up to help the dog. She found out the dog had been sick all night. Sandy was able to get the dog's temperature down.

Selfish People. Gina's father was very strict about making her feel safe. She would never be allowed in the dorms. When Gina got older, she thought her dad was being a bully. Ruined Mailbox. John was sitting in his living room. There was no mail. The mailman knocked on his door. John opened it. John found his mailbox had been completely ruined!

Bleach Cap Search. When I came in the bathroom I heard something in the bathroom. The bleach was all over my jeans and shirt. I realized I had never bleach caps before. I went to the laundromat and bought some bleach caps. I put on my jeans and took off my jeans.

grocery. Kia was going to the grocery store. She didn't want to waste her lunch money. So, she decided to order a hamburger and fries. But to her dismay she noticed the menu was different from the one she had ordered. Kia had to reschedule the food and the manager would not budge.
Padding. Jim wanted to keep his house more tidy. He was trying to do it himself. However he got the hang of it. He was able to keep everything organized. Now it was time to add padding.

mike walker. It was a hot day. And there were many storms that day. But one boy decided to walk to his dad's house and stop. And that day his dad noticed he was missing his mike. And he decided to walk to his dad's house to watch the storm.

Movie rip off. Jill was sitting at her computer reading a movie. She noticed her computer suddenly shut off. She immediately got a call from her boyfriend. He said he needed a ride to the theater to catch the movie. Luckily Jill's boyfriend didn't mind, but the movie went great.
Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is walking to school. Suddenly, his car breaks down. The car stops. Tyler rushes home to rescue his baby. His baby is fine and Tyler is grateful for his help.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mother had been looking for a new job for 2 years. She had an old house, but needed help moving it. I worked with her all day. The next day she heard that her old job was laid off. I called and they said the new job would go to an experienced contractor.

Wedding Party. Tom was preparing for his big wedding. He didn't have enough time to prepare. Tom had to go to the store and buy some dinner. He went to the store and bought a cake and a blanket. Tom got married the following day.

Lost Deal. Joe bought a new pair of sneakers from the store. He used his debit card to buy the sneakers. He didn't realize they would not come in his size. He was disappointed in the store's clerk. Joe decided to buy the sneakers again at a smaller price.

Lansing Trip. Diana's vacation was going to be a weekend. She didn't want to miss out on a holiday. She had been working all summer on her holiday. She decided she would make a big effort to make a big one! When it was done, she could feel good about it.

Easter Bunny. It was Easter morning and Maryann was very hungry. She ran outside and grabbed a loaf of bread. The bunny jumped out and ran over to Maryann's! The two ate a delicious snack together. It was a wonderful Easter morning!

Bad Dessert. Tom went to the beach for the holidays. It was very sunny in the summer, so Tom wanted to go to the beach. But his car broke down and it was too hot. Tom decided he should stay home and wait for the sun to come up. When he got home, his car was broken in two and he had to go back home.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike has been trying to improve his PC. He has been using his old graphics card. He has been watching online forums to improve his computer's performance. Today Mike is making sure he is running the newest games on his card. Mike is happy to be able to improve his PC's performance.
Loud music. Tom's house was very loud. He had to go outside to change the music. He was afraid of the loud music. Tom stayed inside. When the music stopped it was fine.

Tax Evasion. Tom was trying to avoid paying taxes. He made an appointment with a tax agent. The agent told Tom to put the extra money in savings accounts and keep a log of all of them. Tom did not realize his tax returns were not due. Tom's tax return was due in the afternoon and he had to use the savings accounts.

New York Vacation. Tom was going on vacation. It was a long, winding road. Tom bought himself a ticket to an amusement park. He was so excited to take him! Tom took the train to the park in a beautiful mood.

College Applications. My application for a part-time job has finally been submitted. It is a part-time position I've been offered to. I've been interviewing for months and looking forward to it. I am very nervous and I think I'm going to fail. My application was rejected and I ended up not getting my part time job.

Generations. I am a writer and wanted to write a book. I studied at Harvard and went to MIT to study. When I graduated I was excited to be hired at a local publishing house. I went to work that afternoon at the publishing house. After working hard, I won the book award at the top of the magazine.

Vegas. Lana had just moved to a new city. She thought it'd be a great time to start exploring. After several years of trying, she finally settled on Vegas. She enjoyed her time there with her friends. Her friends couldn't wait to go back again.
No Hesitation. I was at a party. Everyone had a snack. Everyone ate a lot of snacks. Suddenly everyone got really thirsty. The only thing I had left was a soda.

Car in Parking Garage. Randy was upset that his car didn't go in parking. He called his insurance company and they agreed to let him drive. Randy went to his car's mechanic and got some information. Randy told his mechanic that he needed to do it himself. The mechanic fixed his car and drove him to the nearest parking garage.
the song. Briana sang a song at a campfire. The campfire went out. The campfires kept on going. One of the campfires died. Briana decided she wouldn't be in a band after that.
The move. I found a nice place to live and moved. I had many people. They wanted to live there with me. I called their realtor. He said they could move by just a few days.

Coupon Clipping. We took our kids to a special coupon machine to have some coupons. It was a very convenient way to get discounts. It was a great way to save money and make a difference. They were very pleased to receive them. They were very happy to have something to do.

Online Shopping. Kelly has never shopped online before. Kelly was at Macy's looking for a shirt for the mall. She decided to look for one that was a little better than her current one. Kelly was surprised to see that she actually liked it. She went home and picked out a shirt she liked.
New Router. Lizzy needed a new router. She could not afford it. She called and asked her friend if she could borrow one. Her friend agreed and bought her one. Lizzy had a great new router!

Firebug. I was cleaning my house one night. While I was cleaning the ceiling, a firebug appeared. I looked all around and my whole house. When I went outside I found it was a bug. I sprayed water everywhere for it to come out.

New handbag. Jill found a new pair of new handbag at the store. She tried them on but they were too small for her. So she went online to buy a new bag. When she finally got her new bag she opened it. She was so happy to see her new bag was great!

Space Mountain. The first thing Ben did was go on a space mountain. The mountain was huge. Ben got a couple of people together and climbed. He got his friends to help him. Ben spent an entire week with them.

Movies. Bill had a craving for a new movie. Bill went to the movie theatre. Bill was given a list of movies he wanted to see. Bill selected the ones he wanted to see. Bill then waited patiently in line for the movie.

amnesia. Tim was at school and his friend said he heard noises. Tim had no idea what it was. He was scared but knew to listen to his friend. He asked if they had heard a sound, but his friend told him it was a spider. Tim took his friend to the vet and they were both relieved.

Getting Ears Pierced. My wife and I went to a seafood restaurant. She ordered the salmon burger, steak, and fish. I ordered the fries. While I was eating the fish, the restaurant's manager came in. We all got pepperoni and the fish fries.

Total heat stroke. I went to the doctor yesterday for a heatstroke. The doctor told me that I was too short to sit in the chair. The doctor told me that my wrists were hurt by the head of the chair. The doctor said that I need to sit more upright in order to feel better. I went to the doctor who said that I can sit in the chair now.

To the Beach. Kate and Amy were going to the beach. Amy wanted to go swimming. But they were too small to board the boat. The weatherman told them they couldn't swim there. Kate and Amy ended up in the ocean with no way to board the boat.
The Hair Band. Amber's dad was at the grocery store. He asked her how her hair looked. He said she had it in her hands. He went to buy the band. They looked great.

Army Recruit. Jake was a recruiter for a local college. He was a tall, white man who had a long brown beard. One day he went to meet a new recruit. Jake was impressed by the new man. Jake was able to get a job in the Army after meeting the new recruit.

Graphing Calculator. Mason looked at his GPS in the car. He had taken it out of the car to put it in the car. After driving it he checked for his GPS. The car was traveling at full speed. He had forgotten to turn the GPS to turn it on.
Tail. Sammy liked her new bathing suit. She loved the way it fit her. Sammy couldn't find a fitting size. She looked on craigslist. Then she found the right fit for her.

Road Trip. Bobby was nervous about going to school. He had to make the difficult decision to drive to school. His parents promised he would be able to get on the bus. After a few hours of studying, Bobby got on the bus. He made the bus ride to school on time and was very happy.

The Paper. My school has a paper due in 3 days. I need to buy a paper and take it to work. I am going to the bookstore to get the paper. When I get there, I need to check my mail. I need to return the paper.

The old town visit. Sam and Jake took a trip to Old Town England. It had been a wonderful year for them to visit the local historical sites. They spent a lot of time exploring the great history and setting up camp. Once they arrived at the old ruins, they spent a long time relaxing. The two enjoyed visiting the history and seeing the sights.

In Trouble. It was a hot summer afternoon. Cara was going to be a swimmer. Her mom wanted to know how she would make the most of it. Cara was a bit nervous about answering the question. When she went to ask her mom about it, she gave a very happy face.

The Goat. I love looking at the large green eyes. One day while hiking I lost a goat. The goat looked and acted strange. I took him home but could not find the goat. I asked friends who knew of other goat sightings.

Ferns. Bob's dog Fern was being attacked by a squirrel. The squirrel had grown fat and died from rabies. Bob's wife took Fern to the vet. The vet told Bob that he had fleas. Bob's wife decided to take Fern home after the vet was done.

Siblings. I moved to the city with my parents. I was excited for my new friend's first date. When my cousin showed up, she was my best friend. Her name was Sally, not Sue. It was a big bump for my new friend.

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex woke up late one night to a loud noise. It was the sound of a cat. He went to look for the cat but the cat was nowhere to be found. Rex called animal control and they said Rex was at the shelter alone. Rex and the cat finally found a relative at the shelter.
Camping. Tom was going camping one day. He took a long hike up a mountain. Unfortunately the sun hit. The temperature of the air dropped. It burned Tom's tent badly.
The Game. The boy was playing with his dog. His dog chewed on the game. It became too full of gum. The boy ran away from the bully. The bully caught him.
The Pistol. I bought a pistol at the store. I bought a few more rounds. I used the magazines. The pistol fell apart. I ended up having to buy another one.

Leaf Collector. My dad was always very good at getting the lemons for us. One day, I got him out of the yard one day. I opened a box of lemons for him. He ate all of them. Now he brings me fresh lemons.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank had a crush on a girl at school named Bethany. Bethany was his favorite girl. Frank was the best student at his school and liked his teacher. However Frank was also too shy to ask her out. He secretly became friends with a girl at school the next day.

Driving School. Tim had to take a driving class at a community college. He was nervous because he was only in his thirties. He was very confident. It took him an hour to prepare. Unfortunately, it took him an hour to go to class.

Haircut. Jared looked around his living room with disapproval. His roommates were making fun of him for his hair. Jared put a picture on Instagram to make fun of his roommates. Jared posted the photo and shared it. The other roommates immediately started getting nasty and mocked Jared.

Limitless Embarrassment. Sara decided to enter the beach in her bathing suit. She tried to stand up and swim away from the water. The water splashed her hands and body with watery and sticky white stuff. Sara decided to stop and change into her bathing suit. Now she always has to put in a dress when swimming.

Food Challenge. Gina was at the supermarket. She didn't have any money to buy food. Suddenly, she noticed a vending machine with no cash. She called her mom. Her mom accepted her order from the vending machine.
Mountains. The family was hiking through the mountains. Suddenly a small bird came running up. It was a tiny yellow bird. It was carrying a large container. The family got out and made a big snack.

Unknown Fees. Bob needed to buy groceries at the grocery store. He tried to use his debit card but it was declined. The store had a low cash balance. Bob used his debit card instead of the credit card. He was able to pay with the credit card and save money.
Bird. Randy's friend got a dog. It loved to fly around and chase after its cage. Randy's friend got rid of the bird. Randy's friend was very disappointed. He learned to feed his dog better.

Candles. Lucy loved the smell of candles. She picked up a bottle of candles at the store. She looked for a place to put them. There was one store that had no candles. Lucy couldn't find anything but candles.
Figure Skating. Tom was walking down the street. He saw a figure skater on the street. Tom turned around. He fell on the ice and fell on his face. Tom got up and tried to get back on the ice.

Restaurant. I visited a local diner to get lunch. When I arrived I was happy to find it empty! The diner was closed. I decided to order a sandwich at the restaurant instead. I ended up loving it for the entire meal!

Last Minute Decision. Gina didn't like getting yelled at about her mom's big brother's birthday. But she wasn't about to give it up. She was just curious as she took her seat at the table. When the phone rang, it was her mom. Gina was so relieved that she wouldn't have to be asked again.

The Quota. Sara had a very important work paper due. Her teacher said he would bring her a note. She got in trouble for spilling coffee in a cup. Sara was so worried about her work that she left the paper in her desk. Luckily she was able to return it in time for class.

Arrested. Mitch was driving home when he got pulled over. He asked a stranger to get him a ride. The stranger obliged, and Mitch realized he was drunk. Mitch had to pull over to the side of the road. After being arrested, Mitch was able to walk back home.

Pixy. Tommy always wanted to be a photographer. He wanted to give his family a home and studio to do their portraits. One day his dad got tired of trying to get him to go out to shoot. Tommy told his dad and they spent all night setting up a studio. Tommy had a great time on his new camera, and was very thankful.

Presentation. Sam had an important presentation due on the next week. It was a presentation he had to give. Sam spent all of his time preparing. After it was done, he felt better. He felt excited to hear it was due.

Adoption. Susie was in the mood to get a puppy. She asked a local breeder about a puppy to purchase. The breeder said they needed an old puppy that she didn't know. Susie went to the pound to get a puppy. Susie got her new puppy.

Sign Language. The man wrote an ad for an advertisement in a local newspaper. The paper asked him to spell it out for the ad. The man wrote a few letters in front of the paper. The paper asked him to spell it out for each other. The man then had to spell it out for his ads.

Going Fishing. Garrett decided he needed a break from his daily life. He decided to go fishing one day. He started the line and then went to his hook. While fishing he caught a large fish. He vowed to always go fishing in the future.

Parking Spot. Barry was going to the park today. He parked in the park and saw a lot of cars. The cars started honking their horns. Barry realized the car he was honking at had the wrong license plate. Barry was told the car's owner could pick him up as soon as he paid.

Burned cookies. Alicia was at a bakery with her family. As she was getting to the checkout line, she noticed that the bread was burnt. Her husband suggested they burn some cookies instead of the cash register. Alicia put her cookie away and walked back to the bakery. Luckily, they were able to get some cookies on sale.

Risk. Gina hadn't made the school bus since her sister got home late. Her mother told her she'd be late again. Gina was really worried about making the bus to school. But thankfully she had to go to school anyway. She had a wonderful first day.

Front step trout. Tim had just finished an indoor fishing lesson. He had to catch a lot of back up. Tim had never tried the new line he wanted. He tried the new line just as he was about to get caught. When Tim was done the line was much better.

Hillary is determined. Bill has been working hard in his job. This past week he decided to get a promotion. Bill knew his boss was concerned. Bill got the call on the phone from a close friend. Bill felt his boss's love for him.
Purse envy. It was a hot summer day. I went to the grocery store. I got a large package. It was a really big gift! I couldn't wait to open it.

The Catch. My friend and I played Catch and Go to the river. We got stuck on our paddle, losing a big fish. We couldn't go back. We decided to play catch and take a picture. Everyone had fun catching fish.

teacher affair. Tim was supposed to teach English at his local college. He got too involved and forgot to ask the teacher. The teacher came back and demanded that Tim quit. Tim felt so bad, he started to cry. He apologized to the teacher and they both gave in.

Cowboy Doll. Jack is a little bit old and doesn't like dolls. He decided to give his girlfriend a cowboy doll. He put the doll in her room. She screamed and said that her dad's favorite toy is a cow. Jack is happy with his new doll.

Fish. My husband ordered a fish dish from the store. The item was very expensive so I gave it to him. He bought it anyway because he forgot to take it home. It tasted amazing. He took it home and thanked me for it.
Wet Ending. The boys were playing in the house. All of a sudden it started to rain. My wife and I were so excited. Luckily we saved up and got a new cooler. We used it when it was still raining.
Gravy. Mandy was making gravy. Her husband loved gravy. They made gravy together. They served it to their guests. It was delicious!

Baby. John and his son, Joe, wanted to have a baby. John thought a baby was too small for their family. John went to the doctor and had the baby boy. John told the doctor how small his son was. The doctor took the baby to the doctor and diagnosed him with breast cancer.

The Eyesore. Kia's teacher told her class to sit down on the bench next to the table. Kia did not want to sit on the bench so she put her eyes open. When her teacher was on the bench, Kia cried with joy. Then, Kia's teacher told her to put her eyes away. Kia's eyes fell closed, and Kia did not have the eyesore.

The Thief. There once was a man who stole a few quarters. The thieves would steal every dime that they could find. This man became famous because he went to the coin fair and stole a lot of coins. One day the man got tired and stole so much coins, he sold it all. Luckily, the man's family caught him and caught him eventually.

Walking to school. Alicia had to walk to school. She had to walk to the entrance of the school. Alicia was frustrated because she had to walk so far. As Alicia walked in the door, she tripped on some bricks. Alicia had to walk again.

Jumping. Tom had just taken out the trash when his girlfriend went for a jog. Tom was running really fast and began to run. Tom suddenly felt a sharp pain in his leg. He went into the restroom and immediately had a look. It turned out he had a sore leg.

The Shopping Cart. Jack was trying to get groceries in his car. The car was very dirty and had to be hauled. After being picked, he called for a cart. When the car was full he decided to go to Walmart. Jack was able to buy all the groceries he needed.

New iPad winning. John is an avid gamer. His favorite game of the year is Super Mario Brothers. He won at least 3 million dollars in a few days. His friend showed up to buy him a new iPad. John happily received it.
The Pizza. Jim got a new car. He thought the car looked good. The car was very old. It needed a lot of work. Jim decided to get it repaired.

Sparklers. The girls went for a walk in the park. They discovered a strange flower bush. They stopped at a few petals for some petals. They took a nap on the bush. The girls were glad they had spent time outdoors.

Classic car. Tom bought a new car from the dealership. He was nervous to get it because he was very old. But when he finally went on sale it was a classic. He got everything on sale. Tom was glad he finally bought the classic car.
The Game. Jill really liked to play games. But she had no money to play with her friends. Finally her mom took her to a game store. They gave Jill free games for a week. Jill loved playing games.
Clara's Algebra. Clara went to the library to study algebra. She tried the textbook. Unfortunately, it was out of order. Clara then looked at the page online for help. She finally settled on a paper.

Getting Mugged. Jack's friend was out playing in the park. They were in a lot of trouble. Jack and the other guys were being mugged. Jack and the other guys decided to run. They got caught and taken to the park.

Cleaning Windows. Jane decided to clean her living room. She started by removing the wallpaper. Once she was done, she wiped the floor. Afterwards, she scrubbed the floors. Jane was very satisfied with her clean living room.
Milk. Benny went out with his girlfriend. He drank all the milk he got. But soon he realized he forgot some of his milk! His friend got him a small box. Then Benny bought himself some milk!

What the Earthquake Made. A tornado had destroyed three houses. They looked for a new home. They found a vacant vacant lot. They called the government. They told the authorities that the house was saved.

Torn Socks. Jane had a very big box. It was a nice box with lots of socks. Jane went to the store and bought several new socks. Jane was able to fit into the box easily. Jane was glad to have a large box to wear socks everywhere.

The new friend. I was at a party and my friends invited me to a concert. We were playing some metal in a house and it started getting dark. I realized I would have to walk to get to the concert and hide. The concert was late and I didn't know where to start. I decided to just wait until the concert to leave.
Hangover. It was going to be snowing. I grabbed the pack from my pocket. When I walked outside, it was too cold. I walked into the snow. I put the snow on my head.
Beat the game. The boys were playing a game. They had been playing for about an hour. They were almost down and losing. They decided to make a plan. They all practiced all day.

Home. Bob was visiting his grandmother's farm. He had a lot of pictures taken of them. Bob was in awe of his wonderful scenery. He decided he would take a picture of it. Bob had a great time exploring the pictures.
Frozen Pizza. Tom had made frozen pizza for dinner. He made it for himself. He added the ingredients to the pizza. It was perfect. Tom enjoyed his meal.

High Blood Pressure. John's heart stopped beating. It was unbearable. John went to the doctor. The doctor prescribed him a blood pressure monitor. John felt much better after the monitor was worn out.

Yoga. I tried to do yoga everyday for a year. I felt like a failure but then my yoga instructor said I could. It was hard work and we didn't meet the guidelines. I ended up doing very poorly. I learned to do something I wanted and felt great afterwards.

The Dog Race. It was a cold day and Charles was scared. He was so tired he couldn't see his dog. He decided to run for his life to make sure he wasn't in a puddle. He jumped on a car and ran into a fence. Charles' dog didn't know the distance and the car died.

New Television. I was looking for a new television for my birthday. I looked everywhere online but couldn't find anything. I finally looked and decided to go to the local Apple store. They have a lot of different models for you to choose from. I bought a TV and immediately ordered one online.

Apple Tree. Gina decided to plant a tree outside her house. The trees had been in the sun all winter. She hoped for the best, but the heat was a problem. But they had been dying for days. So she was relieved to find she'd made some great, safe progress!

Slurpee. Tim was a bad eater and hated his food. He was going to a hamburger place. The waiter brought Tim a burger. Tim's burger was delicious. Tim left and vowed never to again eat the hamburger place.
Fun Times. Last Sunday I went to the park. I was at the park for three days. I saw a lot of kids and rode roller coasters. I made lots of new friends. I wish I could go back there again.

Video Games. Jason had recently joined a club. He was unsure about what to do with his money. He went down the social media channels to ask his friends to buy him games. He began getting more and more interested in video games. The club closed down and Jason realized he didn't need a job.

Cartwheel. Jane had a cartwheel that she used to ride around the yard. When she was a little girl she would go on rides with her cartwheel. The children did not like it. Jane got in trouble for not riding the cartwheel with her family. Jane decided not to ride around her in that cartwheel.

Food. Bob needed to eat more food. He went to the supermarket to buy some food. Bob was surprised at the large amount of food he got. He realized he didn't have enough money to buy a salad. Bob went home and ate a salad instead.

Race to victory. Gretchen was an avid runner. She trained every day for weeks and weeks. But she couldn't beat her rival. She knew her weakness and decided to give it a shot. After finishing second place, she felt better than she had at the end of the race.

Chinese Food. Tom was eating a dinner he saw in the paper. He noticed that it was Chinese. He asked his friends if they wanted to try it. His friends said they could and he gave them a try. Tom was very satisfied with his decision to eat it.
Orchard. Karen loved apples. She planted many asparagus. She made a pot. She watered it every day. When she went back to pick her new fruit, it smelled better!

Turtle Encounter. My cousins and I went to a reptile attraction on the weekend. We sat at the long table and ordered a few bites. While we ate one bite, a huge yellow turtle moved in front of us. I saw the turtle and took him home. We were surprised by how big the turtle was and scared him.

Fire. One day, a little boy accidentally dropped a balloon at school. The boy's parents made an appointment. The parents went to the doctor to see what was wrong. The doctor found out that the balloon was burned in the fire. The boy's parents paid for a repair.

New Phone. Tim was trying to find his old cell phone. He tried many different apps, but he couldn't find it. Tim decided to check and see if there was anything else online. He finally remembered his old phone. He had a new cell phone and loved it.

Animal Instinct. Tiffany loved her baby kitten. Tiffany kept her kitten as a pet. She kept it in a box with other kittens. She thought her dog was a cat. Tiffany kept the kitten as a pet for 20 Year's.

The Celery. Sally had just gotten a new fridge and was excited to try it. She didn't know what to expect from a large container. She was going to have to try a few things. After putting the things in they were very light. Sally was disappointed but not impressed.

Bishop. My brother was visiting the South End of Boston. He had a presentation due and I was anxious to meet him. I got in my car to go over the presentation. After finishing the presentation, I had a great time. He told me he is so happy that I attended.

Jimmy Races. Jimmy is very excited to try out for his school's track team. He is the lead racer on the team. Jimmy's team starts training every day. Jimmy practices everyday. Jimmy takes the next two weeks off of training.

Playing in a Band. My friend and I play our trumpet in a band at a local park. The park has a free band tent and can play in the summer. My friend's friend was the drummer. We play on a rainy night afternoons. We played a lot at the park this fall.

Spaghetti. Jenna loved spaghetti. She was allergic to it. She decided to take a shower and change up her diet. She didn't eat anything that tasted so good. In the end, she was happy with her decision.

Coming Out. Tom and Jim were newly single after years of trying. They decided to have a girl in their life. They decided to try and break up. Tom and Jim ended up with a breakup. Tom and Jim will be seeing a therapist soon.
Dylan's new car. Dylan needed a new car. His father said no. So he drove to his uncle's house. He bought him a new car. Dylan was able to finally enjoy himself.

New App Department. It was the end of a great summer vacation. I decided to take a business trip to my favorite place. I got to the terminal and found out my office was closed. I called the tech support to complain and got a quote. I was glad they fixed the office, which was fun.
Bob and the Donkey. Bob loved to go outside. Bob loved to eat some fresh vegetables. One day his car broke down. Bob went outside. He was trapped with the other kids.

Tail rider. Liza got a tattoo in the summer of 2005. She has been very sad lately. She felt sad about her tattoo because she felt so sad. Liza decided that she would cut her head. Liza is sad and sad because the tattoo was done wrong.

Lost charge. Tommy was running late for school. He had forgotten his phone. Tommy's friend said he should call a cell phone company. Tommy called his friend to find out what they were up to. His friend helped him call the company.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca was trying to take her children outside. The kids were out playing on the grass. One of them got stuck in the fence! Becca picked her son up and carried him outside. She put him back inside and let him play outside.

Science Dissection. Tom was working on a paper about solar power. He decided to use his own research tools to dissect the solar panels. They were very complicated to make, but Tom enjoyed the work. After a while, he had made some pretty good ideas! He was very proud to have done his research.

A Hot Day. I was sweating when I went to the bathroom. I was sweating even though I was running late for work. I went out of my way to try and cool down. I took a few hot jugs of coffee to help me feel cool. I made sure to try again that evening.

Robot Fighting. Sasha was a computer programmer for the school's computer science department. She had worked on a big game for six years and needed to get it ready. Knitting. I decided to knit a blanket for my dog. It was too cold for me so I went to the store and bought a box. I knit my blanket with a large, fluffy white board. My dog liked it so much that he decided to purchase it. He gave it to me when he woke up to a big smile.

Large water slide. Kia decided to take her friends on a slide at the beach. But when they arrived, it was really small. They had no way of knowing where it went. Kia had to call an ambulance. Luckily, she had a friend that was able to fix it.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. My sister in law brought home a new cat. The cat is small and very playful. I told her we have to be careful not to touch the treats. She was very upset and I didn't say anything. Then she got to the treats and started crying.

Jane and Cat. Jane needed a new cat for her house. She had never seen one before and she finally decided to try one. She went to the store and found a very pretty cat. Jane and the cat loved each other so much she didn't have to buy another. They got along well and Jane had a great house.

Surfing Scare. I had just finished going down a hill one day. I noticed that I was starting to feel a sharp pain in my back. I thought I had a concussion. The pain in my back was too bad to be fixed. I went to the Doctor and they told me it was the result of a broken spine.

Girl Friend. I was in high school and my crush was out of town. She said she wanted to meet me at the park. I was too scared to ask her out. The next day I told her. She was upset because I didn't ask her.
Chatty Kathy. Kathy had a problem with texting. She had a problem with it. Kathy asked the lady for help. The lady helped her understand a little bit. Kathy made it through a lot easier.
Scuffed. My mom was putting me in my room. I was playing with a stuffed bear. I realized I was in a good mood. I went to get some food. The bear was stuffed.

Slow Internet. A man was trying to access the internet online. He looked through his internet to find a good router. When he was done he noticed a problem. The router had been delayed for several days. The man decided to call his router provider and order a replacement.

Baseball Slide. Molly was playing in a local park. She fell down a slide and hurt her ankle. The other parkers came running for her. The parkers pulled Molly up and told her she got the ball. Molly then walked to the park and played a few swings.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester wanted to take a break from his routine. He decided to walk around the playground with a cane. He pushed a small rock and tried to pull it back. He stumbled back, but he was okay. He had an exciting afternoon of jumping rope!

Peanut. Lulu hated to eat peanut butter. She tried to resist it, but the nut did not work. Lulu started to cry every time she ate the peanut butter. She also learned that peanut butter was not for the faint of heart! Lulu was glad that she was no longer tempted to eat peanut butter.

Water Skiing. The kids were excited when the weather finally got cooler. There was only two hours left in the day, and they were going to snow. Angkor Wat. Angkor Wat was the only martial artist in his class. Angkor Wat practiced his moves as much as possible for hours a day. Angkor Wat was eventually disqualified from the competition.

Worse Than Before. Jim went to the store one day to buy a new video game. However, he forgot that his computer stopped working. He decided to use his computer instead. He was disappointed in the computer. The computer worked fine and he bought the video game.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio has been out of work for almost two months. Horatio decides to go back to his old job. Horatio works at the local coffee shop. Horatio is surprised at how fast his company can grow. Horatio is proud that he is no longer unemployed.
The Cookie Burn. Jane was baking cookies. Her mother told her to do so. Jane began to burn her cookies. Her mother stopped her and took her to the emergency room. Jane was able to clean up the mess.

Construction Workers. John and his construction workers were having a hard time finishing a building. The construction workers said they were having problems working on the roof. One worker complained about being burned on the back. Another complained about the lack of water. John felt sad that it was a construction project and asked for help.
Borrowed Money. Tom had borrowed a lot of money from his neighbor. He decided to keep it. He looked it up online. He found that he owed money. Tom returned the money.

Scuba Diving. Rita loved the water and sea life. So when she took the ocean, she wanted to go. But she didn't have much experience. So Rita had to stay home and try out the water. And she was really proud of herself!
Preacher. Joe was not a bad student. Joe decided to enroll in a middle school. Joe enrolled in a high school for two Year's. Joe found a tutor who helped him out. Joe took good care of his grades.

The evil dad. Jason had gotten into his car and wanted to get into the garage. He put on his headlights and drove to his house. He opened the garage door and heard the loud banging. The man outside yelled at him. Jason decided to just leave.

sad news. Allie had been working at her job for over a year. She was nervous about making an appointment with her manager. It had been a long night but the manager had promised her an appointment. Allie was not happy. She decided not to go with him.
College. Kate had a biology test tomorrow. She really wanted to do well on her test. She studied very hard. She got a good grade. Kate was excited to get to go to college!

Punishment. Jim was in the military. One day he was spotted being interrogated by the FBI. He decided to try to tell them what happened. They told Jim he couldn't be held responsible for anything. Jim was sent home and never told.

Skip almost drowns. Skip was swimming in the water when he saw a large fish. He swam back to his car and hopped to get the fish. Skip wasn't very fast, but he almost did when he got out of the water. The fish swam away, and Skip was amazed at how fast it was. Skip didn't realize that he was in the water forever.
Dog. My dog was named Kitten. Kitten liked to play outside. Kitten would get outside to pee. Sometimes my dog would run out of the shed. Kitten would never poop inside of my shed.

A big hike. Tom's friend Beth wanted to go hiking. Tom did not have any money for his friend's lunch. Tom made an account at his favorite restaurant. Beth found a great deal for a drink. Tom decided to go hiking and enjoyed his meal.
Ice Cream Day. Bob bought a new car. He took it to the car show and he got autographs. Then, he drove home. His dad greeted him with a big smile. He said his new car was a special occasion.

I love her too. When we were kids, I wanted to be a musician. I was going to be an instructor for my own band. I decided that I should take lessons. I studied hard and did the best I could. I became very good and popular in the band.

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff loved to swim. Jeff asked his friend if he could swim. Jeff told his friend that he loved the water. His friend asked him if he liked the water. Jeff said he did not and that he loved it.

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Maurice loved cheese. One day, he decided to make his own Swiss cheese. First, he made a little bit of it. Then, he added in the cheese to the top. He was happy that his Swiss cheese was delicious.

Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. Mira was a small but devoted Catholic who was always careful to avoid any criticism. Her faith in God made her love for all things very serious. For her senior year of high school she prayed for a miracle on the altar. A priest who had seen her prayed for a miracle for her on the morning of the wedding. That day Mara swore to never let her go without a prayer for God.

Tara's Hat. Tara was going to her friend's wedding. She had a great hat. It was blue but it was in her favorite color. She was afraid she would be embarrassed if she wore it out. But thankfully the day came and it was not that bad.

Recycled Cans. Kim was washing dishes when her dog ran out of cans. She was too lazy to throw the cans away. The dog ended up running into the kitchen when Kim left. Kim looked in all the canning bins, but no cans. Kim had to call animal services to get her cans out.

Cake. When I was a little kid, my dad always had to bake me a cake. One day, he put a little plastic cake on the top of the cake. I wanted to eat the cake, but I was not a fan. I decided to have my brother give me a cake. I thought it was a great treat!

Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake had been hiking all afternoon. Jake's mom gave him a towel to use for protection. Jake used the towel as a quick-release handle. Jake fell off the ladder to get up the ladder. Jake was ok until he started shaking.
Slide. Jill was trying to slide. Her legs were shaking from her fall. She began to try to get up from the ground. Then she fell and slipped. Jill was paralyzed and broke her leg from the fall!

Grocery Games. Lara and her friend were having fun at the store. Suddenly, she saw something shiny and strange. There was a weird looking doll in the store! They immediately ran to pick it up. They returned the doll and her friend took it home.

Track and Field Star. Larry always wanted to play baseball. But he was so poor, he couldn't afford any team tickets. He tried out for his high school track team but couldn't make the team. Larry was finally able to buy his ticket for his birthday. Larry was very happy to play baseball for his friends and family.

Officer Helps. Tim was being heckled at the school. Tim's friends had already called the cops. Tim didn't see anything wrong until it was too late. Tim was pulled over by the cop. He was then arrested.
Sharing. Diane moved out of her house. She needed to find a new place. Diane went to the mall. She searched online. Diane found a great place to live.
wallet. Tom was on a tight budget. Tom decided to use his old wallet. Unfortunately it was late. Tom had to wait for a while to get it fixed. Eventually Tom paid a lot of money back.

Roller Coaster. I rode my bike down a hill on a sunny day. The roads were a lot of twisting, and a lot of sliding. I kept sliding into the road before it came to a stop. I stopped for help and a guy gave me a ride back. After that I never felt unsafe riding my bike again.
The water on the books. Gina was walking through the park. Her dog ran into the woods. The dog got soaked. She decided to go outside. The next day the dog ran into the creek.

Christmas Shopping. Anna was going to take her family Christmas shopping for the year. She bought all of the presents she could find. At the store, Anna noticed a lot of different styles. She decided to see what she liked best. Anna ended up buying a lot of items for the year.

Dave goes fishing. Dave went to the lake to fish. He waited till the sun went down. When it came back he went back to his fishing boat. Dave set up his fishing pole. Dave was happy he had a fish to play with.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick's boss let him know that he was going to be late. Rick's boss had been rude at the office. Rick stayed up all night. When Rick woke up the next day, he was so sick. Rick quit his job and became a millionaire!

Faker. Jim's girlfriend wanted to adopt a dog. Jim was an orphan, so he had to get help. He hired an adoption agency. They helped him adopt a small dog. Jim is very happy that he found a good home for his new dog.
Cookies. Amy was getting ready for dinner. She didn't realize the cookies were still fresh. She had forgotten to bring the oven. Amy was very embarrassed. She got a surprise after the meal.
Stage. Tom needed to finish his science project. But he couldn't afford a ticket. So he had to ask the salesman. The salesman told Tom to get one. Tom had to go to the store to get one!

Great American Story. I read a terrific American novel for the first time last night. I did not know if it was good or not, but I found it interesting. The author was very talented and had a lot of interesting characters. I felt very happy and excited about the new novel. I will recommend this novel to others.

Soapmaking Disaster. Molly decided she was going to make soap at home. She found a recipe for how to make soap. The instructions were simple and explained. Once the soap was mixed up, Molly poured some in. She did not realize how to make her soap until it was ready.
Bacteria. I was walking in the living room. I got into an argument with a neighbor. The argument started at two in the morning. The neighbor started to pick on me. The neighbor threw up on me.

Eyebrow pulling. The kids were watching TV when a huge bang rang out. A huge boy screamed for a hairball. All the kids ran in fear. Then they noticed an adorable mouse. The mouse loved to chase after their hairballs!
New Bag. Tim was excited to get his new bag. The bag was all new and shiny. It took him a while to unwrap it. Once it was done, Tim took a swig. He was so happy to finally have his new bag.

Choose. Tim was in the military. He got a promotion and decided to go on a promotion tour. They played for a few days. Tim was excited to get a promotion. They played a few rounds together.

Ladoo. Tom and John's parents were going to Las Vegas. They wanted to take their kids to the casino. They booked a table at the Las Vegas roulette table. The first hour was spent watching the roulette table. They enjoyed it and were excited to play it again!
