Classroom. The class was about to start. I sat at my desk and waited for the first girl to speak. I waited for her to finish her lesson. I did not think she would speak. I was angry at myself for wasting the class time.

Katie Courier. Katie wanted to be a photographer but wasn't very good at it. She decided to get a camera and go to school. She practiced shooting photos from all of her classes. She made great friends there and did her best to get better. Katie's photography skills were very valuable to her future career.
Stamp collector. Tom needed a stamp. He didn't have any stamps. Tom bought a stamp online. He was able to get it. Tom had a great time collecting stamps.
Loud Snoring. Lily's mom woke her up early in the morning. Lily wasn't tired after her nap. Her mother walked out of the room to her. Lily began to cry. Her mom found out and stopped talking to her.

Tavon. It was the end of summer vacation time. Jill wanted to go to the beach. Jill bought a tv and decided to ride a sailboat. Jill was happy to be spending so much time on the water. Jill loved going to the beach.

Karate Class. One day I went to karate classes. As we were going through the karate class, I did a bad job. As soon as I sat down, my opponent began running after me. He was faster than me so I kept going after him. After I was in the zone, I got beat and was kicked out of the karate class.
The concert. Derek was going to the concert. He had never been to a concert before. He had never been to a concert before. He had never been to a concert before. He was excited to see it.

Piano. I used to love playing a very pretty piano. It was my favorite instrument of all time. One day I played with a very pretty woman. I felt so sad and sad. I told her I would never play with her again.

Fundraising. I started a fundraising page this week to raise money. I plan on going out and raising as much money as I can. On the day of the election I received the fundraising invitation. I was excited to see how much money would be raised. When the election results were posted I received a response saying my donation was successful.

Money gambling. Alicia was trying to find money for her kids. She decided to use the money on a card game. The card game made her very bored. She went to a casino to gamble money. When she won she was very rich!
Happy ending. Tom and his friend Ben were at a concert. Tom's friend asked if Tom wanted to go. Tom said he could. Tom was happy. He went and enjoyed the concert.
Soda. Sam wanted to save some money. He found a good deal on a drink. The drink was delicious. Sam was able to save some money. Sam ended up spending a lot more money on soda.

Delivery. Tina needed a new car for the summer. Her friend recommended she go to her local auto store. Tina was surprised to find a beautiful car for less than half her price! She picked out the car, drove it home, and enjoyed it. Tina then decided to buy another one from a different dealership.

Ants. When they got home from the beach, they ran outside to see a storm. But they could not see the sun. So they just stared in awe. They looked in the trees and wondered what it was. They heard a sound and went inside and slept soundly.
Forgetful Bob. Bob was driving home from work. He had to wait in the back seat for his shift. Bob heard the alarm. Bob went back to his car. Bob had forgotten his key.

New Hair. Rosa was trying to get her hair done. She went to the salon to see if anyone was around. When she walked in, she got a very bad cut. Rosa had to go home and brush her hair all day. After that, Rosa went to the salon to get a new haircut.
Eggs. I had been cooking eggs all day. But I didn't have any. I decided to eat more. And I ate them anyway. I was so happy.

Surprise at school. Kylie had never been on a school bus before. The bus arrived at school about fifteen minutes before her class started. Kylie had to get to her class because her seat was out of order. She was embarrassed by the wait. The teacher said they would fix it up later.

Fruit. Ralph had picked strawberries for breakfast. He placed them in a tray to make some. Ralph tried to pick some up and pick one up. He accidentally dropped one on the floor. Ralph ate the whole lunch.

Bank. Nathan was unemployed for the second time in weeks. He tried to contact his friend to find his way to unemployment. Unfortunately, he lost his job and had to do a lot of work to survive. Luckily, his friend told him he was welcome to work. Nathan's friend took him out for a beer afterwards and had a great day.

Desk Builder. Kenny had a large desk to work on. He had a very large hard drive for the desk. Kenny had to get rid of it and use his new one. Kenny put in all the parts he could find and replaced the hard drive. Kenny's hard drive was much easier to use, he felt proud of himself.
Doctor. My 98 year old neighbor got a letter. The letter said the doctor could be in the country. I knew he needed to visit him. He visited me in hospital a few times. He was very happy.

Arcade night. Sam was at the arcade with his friends. He played a huge collection of games. But he was tired and didn't like going. He decided to go home and play a few more games. He played for a while, and got to work the next day.

Vegan. When she grew up her grandmother always made veggie lasagna. She loved the vegetables so much, she wanted to try something new. So she went to a local Italian restaurant and bought all the ingredients she needed. The food she prepared looked really good! Now her grandmother does not have to make lasagna anymore.

Big Deal. Nate wanted to be a professional actor. He looked up videos of different roles. He began to audition for a local school play. At the audition, his voice was terrible. He went home and started the audition!
Night Terrors. Tom lived in an area that was very dark. Tom often woke up early. Tom would find that he wouldn't get any light in his area. He would turn on the light. It was very annoying for him.

Yummy almonds. My friends and I made some almond butter. We each bought some almonds. We added them to the almonds. Then we put the almonds in the oven. The almonds tasted better than they ever have in a pan.

Deep Cut. I was walking home from school one day. I ran to the edge of the street to turn around. I noticed a large tree branch branch cut across my walkway. I was very angry and screamed. Luckily, a neighbor noticed and pulled me out.
Tow Truck. Sophie decided to go camping in her backyard. She rented a trailer for $10,000. After she went out to the woods she got sick. She had to use an emergency tent. The tent was very expensive.

Hidden Keys. The boy and his friend were playing a game. Suddenly, the board went black. They ran inside the basement. They couldn't find their hiding places. They were so disappointed they called the cops.

Bills big idea. Jody and her friends were bored one day. They wanted to play with a cool idea for an app. They decided to build a fun new app. It was great, but so was the game! The two of them were so inspired they went and built an app!

Online Dating. Ava has been dating a boy for six months. They met for coffee one afternoon. He told her he is very excited and wants to get married. She was able to catch him off guard and she was very happy. He asked her on numerous dates and she said yes!

The kitty finds a home. Tia was taking a nap in her room. The kitten didn't notice her. Tia began to cry. Suddenly, the kitten found a place for her in the yard. Tia was relieved to have found a home for the kitten.
Lamb. Tom was cooking lamb for dinner. It smelled good so he bought a bag of lamb. When it was done he smelled good. Tom went back home. It was delicious!

Amazing sunglasses. I was at the mall one day when I noticed a beautiful pair of sunglasses. I couldn't believe how pretty they looked! It was amazing to me. After wearing the sunglasses, I knew they had some meaning. I was very pleased with the purchase!
Sick Day. I was feeling very sick in the morning. I was rushed to the hospital with a cough. I felt ill throughout the day. I had a fever and was very tired. I decided to get a massage.

Jenny's Accident. Jenny was driving home from work. She was on the highway when she hit a patch of grass. She fell and her car spun out of control. Luckily her windshield had not broken. Jenny paid for it and was fine afterwards.

The Genius Was The Intern. I am an internet engineer. I recently started my own internet company. A lot of the staff was very good. So I came to know the intern as a genius. Now I am really enjoying working with him.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky was a big dog. He loved to play fetch with other dogs. One day Sparky took a bite of a shiny fish and threw it. Sparky cried all the way to his room. His friends made fun of Sparky for taking a bite.

Snitch. Sandy was eating breakfast at a restaurant. She got up to eat but her snickers were coming out of her mouth. She didn't want to eat any of the food at the restaurant. Sandy pulled out the sandwich and felt it in her stomach. Sandy had gotten an infection in her snickers!
Radio. I bought an old CD player. I played it with my friends. The speakers sounded terrible. I had to return it. I just bought a new one.

Teacher, Teacher. A class of students had to get the school their teacher's badge. But the teacher had no badge and looked like a boy. The students all had to sign up for a tutor program. The teacher gave each student their badge and signed them up. They had a great time at school after the teacher gave their badge.

A piece of italy. Tim had to write a story. He didn't know what to write. His mom made him write in his head. It took Tim days to figure it out. His mom finally figured it out and Tim loved the story.

Personal space. Toby was getting ready to move into his new home. He could not find the proper place to put the furniture. He asked his neighbor for help in his area. He finally found the perfect place. He couldn't wait to move in as soon as he got home.

Wild Concert. Amy was excited about her first concert. It was a folk-rock band. When Amy got there, she thought they sounded great. She had a great time. Amy and her friends decided they loved the band.

New Business. When I was in elementary school, I was offered a job in the city. I accepted the offer, but I thought it was too hard. I went back to school and stayed in town for a year. After a year, I realized how hard it was. I ended up quitting my job and moving to Austin.

Spaghetti. Kate wanted to try some pasta. She got all of her friends together to try it. But it was not as good as she had hoped. She went to a different place that had pasta. Then she saw that it tasted better!

The Railing. I was playing in the yard yesterday. I started to run down the street. Suddenly, a person came up and knocked me down. I started crying and asked him what happened. He told me to get out and just play.

Boredom. Sue had been feeling lonely for two Year's. And she was beginning to feel hopeless. She checked her Facebook and see her friend had quit smoking. She told her friends she had no one to talk to anymore. They told her they didn't know her, they just knew she had to be more open.

The Shot. Dana wanted to play basketball with her sisters. She practiced everyday after school. Her father would go up to the gym to play. When his time came he was all out! Dana had her sisters compete.

Speak. The school band was getting ready for a concert. The first song they played was amazing! They sang about their experiences in life. Everyone cheered! They went on stage and made sure to make everyone feel good.

Art To Food. Sara hated art so she didn't do much. Art was her favorite subject and she had a good idea. She bought a coloring book to draw about it. Sara went to the store and bought the coloring book. Sara drew a mural in her living room.

The Planets. Ava's parents bought a new house. They wanted to make an amazing addition to the house. They looked online for ideas. They decided on a planetarium. They built a beautiful planetarium and it turned out great.
Lost Cause. Tom was going on vacation. He needed a place to stay. His wife had to pick him up. She asked him to leave in the rain. He got on his bike and got back in the car.
Wrong Guilt. Gina was walking with her family. She saw an orange dog. Suddenly, she stepped over a bump. The dog's collar was missing from its coat. Gina panicked and ran away.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim decided to open a new taco truck. He was sad that he couldn't make tacos at home. He started making tacos out of some leftover pizza. He ended up eating two plates of pizza and a plate of chips. Jim got home that night satisfied and happy.

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. Tim had just left school for work. He forgot to tell his mother about his flight. Tim's mother was furious. Her husband called the airline and explained his troubles. Tim had to return home to get a replacement seat.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky was tired of having to do all his homework. So he decided he needed to get a break. Sparky set his alarm clock to get it up in the morning. Sparky got to school right in time. When he got home he was proud that he was done for.

Soaked. Mia was baking a cake. She thought it would be great to bake it from the outside. However, after two hours, she noticed she had a small crack. Her cake was now completely soaked. Mia decided to make an even larger cake by soaking it in a cooler.

Finding God. John lived with a friend and they were playing in a park. They were playing a game that had two levels. John found out it was a man who had gone off into the woods. John was afraid. He asked his dad to get him out but he got scared.
The nerd. Nina was in high school. She was not a smart girl. She liked to make fun of herself. One day she tried to go to the library. She ended up with a very bad grade.
voting. I am disabled. I am working to vote. I decided to do this last week. I picked all of my friends. All were able to cast ballots.

Dad saves Son. Joe was driving his dad's old pickup truck. The truck had a flat tire. He had to take out a flat tire on the road. When he drove his dad's truck away, his dad said he wouldn't stop. Joe couldn't wait for his dad to stop the truck again.

The Pens. Mike and Steve loved getting to draw with their hands. It was not the same as watching videos. But they would always play back at it. So they decided to have a convention to hang out. Mike and Steve ended up finding lots of cool pens to use.

A Helper. Sandy was not always very good at cooking. One day, she made a batch of spaghetti and her brother was upset. He tried to throw it away and eat his meal instead. She then realized that he had used a salt instead of salt! She then realized she should have added more salt to the dish.

Gary. Gary worked as a teacher and made sure to do his best. Gary always kept his head down during class. Gary told his teacher that he did his best. Gary had a lot of fun in the class. Gary was a great teacher.

Pizza. Lucy and her mom had never eaten pizza before. They decided to try one and it was great. But when they got home they had to clean the whole pizza. The pizza was horrible! Lucy decided to never go back to that place again.
Being Greedy. Tom was working at a grocery store. He saw someone urinate in the bathroom. He tried to break the woman's head. The woman said it was gross. Tom kicked her out.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. My first wedding in high school was held at a great hotel. I wanted to be a bridesmaid. I begged my parents and they said no. My mom suggested we try out for the bar. When the wedding went on, I was very nervous and nervous.

Birthday Cake. Tim's birthday was coming up and he was excited. He was excited because it would be his birthday. He woke up late for school and got in his car. Unfortunately he forgot to call his birthday on time and had to call his mom. He couldn't be happier to celebrate his birthday.

Kilt King Ken. Kelley had always loved being a kilt master. She had been practicing all year to her perfection. Today, she decided to practice even harder. Her husband bought her a new kilt and she was confident she could master it. Kelley could never wait for her wedding to take place.

Staples. My mother used to love to make breakfast for me. It was in the mornings and in the evening. Sometimes it was in the afternoon and then in the evening. However, I would always wake up early to do her laundry. I decided to learn to make breakfast and not cook anymore.

Lost Wallet. Sara was a car dealer. Her friend had a flat tire on the way to work. Sara called her friend's insurance company. She called her friend to come check. The insurance company claimed her car for over three thousand dollars.
Audio recording. My girlfriend's mom is getting married today. She is from India. She has been practicing for a while. After the ceremony, her mom came in. She recorded all of her prayers.

Princess. Gina was in the middle of her class reunion. She noticed a girl holding a candy bar. Gina saw that the girl was holding a baby girl. When she looked at her, the baby girl was holding a huge plastic bag. Gina realized she forgot her favorite color in the bag.
Kilt wearing dad. My son loves his dad's Kilt. He loves it even though he is a baby. He is wearing his kilt everyday. I am sure his father is happy. I can't wait for him to get a kilt of his own.

Diet. Jill decided to start exercising more. She started eating more healthy. Jill started to lose a few pounds. She decided to start taking more vitamins. Jill felt better after eating healthier foods.

Lost Shoe. It was a very hot summer day. I drove up to my car and drove a red Ford. I put my purse on the hood and tried to get out of the car. The engine wouldn't start and I crashed into the passenger seat. The light came on and I got the passenger seat replaced.
First date. My wife's boyfriend has a big crush on me. I was not sure what to do. I was so scared, but then we got to talking. We ended up having a great time. I couldn't wait to meet him.
Heart. A friend recommended it when she visited Korea. There, she had a great idea for a trip. She bought a plane ticket to go on a tour. The tour took an hour to complete. The trip was a success!

Going Overboard. I was riding my bike down the sidewalk in an old high school. A huge bear was riding by and I was nervous. The bear had a long nose and the handlebars were not up. I decided to sit down and hold the handlebars on my side. I did very well and I was riding my bike all afternoon.

Long time to dry. Ralph was a hard worker. He worked all day everyday to get things done. When he got home from work, he got a big plate of pasta. Ralph was very tired but he ate it anyways. He really enjoyed his long time at work.

New Wallpaper. It was summer and I was trying to get new wallpaper. My local store had several good ones. I decided on a cheap wallpaper from a great seller. It was so cheap, I couldn't afford to buy it. Now I have the same quality wallpaper in my house.

Jan goes to the dentist. Jan was feeling very nervous after getting a bad toothache. Her dentist told her she had the right tooth. Jan went to the dentist to have it removed. Jan did and the pain was very bad. She thanked the dentist and they went to have a nice day.

Tennis Coming of Age. Tod had always wanted to play tennis. His friends took him to a tennis courts. He played in a tournament. His score dropped to a perfect 10-10 in the last game. Tod's friend never let him play again.

Trumpet. The man wrote the best song to the president. He liked it so much, he did not know how to write it. He decided to give it to his wife. They went to play a song together. Everyone had a great time.
Squirrel. The squirrel looked very large. It was running around on the roof. It began to run around on the roof. Eventually it stopped. It ran through the air.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard grew a beard as a boy. He asked his parents for a haircut. His father told him not to cut his beard. Richard told his friends about his growing beard. Richard's friends complimented his new facial hair.

Silver Coins. Ike had bought some silver coins at the store. He kept trying to get them to be worth a lot. Eventually he lost interest in them. So he decided to pay his neighbor for the coins. Now he is happy to have more money.
Tea Time. I went to the kitchen. I opened the tea bags. I grabbed my cup. I drank all my tea. I had a great time.
The Phone. Mia was shopping for her new phone. She found a beautiful phone case. Mia looked at the screen. Her phone was completely ruined! Mia immediately ran out of the store.
The Dog Park. The dog park opened one summer. One dog got a big hole in it. He had to go to the bathroom every night. He was fed up with the poor fit. He got a big bowl of food and took it home.
Tom's Diner. Tom decided to go to the diner. There was a wait in front of his building. Tom tried to get to his seat. He sat in the back. It was a bit rude for him.
Felix Makes a Friend. Felix was bored one afternoon. He decided to go for a walk in the woods. Felix saw a deer in the distance. He saw a cat. Felix decided to follow the cat home.

Mylar Balloons. Mylar is the youngest of five siblings. His favorite toy is a black balloon. One day Mylar fell in love with balloons. After searching his mom told him they were his favorite. Mylar got a new balloon for his birthday!
Normal. Tom was playing dodgeball. His ball went through the fence. Tom's dad jumped on it. He got all wet and scratched it off. Tom felt really bad and apologized for messing up.

Fred Eats Salad. Fred notices that his salad is full of vegetables. He decides to eat one of his favorite foods and eat it. Fred is happy when he realizes that he is no longer hungry. He eats all of his favorite foods and drinks them all out. He is satisfied with his salad now and is glad to have the food to eat.

Riding Lessons. I decided to get a motorcycle. My parents did not have enough money for it. I bought a ride to an auto show. The instructor taught me all the basics of riding. I learned a lot and I was able to ride the bike I wanted.

The storm. I was very worried as a child about the hurricane. The storms were scary and loud. I always stayed indoors and hid in the back yard. One night I had a nightmare when there was a thunderstorm. It started to rain a lot that night.

The Powder Room. My niece had been taking an English class for a few months. She was taking part in a project for her English class. She came in and sat in a chair with her teacher. He asked her if she had any ideas on how to make powder. She sat down and explained how she made powder with her own hands.

Lost Keys. Lori had a large wallet full of money. When she looked outside she found a lost and found wallet. The wallet was at the bottom of a dumpster. Lori put the wallet in her back pocket. She was glad to be safe.
Condo Values. Rudy's father took him to the beach. Rudy played on the waves. They played in the water. The waves were high and crazy. Rudy went home sad.
Sled. I loved skiing. I had never been before. I went in the mountains to ski with a friend. It was a beautiful day. My friend was very appreciative.
Engagement. Ella wanted to get married. She begged her boyfriend to propose. She got him to it. He got married. Ella said yes to getting married!
Shots. Bill was on vacation in France. He went on a boat and saw a shooting spree. Bill got out to help protect the ship. His boat was hit by a torpedo. It wound up in the back of his hands.

Poisonous Gift. I was browsing a website that sold flowers for a small profit. I found a cute pink gift card for $100 that I wanted. The card was very long and very fancy. The card cost more than I had expected to pay. I couldn't believe I paid for the gift card at all!

Carrots. I had a very good appetite and needed some food. I tried to eat a banana but it was too sweet. I went home to my usual food and went to grab some. The banana was too sweet and I ate it. The next day I realized that the banana was the culprit.

The Excuse. Tom's wife was very upset with him for his work. Her boss called his wife for work every day. Tom wanted to keep the peace at work. When her boss called his wife's work for him to stop, Tom was angry. He got an administrative reprimand and had to pay the full amount.

The Monkey Emoji. Joe's favorite thing to do when he was at the zoo was play. Joe would not stop playing. He would give up all his monkey teeth. Joe got rid of the monkey teeth at the zoo. Joe now plays the monkey emoji.

The Meat. Timothy was a chef at a restaurant. They decided to make grilled meat. He was a little nervous as they were making meat. He went out and made sure to buy good quality beef. Soon he had it all he needed.

Bald. Cara had a cat who seemed very drowsy. One night he went outside and scratched the cat's back. The cat didn't want to be scratched. Cara went to her local animal shelter. The cat was taken to a shelter where a veterinarian was hired.
Hair Gel. My friend Jim made some hair gel last week. He sent it to me for testing. It was not quite perfect. He decided not to. He got his sample in the mail.

The Stolen Shirt. Laurie had gotten a new shirt from the store. It was from a random person. It was an old shirt she wore for her birthday. The shirt had been in her purse all day. She was so upset and swore she wouldn't buy it.

Coney Stew. Cara's sister bought her a recipe for an adorable carrot stew. Cara's sister thought she would love it! Cara decided to surprise her sister with a surprise gift. Cara's sister gave the carrot stew to her friend. Cara was very pleased.
Food order. Sara was hungry one day. Her parents made her a plate. Sara went back to her bed. Her food came out cold. Sara went back to bed early.

A Ride Home. John was bored at home. He decided to take a day trip to the country. He took the long, boring road trip to the back of the car. John was glad he went, as it was a nice place to relax. John left feeling satisfied.

Math Test. Kaya's science test was tomorrow. Her teacher called her up for lunch. Kaya was tired but also nervous. She was supposed to study so she started studying. When she got her grade down, she got a B.
Drowsy. Trevor went to a flea market. He bought a few things. He was very happy with the price. When he returned he noticed a lot of flowers there. Trevor didn't find anything.

Holey skirt. When I was young, I had a very pretty, holey skirt. I wore it every day for my birthday. When I went to prom, my mom was furious with me. So I went to the mall to buy one. She never even noticed I wore it!

Lick My Walls. My house was being destroyed due to Hurricane Florence. I looked in a window and saw that it was covered in graffiti. I decided to get out of the house and call the police. A couple of people came and took my windows. I felt guilty afterwards for not speaking to them sooner.
The Fishing Trip. Sam went fishing with his brother. He decided to try a new fish. The fish was a tad fin. He threw it in the water and looked at it. He felt very pleased.
Snacks. Amy had been working on her homework for a while. It was time to get to bed. Unfortunately, she dropped her homework on the couch. It spilled everywhere. Amy got up to check it out.

The Lost Cellphone. Sam's phone was in the bag when he went to check it out. He looked through the bag for the phone. When he turned around he found it had lost its original ring. It was broken in two pieces and couldn't be retrieved. Sam was upset and felt guilty about missing his phone.

Incommunicado. My mother was sick of seeing me go to school late at night. She was so mad because I never liked the school because of my mother. I decided to take classes in biology. In biology I learned that most people cannot read speech. After class, I learned how to say words from a book.

Paintball Challenge. I decided to take a paintball challenge. I walked the blocks to my yard, hoping to find a spot. I started taking a few swings, and then began to take off the blocks. My ball flew out of the block on the way down. I decided to just walk off of the block as fast as I could.

Beach Day. Sally's parents wanted her to go to the beach on Friday. They put her on the beach the night before. She jumped in and played in the sand. They took pictures of the beach and shared it with her friends. Sally felt very fulfilled!

Pick Me Up. Amy's family had been avoiding her for months. It was time for a big meeting in their town. The girls arrived at their friends house to find out what was going on. Amy was very nervous and she wanted to feel welcome. Luckily, she met the girls and they all met at their house.
Video. Tom was watching a movie with friends. He had an idea to make a video. He mixed together all of the sounds of the movie. Tom's friend laughed at it. He decided to watch the entire movie.
Related After All. The man got up to go to the movies. He walked to the cinema. He got into the seats. He saw the first movie. He immediately bought another one.
Bad date. Tom got a call from his girlfriend. She had just gotten pregnant. Tom tried to take her out on a date. Unfortunately he found out she was pregnant too. They never met again.
Bird Attack. Amy was at the park with her friends. Suddenly an owl approached them. Amy saw it move around the grass. It grabbed her bag from the bushes. Amy dropped her bag in disgust.
The Slide. Tom had never had a ride in his life. It was his dream and was his favorite. He decided to go with his friends. The kids loved it. Tom had a great time at the top of the hill.

The dog. Tom wanted to pet a dog. He didn't have a collar or any special attention. After weeks of training he finally got it to be an adult. Tom was so happy he named it Bear. He finally became his pet.

The Estimate. The couple found a small box of paper for Easter. It contained an estimate of how much their children would need to grow a baby. The couple carefully weighed the children before signing them. They found out that the baby needed to be a year old. They decided to be more careful with the finances of their children.
Mitch's Accident. Mitch was driving to work. He got a flat tire. The car on the road got very slick. Mitch decided to pull over and call for help. Thankfully a tow truck came and helped Mitch out.
Strict Coach. My coach was tough on the ball. It wasn't good enough. Last game he told me to stay patient. I stayed patient. It was an easy game.
Pet Snake. Kate had a pet snake in her backyard. She decided to let it in for a little while. The snake had an aggressive attitude. Kate ran away from the snake. Kate's husband found her.

Picking up Trash. I wanted to pick up my neighbor's trash from the curb. When I got there, it was very hard to find. I went and got a box to look around. I found the right size and was able to pick it up. I bought the box and made a new trash can.

Bad Tip. Norman had gotten his girlfriend a job at a seafood restaurant. He told her that he would tip her more if she went out more often. Norman's girlfriend liked the new restaurant. They both decided to get in touch. They ended up paying Norman more money and he felt good.
Taking a Chance. Sam was going for a drive. He didn't have time to spare. Sam drove too fast. He didn't get in the car. Sam's car got stuck on the road.

Camp. I went to the campsite on a rainy day to play outside. I started to make a fire and got some food. I went to the creek to swim and eat some rocks. I got home and started to look for my phone. I found it in my closet and was very thankful.

Puppy. My wife had just bought her second puppy. The puppy was born prematurely. When my husband bought the puppy, he was very sad. He kept whining and scratching all day long. I felt sad and gave him back to me.

Bathing Suit Failure. Jim went to the dentist for a routine checkup. The dentist said the tooth was broken. He said the tooth would need to be cleaned. Jim decided to go to the dentist. He had a successful surgery to fix the tooth.
Fire. The man put on his shirt and walked to the office. He didn't see anyone. He asked his manager for help. The manager said it was a fire alarm. The man asked if he could wait to see the firemen.

The lockdown scare. The school was in lockdown for a small class. The principal came out and told us about it. We talked to the principal. I was scared to go back in the classroom. I am so happy that we are not in the school anymore.

bored. It had been a really long day. She walked over to her car. When she got to her car, she realized she forgot her cell phone. There was a weird knock at her door. Her phone had been stolen and she was really sad.

Dive Bar. Tanya was on the bench at the park. She went up to the ledge to look in the sand. There were many rocks to get to. Tanya kept falling down. Her feet hurt and she had to give up the diorama.

Terrible Name. Cindy was feeling sad because she couldn't tell who her boyfriend was. Her friend asked her to change his name for her boyfriend. Cindy told him no because she had a bad habit. Her friend told her to be quiet and not talk about it. Cindy was devastated and made an apology.

A Towel. Kelly was going to the grocery store. Her husband forgot his bag! She tried to throw it away, but it ended up flying everywhere. Her husband was sad about the situation. But to her surprise, she got a nice towel.

Dang Cat. Jane's mom was very proud of her cat. She took him to the vet and gave him antibiotics. Jane's mom gave him a pill so he could have the pill. Jane took the pill and was able to get his cat a lot better. Now Jane takes the pill every day to help her cat.

Target. Cindy had made a pizza at home. When she brought it to the table, she noticed she forgot her oven. The pizza still had gas on it. She decided to take it out of the oven instead. After that, Cindy was able to cook all her pizza.
The Eater. A man had a very big problem. He was hungry. He had to make an order at a fast food place. He made a mistake and went to get some food. The food was taken to a customer.
Walk. We went for a walk the other day. We had so much fun that we had to stop and eat lunch. We talked for an hour and ate breakfast. We then went home with coffee. We had a great time.

Performing a concert. Amber was having a concert with her friends. Her favorite band was performing a music video. She got some tickets. Unfortunately the concert was on a Friday night. She regretted not going to see the band.
Janitor Job. Janitor works at a restaurant. A man comes in and asks for a job. Janitor says yes. The man then takes a few minutes to chat with Janitor. Janitor is happy he got a job.
Jack's Dog. Jack was walking his dog when a dog came by. It chased Jack's dog. Jack fell off the leash. Jack's dog died on the spot. Jack was very sad.

Cleaning the yard. My cat is in a litter of 2-3 kittens. One day my son noticed that the kittens were starting to lay eggs. He went outside and grabbed all of the kittens for a walk. We left the litter with the eggs and a towel. We went to clean the house and then went back to the house.

He will pay. My son is 10 Years old and has diabetes. He was born and raised on his own. He didn't realize how expensive it is to start his own business. He asked me for help. I think that I did a good job.
Swing Time. Nancy was playing golf with her brother. She kept on trying to get up. Suddenly, she went over the top. Her hand landed in the hole. Nancy screamed and the ball went into the water.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff went to a local grocery store to buy a food he wanted. After picking up his groceries, he noticed something odd. He found a dead dog under a pile of candy! He was very embarrassed and upset. Jeff bought the dog food but didn't care about the dead dog.

Old diary. Mary woke up and went to look at her old diary. She couldn't find it anywhere, she searched everywhere! Finally she decided to look for it at home. She found it under a cupboard. It was old, but she figured it might not be old.

Christmas lights. Kelly decided to add the Christmas lights to her car. When she drove home she tried to light it up. It wouldn't light up. She went to her car and it wouldn't do. Kelly never used that Christmas lights again.

The Appointment. Jill and her mom were going to a party. They wanted to have a romantic evening. They decided to bring a fake ID to work the night before. They drove to the office and arrived at the office to make the appointment. They were both excited when the receptionist came and told them their fake ID.
Pajamas. Tom was visiting Hawaii. He went to his favorite store. The sales man offered Tom a pair of jeans. Tom obliged. He was disappointed to not find a pair.

The warning. Jasmine had been studying to become a nurse. She was nervous to take the nursing exam. On her last test, her exam results indicated she was sick. Jasmine's teacher decided to give her a B+ for studying. The teacher gave Jasmine a C+ for her test.

The Old Roller Coaster. Ricky loved the new ride at Disney World. It was a roller coaster that could go up in the air. It was very thrilling and the rides were exciting. Ricky was excited that it would be a new ride. Ricky went on the ride to be so proud.
Big Test. My friend is failing the class. His grades are bad. I called his parents to complain. His parents sent him an email. My friend will get to take the test in the morning.

Bonding Time. Cody's wife was a senior at his high school. Cody was nervous about her upcoming divorce. But as he was going through the divorce proceedings, he fell asleep. While awake, he fell asleep again. Cody's wife told him he should have gone to bed earlier.
Adler. Arielle was pregnant. But she could not keep the baby. She had to get rid of the baby every day. She decided to go on birth control. It was a lot less painful and less painful!
The Castle. Anna went to a haunted house. She was excited to see what was inside. She opened the door to look outside. She saw something scary! Anna ran to investigate but couldn't find anything.

New dog. Jill got a new puppy. She wanted him to be friendly and quiet. The puppy was so friendly that Jill decided to train him. The puppy did not like being so loud. The puppy became frustrated and started to cry at school.

No Donuts. Sue went to a fancy Italian restaurant. She didn't order any donuts. After a few minutes, the waitress pulled out a can. It was the perfect amount of donut for dinner. Sue left the restaurant without the donuts.
Buying another car. I had just gotten a new car. I was a little nervous to drive it. I had never driven one before. The car looked very good. I was very excited to be able to take it out.

Wood Wins. My cousin's brother is a professional baseball pitcher. He was the last of the Oakland Athletics to lose his last five games. The Oakland Athletics won their last five games. The Oakland Athletics won five games for the second time this year. The Oakland Athletics had a very special anniversary this year.
Snorkeling. Lily was at the park. There was a storm in the middle of the day. She went out to go snorkeling. She was on her way to a nearby lake. Luckily it was closed.
Randy gets the girl. Randy was about to give up on school. He started crying out in class. The teacher got up and apologized. Randy didn't do anything to appease her. The teacher felt bad for Randy.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve was having trouble finding a job. He wanted to make money but was worried about what he would do with his time. He decided to look at a job fair that would help. He interviewed for many jobs and eventually got a good paying job. He is now able to do his dream job and start over.

Frombo. I walked to the store to buy something for my daughter. My daughter walked past a display of clothing I bought. I asked her to pick up some more. She picked up a few shirts. I was very pleased with the selection she purchased.
Responsibility. Bob was working as a software developer for a company. He felt it was a huge responsibility. But one day a new employee came in. Bob worked very hard. He then got paid.
Major Regret. Bobby went to the mall to get his new shirt. He got his new shirt in the mail. His brother got the same shirt. The brothers were mad. They were both embarrassed.

Deer Huntress. Sam got his son a deer huntress to try out. He took the deer outside to the woods. It was a beautiful sight to see. Sam kept going but never got a chance to see it. He got a call and he decided he had the deer hunt.

Self Esteem. Tim loved to play soccer. His favorite team was the Chicago Fire. One day, Tim played against an enemy team. He was so proud of himself, he yelled at his team. His team won the game, but Tim felt bad that he lost.

Ross The Gamer. Ross had always wanted to be a gamer. His mom told him no because he was too lazy. When Ross got home he couldn't stop playing video games. His mom asked him to stop and play for the first time. Ross felt much better after that.

Cherries Jubilee. Kelly loved to eat cherries. She especially liked the berries that were in the front. She also liked to surprise her crush. At the store they had a promotion. Kelly got a job and took home hundreds of cherries!

Pothole. Tom was at the park with his friends. A car suddenly came by with a huge pothole. They quickly called 911 and it was repaired. Tom's parents helped them to get everything fixed. They had a great day out and Tom was very proud.
New Handle. I needed to clean a bit more of my floor. I used a large piece of paper towel. I put it under a table to dry. Then, I put the handle back on. The paper towel dried the floor quickly.
After School Getaway. Kerry was late for work. She got home. She was upset. She went to the restroom. She realized she forgot her keys.

Candy. Kate decided to eat a cup of candy for breakfast. However, she quickly discovered she'd forgotten to put the candy in the milk. Kate was dismayed. She could not stop thinking about what to eat next. She decided to just eat cereal instead of candy.
Chemistry Lab. Joe decided he wanted to be a chemist. He had a chemistry lab in his house. Joe applied to all of his classes. He got accepted to all of his classes. Joe took his Chemistry Lab test.

Condo. We live in a condo building in Queens. It is an affordable, low maintenance condo. The unit is broken down and there is no electricity in the building. All of the wiring is broken and the power is out. My friend has been using his generator all day.
The Date. Sam was in a bad mood. He hadn't planned on a date. He decided to sneak out on a date with his girlfriend. His girlfriend called and told him to go. Sam agreed.

The Early Baby. Ava was worried she'd be getting a baby girl at home. It seemed like such a big deal. But luckily it was just starting, so she was excited. Soon her mother was pregnant and Ava felt so good about it! When the baby finally came, Ava was so happy!

Volcano. Jim was at the beach one afternoon when it began to erupt. Jim quickly tried to steer his boat out of the way. The entire boat hit the ground. Jim realized that his truck had been hit and had to call for help. Luckily, Jim and the rescue crew were able to pull the truck out of the ocean.

Crushing Like a Frog. Samantha had been having problems with her stomach. The doctor told her to go to the bathroom. She came out of her shower, and found a frog in her bath. She quickly rushed over to the toilet and called a cab. They put Samantha in a hold to stop the bleeding.
Crush. There was a new teacher at the school. He did not know what to do. He tried to teach kids. But he got distracted. When they came to class, he started yelling at them.
Bumping into old friends. Kathy went on a date with her friend Jamie. Jamie went to a restaurant. Kathy got her friend Jamie's attention. Jamie got mad at Kathy. Kathy had to stop Jamie and go home.

The paint compromise. Gina's family was having a party at a friend's house. She wanted to find out why the paint was different. Her mother told her to just paint her room. She was afraid of how it would look on her face. After the party she decided to get paint.

Test. I had a math test in the morning. I went to the library and sat in the back. While looking around I decided to check my notes. It took me an hour to get my test done. The next day I went back home and studied again.

Diet. I went on a diet one year. I tried to be healthy by eating healthy foods. I also tried to eat lots of fruits and vegetables. I also tried to eat lots of healthy things. I ended up gaining weight and my diet was a success.
Annoying toy. Rita was taking a toy. She accidentally dropped it on her face. It hurt a lot. It was hard to get up. She decided to go home and clean it up.

Harper Gets Lost. Harper had gotten lost in the forest. He searched his bag but nothing was there. One day he decided to take a shortcut. He decided he would take the shortcut to his dad's house. He went in his car to drive home.
Cake. There was a cake for her birthday. She was so excited for it. She opened it. It was so good! It was a delicious cake.

Back Breaker. Jim was trying to make his garage a living. His garage was an old junk house. When he went into his house, he found a broken back. Jim called the repair shop. They repaired the broken back.

Dog Bath. The family was going to a dog bath. They needed a dog to keep their home. Their dog wouldn't sit in the chair. They decided to hire a stand to hold a dog. The dog was not able to sit in the chair.
The Soup. The kitchen was getting messy. Lisa decided to make a pot of soup. She cut a slice. The soup was tasty! Lisa felt proud of her soup.
A Movie. Tom was a new kid at school. His parents always watched the same movie. Tom's friends came over to watch the same movie. The boys watched the same movie. It was great fun together!

The Lunchtime Pizza. The family wanted a pizza for lunch. When their mom opened the box, she saw a small box. She asked the toddler for a bite. The toddler smiled and said he had a slice. The family enjoyed their lunch together.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa's teacher assigned a class of students. Lisa wanted to be in the school's marching band. She took classes in the library, but she couldn't do it. She felt pressured to sign up for a band as a hobby. Finally, a band was born and Lisa signed up to go to her favorite band.
Hoop. I was visiting England at the time. I went on a flight to England. It was the biggest flight ever! I took pictures of all of the amazing sights. I think I'll keep taking pictures ever since.
Acid rainy. Susie was on vacation. She got to her hotel. They told her to bring a water bottle. She went into her room to get it. It had been raining all day.

Go to the Store. Tina walked home to find something. She didn't have enough money for a new pair of shoes. She walked to the store and got the necessary shoes. She went home and went into the kitchen to make the new shoes. She looked over the selection of shoes and bought them all.
Crafting a Business. John wanted to be a businessman. He entered a contest. He went on to win the entire box set. He started the business. He successfully raised a lot of money.
Costume Contest. I had a costume contest. I was a clown and my brother was a superhero. I told my friend the winner of the contest. His costume was the one I wanted to win. He accepted.

Silverfish. Ike and his friends went out to get a pet. After all, he had never seen a silverfish in person. He felt silly and afraid at first. Then he took notice of the silverfish. He loved his new pet!

Renee goes Camping. Renee decided to go camping with friends. When she arrived at her new place, she forgot to pack her car keys. Her friends quickly made fun of her and pushed her back in. However, she was scared to go on the trail anyway. Renee decided to go alone instead.

Bus still waiting. Sally was getting a bus. As she got to school she noticed that there was no bus in sight. She knew it was because the bus was already delayed. She ran to the bus stop. Sally was glad to get to school and she had a great time.

Picking Flowers. We all went out for a picnic. The weather was nice and we all looked forward to it. My son picked up a handful of flowers for us. I felt sad that I lost a flower so early. My husband said he would pick up his flowers.

Big Fishing Trip. Milton was camping at the lake. He invited all his friends along with him. They had a big outing. When they finished the outing, they left to go fishing. Everyone had a great time together.

peanut scare. Gina's brother took her to a family pet store. She ordered a new toy. She couldn't figure out what to get. She saw a small boy eating peanut butter and chewing it. Gina couldn't stop laughing.

Winter coat. Liz hated winter coats, so she decided to buy one. She was sad when she had to wear it out of the cold. On the way home she was in a bad mood. She needed a coat, but she didn't have a lot of money. She found one she really liked and was very happy.
Inheritance. The woman died. She didn't receive anything from her relatives. She could not see her husband. She gave him a letter of thanks. She was able to get an inheritance to pay her bills.

Driving at Night. The car was going very fast down the road. She noticed she was losing speed. She tried to pull over to see what was wrong. Suddenly, she saw a large object next to her. She pulled over and was relieved to have a break in her car.

Judy's pastry. Judy loved to make desserts. Judy always wanted to try new flavors. Today she found out what she likes. She got some new pies that were very good. Judy loved her new pie and vowed to try it again soon.

Annual Trip. Susie wanted to go to a national park. Her friend recommended that she go with her. Susie was hesitant but she decided to do it. Susie went to the park. Susie was able to catch a glimpse of nature.
Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy is eating her cookies. She is craving something sweet. Kimmy finds a cup of blueberry-flavored ice cream. Her cookies have a bright blue color. Kimmy loves the taste.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes had a big test on Friday. He did not like the results. Xerxes went to the library to look at the results. The results did not show the test results. Xerxes gave up.

Bhishma. I used to like Bhishma Yoga in Sri Lanka. I went to Bhishma Yoga in South Korea. My first time there I was so impressed with all the traditions. I went with my girlfriend. I felt very satisfied afterwards.

History Test. Sam was studying English in high school. He decided to write a history paper for the history class. He practiced all semester. The week after his paper was due, Sam was given a history test. The results were a resounding yes!

My Cat Fluffy. I decided to visit a cat park in town. I was excited for my visit since I already have my own pet. As I walked to the park, I saw the cat walk past me. I was worried since the cat was acting weird and jumping. I decided to keep the cat out of sight until I could get him outside.

The Joke. I am a big fan of a show called The Joke. It was one of the best comedy shows of all time. I thought I had to give it a shot but it's going to be cancelled. The ratings were so bad I decided to just leave it alone. I had a great time laughing with my family at home.

Doing a good favor. When Mary's teacher gave her an assignment, I wanted to help her do the assignment. I took the assignment as long as she would allow. Mary did the assignment with an attitude. I realized this was a mistake and she didn't do well. She failed the assignment and I went back to teaching.

Gerald. Gerald was an actor who had a few projects under his belt. He got invited to his first big production to perform. He was nervous and nervous when he saw it. Gerald had a great idea and had a great time. Gerald won a record deal on the second act!

The First Grade. When I got my first grade in college, I was nervous. I had never done homework before. I was in a lot of trouble. I was so nervous I threw up on the floor. When I turned in the next test, I was so embarrassed.

Too many shampoos. Susie's boyfriend got her a lot of shampoos. He said that he couldn't afford them. Susie asked him to buy more. She went to the store to buy more. It took him hours and he didn't care.

The flat tire. Maddie and her husband needed a new car. She had bought a flat tire to help them afford it. Maddie wanted the car to be fast enough. Then, she decided to use it to drive away. Then, she was happy to finally have her new car.

Free. I was working late one afternoon, looking for a free snack. I saw an ad for a free day meal service that I really liked. I was so impressed, I took it. After I ate, I ate a dozen slices of bread. I really enjoyed the free meal!

Precious. Kaya was very careful at her beach party. She never had a single drink. At the party everyone said she looked pretty nice. When her friends found out, they all had pink lipstick. Everyone had a fun time at her party.
silence. I got into a fight with the guy in the store. He called me into the store. He wanted me to leave. He asked if I wanted to leave on a weekend. I declined and then gave him a $10 tip.

Locked out. Tom was waiting in line at the local Mexican place. He noticed a guy who seemed friendly. He tried to chat to him but he was locked out. Tom's wife came in and offered to take his place. Tom had to leave.

home ec. I moved to the mountains one summer day. I spent the whole weekend in the forest. The first day was a great adventure. I climbed the tallest tree in the park. I even went down some trees in the night.

A mix up. I came home and found that I was too hot. I decided to go to the store and buy some water. At home, I realized my stove was still running. I decided to check the stove. I learned that my water had run out.
One day of Starvation. The family and the school play Star Wars. We played two games tonight. My brother was the favorite. He was the lead. I really enjoyed playing Star Wars.

Getting Fired. Sam was always a very picky eater. One day a store clerk gave him a tray of food. Sam was so picky, that he would not make a single tip. He didn't know the consequences of not making a single tip. When he did, he was fired for lying about the food.

Bye Dad. Nora didn't know if she should call her dad after work today. She needed to leave at 7 in the morning, but he was there by 8. She was so worried, though, that she stayed until 5 at night. She felt so foolish. Finally, she called her dad and he called her dad.

Sign Me Up. Gina's friend had been looking forward to a party since she was a little girl. She had invited her friends over, and they all said great. At the party, Gina and her friends all got a giant cake. Gina's friend asked her to sign up for a party. She was excited to do it!
The Cow. It was the first time she had ever seen the cow. It was her first time. The cow looked amazing. Her mom was amazed. They got to feed it and she had a happy day.
Sick. Mike was feeling very sick with a fever. He went to his doctor to see what he had. He got a thermometer to see if it was fever. Mike found out that it was cold. Mike then went to the hospital.

From Girlfriend To Landlord. Jane was living with her husband on a vacation. She had bought him a place to live. She moved into the new place. She thought the rent would go up. Jane was sad but she realized this was why she was so upset.

Santa Claus. There was a large crowd at a Christmas parade. My husband and I gathered around him as we started the parade. I was scared to be in the front row when everyone got a treat. We all wore hats for everyone to see. We also got to see Santa Claus outside on stage.

New Car. Tom was driving his new car home from school. It was very flat. Tom asked his friend if they could buy a new car. His friend could not afford the mechanic. Tom was disappointed in himself for not spending his money.

New Boss. I found out that I had been fired for an important work meeting. After talking to my boss, I was offered a job. I thought I was very lucky and went ahead and accepted the job. Alas, I was fired and never to be seen again. Now I am so depressed because I know I should've been happy.

Computer Programming. Jim loved computers. He decided to go to college to get a computer. Jim studied hard for his final exam. He worked hard and got good grades. He decided to pursue computer programming after school.

Bubble Bubble. Bubble Bubble had been my favorite color for years. It was my favorite color as a child. After I graduated college I got a job at a clothing store. We made a special bubble for our home. I was happy because the customer's were happy and they liked it.

Soft Serve. John was invited to a family gathering. John decided to make a soft serve. He placed some in the oven and put the rest in the oven. John put the rest in the oven to cool down. John enjoyed the meal.

grades. Mandy was assigned a standardized grade for a new book. She was excited about the test, because she didn't want to miss a deadline. When the test was due, she studied hard. When the next test was due, she knew she had a great grade. Luckily, the teacher gave her a promotion to the top.

Smart Move. Cindy and her friend were arguing. The girl stole the keys from Cindy's purse. Cindy and her friend argued for awhile. Eventually, Cindy decided to call her friend. Her friend made a move and brought the stolen money.

Son. Tom was a father who was very concerned for his son. Tom wanted his son to be the best possible father. Tom's son's mother was poor and didn't have any money. Tom's son decided he needed to buy a car. He made it on time and Tom saved money on his car.
Grass. Kia was playing in the grass with her friends. Suddenly, they spotted a raccoon. They ran over and caught the raccoon. They fed the raccoon the raccoon's grass. The raccoon was now a pet.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. The lady at the restaurant came over to my table. Her brown and black lace dress was on display. She gave me a friendly tip and a wink to my face. I sat down and looked at her. She smiled, gave me a tip and I enjoyed her lunch.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos notices he has an overgrown garden in his backyard. He plants a few seeds in his garden every weekend. After a couple weeks, Carlos notices that the seeds grow and look good. Carlos decides to buy new seeds in order to improve his garden. Carlos now has a beautiful garden!
New fast food. Tia wanted to get a burger. Her sister told her they could only make two. She was so frustrated. Tia called her sister to ask for help. When she got back to work she was still upset.
Accident. Jenny got to work on her car. It started to rain. Jenny had to stop her car. Her boss noticed. Jenny was fired from her job.

Dream. Tom was sad and couldn't bear his children. They were being born prematurely, and there was too much pressure. The baby came early and he was a little boy. Tom's son was so proud to be a star. Tom vowed to help him have a happy life.

Building a dock. I bought an expensive new dock from Amazon. The dock was fairly small so I didn't need to use any tools. I looked at all the options available and decided on using a broom. I got some scissors and a stick and cut the dock. I was pleased to have my new dock.
Painted Lines. Liza wanted to paint her house. She painted her driveway red. She did this with a broom. She put the broom back. Liza's house looked nice again.

Clothes. Mary had gotten so worn out that she didn't want to change. When she went to go to her first ballet class she was surprised to find some clothes. Mary looked around at the clothes and realized they were very expensive. Mary went to the store and bought new clothes. Mary ended up saving a lot of money and enjoying herself.
Too Tired For Work. John really wanted to quit smoking. He decided to try to quit it. John took a break and got a job. He was tired of working a daily job. John realized he should try to quit.

Signs of Spring. Tim lived in Hawaii. He decided to write a beautiful Christmas message. He took his mother to write his message. His mother's handwriting was beautiful and beautiful. He took the next year home to make a letter to his grandmother.
Losing Weight. Kia was on a diet and felt like she was dying. She decided to stop eating meat. She also stopped exercising. Kia eventually lost 25 pounds. Kia is glad she stopped eating meat.

Comics. Sue wanted to buy some comics. Her local comic shop was selling them for $9 a pop. Sue thought she'd save money by reading the comics. But the price of comics was going up very high. Sue decided to keep her budget close to her budget.

Plums. I once played baseball with some cousins. I was not able to hit a homerun last night. The ball ended up hitting my brother in the chest. My brother is now in the hospital with the injury. I hope he is ok, but I don't want to get him to play.

Funny Face. Kate was so embarrassed she decided to go for a walk. It was the only day of the year that she could walk without any food. Kate decided she would take a walk. As she was walking the leaves came up behind her. It was a cute way to make friends.

Tooth pain. The tooth fairy made a face as she left her bed. It wasn't really what I wanted so she went to the bathroom. When she got back her eyes were swollen and red. She had to stop the tooth fairy from making the face. She looked at the swollen face and told her it was nothing.

Too Tall. Bob needed to be short for school. He went to the gym and was told he was too tall. Bob went back to school and he lost twenty pounds. He was sad that he couldn't grow his arms again. He was glad he finally had the courage to finally grow his arms.
Not on your Side Today. I was about to go to bed. I was watching tv with a friend. I accidentally saw some tv. So I left it in the microwave. My friend later said that I should not watch tv with it.

Zoo trip. Barry was very excited to take his dog for a zoo trip. When they got there, they went to see all of the exhibits. They were very excited to see all of the different animals. Barry's dog was very excited. Barry went to the zoo with his favorite pet.

quick trip to the store. Rhoda was going on a vacation. She bought an all day drive to the store. She checked out all the stores. She bought a bag of cigarettes. Her family was very happy with their purchase.
The Baby Shower. Lily was walking outside. She saw a baby shower coming to an end. She decided to walk towards it. She was afraid. But the shower ended up being a success!

Crust. One day, a man came up to me and he said he would fix my house. My wife was sad, but the man said he would pay. She said I could borrow from her to repair my home! I was a bit worried, but I made a new neighbor to help me! I had a great, warm house in my new house!

Rich Family. A group of rich families were sitting in their living room. They were having a party. The neighbors noticed a group of people with guns in the home. The police caught the group. They were arrested.

Cheating. Gina was on her school's basketball team. Her mom wanted her to play with the other girls on the team. Gina asked her mother if she could try out. She was nervous but accepted. Her mother let her go when the basketball team played!
Birthday. It was a beautiful day outside. The children loved watching their grandkids play. Grandma brought a cupcake. Grandpa threw the cupcake on the ground. Everyone loved the new kid.
Store. I went to the mall. I needed to make some items to go to the register. It took me a long time to get all the items. I got to the register and paid for my items. I am happy I went to the store.

Cavities. My favorite animal is the moose. It makes me very happy. One day we decided to go get a moose enclosure. We got on a truck and drove around. We watched the moose get on the other side of the enclosure.
Walking in the rain. Amy was in the park. She heard a loud thud. She ran inside to see what it was. The front door was flung open and down. It rained so hard she had to use the restroom in the rain.

Best Christmas. Bob decided he wanted to buy a car. He searched all over the internet for the perfect car. Bob was not happy to find one he liked. Bob decided to go to the dealership and buy a car. Bob purchased the car and his parents were very happy.
Karen. Karen lost her job. She was working as a waitress. She was asked to leave her job. She felt that she was owed money. She filed for unemployment to keep her job.

Fued. Lenny was getting tired of having to take the train back to work. The smell of burnt rubber made it impossible to go. He tried to sneak out of the way but his foot slipped off the rubber. When he was finished he went for the ride home. To his horror he found his apartment covered in burnt rubber.

The Tie Choice. Sara's favorite band was called Trippin. They played on a huge stage in front of a small town. Sara was jealous of the talent. She decided to wear a tie to the gig. At the gig, she received a standing ovation.

Cracked Screen. My screen cracked last night. It would not turn on. I tried the internet and it did not work. I tried using the bluetooth cable, but it was broken. I just bought another one for the same reason.

The Chalk. Jude was excited to paint his home. He set up all of his paints on his wall. Then he painted on all of his cabinets. Jude spent the next few days painting all of his cabinets. Jude was very happy to have painted his home!

The School Year. Tim was graduating with his new class. However, he didn't feel ready to study for his test. When his grades got close to their highest he decided to study harder. He spent his entire freshman year in class with a good grade. Tim then received his final A on the test.

The Missing Keys. Allie and her boyfriend were getting married on Friday. They were out on the beach and she was having a blast. They were so excited to see all the beautiful lights in the sky. She forgot her key when she got home. Thankfully she was ok.

The Last Towel. Tim was in his car with his parents. Tim's mother got him a towel. He had put his favorite thing on before they left. Tim thought he smelled bad. But when his mother came home, he smelled bad too.

Circus. We bought a new Ferrari to go to the circus. My wife and I went with a friend to the circus. We got to ride the circus's tigers and elephants. We all enjoyed seeing all the different animals. We were very happy that we went to the circus.

The Music Lover. Sally was at a jazz concert. She was getting ready to give her friend a big kiss. She told him she didn't like the music. Suddenly, his hand slipped and he spilled water on her. Sally was embarrassed.
Old Dog. Jody bought a new puppy. She named him Jack. One day, Jack ran off. He died. Jack had to live in a nursing home for 10 years.

Ice Cream Truck. John wanted to surprise his girlfriend. He drove her to the ice cream truck. The driver was drunk and kept driving. John's girlfriend saw the ice cream truck and stopped him. John was devastated but knew he'd be fine.

Skating Lessons. I went skating with my girlfriend at a local high school. While we were skating, I noticed she was playing a few feet too far. I went over to her and gave her the ice for the first time. She went right away and skated on me right away! I gave her ice for the rest of the way.

Gambler. The family went out to play. It was the day the family was going to go fishing. The family was getting ready and had never been to a river. They saw a boat come by and start to sail the river. They enjoyed the fun and knew they had been lucky.

The Jail. It was time to leave for work. I was too tired to work, so I looked for something to do. After an hour, I saw a sheriff's officer. I asked if I could sit in his car in the park. He gave me a few hours of detention.

Talk. The Smith family was eating together at a local diner. The diner had a large family of kids. Everyone had a favorite dish. The Smiths ordered a hamburger. They ate it all up and returned home happy.

bag. Tod made a bag from the food. He mixed together some of the food to make it extra special. When the bag was put together, the food tasted great! It was so delicious! Tod was really proud of his new bag.

Starbucks Wi-Fi. Ava got a new Starbucks Wi-Fi card to use with her new computer. She installed it into her new computer. The computer was out of date when she logged in. She realized she had to reboot her system. The Wi-Fi network was unavailable for a month.
Doll Show. I decided to throw a doll show. My friend suggested that I try it out. I tried it out. It was pretty hard. So I got a call back in a few hours.

Personal Dignity. My best friend is very generous. He does not make anything but make $10 to go to a concert. One weekend I had a car accident and my friend was injured. I took my daughter to the ER and the ER doctor said my friend was fine. He told us that my friend is always giving money to charity.

Boredom Sets In. Tami and Sara had been working on their relationship for years. They finally decided to just start a relationship. They decided they would only have to work together on their relationship. Finally they were finally satisfied. The two women were happy that they were having a good time.

Push on the Swings. The girl got a push on her neck. She needed to take it to the bar to get ready for a dance. The barista took the girl to the dance. She told the girl she wanted to look good. The girl was excited and went home happy.
Fixing my car. I needed to fix my car. So I went to the car repair shop. I found a few parts and bought them. I then went into the car repair shop. Now my car is fixed and ready to go.
Yancy. Yancy needed money. She went to the bank. She asked her mom. The banker told her the amount. Yancy took out a check to make the amount.

Broken mug. Susie was at work when she accidentally spilled some coffee. And her mug broke! But thankfully the coffee spilled out of the cup holder. Susie knew she had to replace it. And she had to put it back in for good.

Doing laundry. When Mary got home from work, she looked at her clothes. Her laundry was dirty. She decided to change out her clothes. When she was done, she tried to wash her clothes. To her surprise, her laundry was clean.
Car wash. It was time for Car wash. I was going to the mall. I got the car wash but the car did not arrive. I had to go back to work. The mechanic came back and replaced my car.

Henry Bear's Park. I took my daughter on a camping trip. It was summer and we didn't have much money. The campsite was at a park. We sat there and talked about life in the wilderness. We then ate a lot of food and talked about our love life.

Chloe gets a haircut. Chloe is the new girl at school. She is trying on her new dress. While dressing it Chloe finds it very ugly. Chloe goes home and tells her mom. Her mom tells Chloe it looks pretty good.

The Movies. Sam was an avid movie collector. He bought a bunch of films. One year, he got to visit the local Film Museum. Sam saw many interesting and interesting films. Sam loved his visit to the new film museum.

So What's With Coffee Anyway?. Joe and his girlfriend are getting married and moving into a new apartment. They are moving into a fancy new apartment, so Joe wants to try some coffee. Joe takes a long sip of coffee before he drinks too much. Joe becomes very tired and breaks his tongue while drinking coffee. After drinking so much coffee Joe decides he doesn't like coffee anymore.
Faded Jeans. Amy was out for a jog. Suddenly, she tripped. Her pants ripped all over her. She decided to go buy a new pair. Unfortunately they were only for a few minutes.

The Ice Cream. Kelly decided to make ice cream for her boyfriend. Her boyfriend was not happy. He couldn't taste the ice cream and his feelings. Kelly decided to cook it herself. When his boyfriend tried it, Kelly was happy with the result.
Nap Mistake. My niece had to take her temperature. It was 70 degrees on the last day. I told her to go to bed early. She stayed up all night but did not. The next morning I put her in a nap.

Piano. I decided to try the piano one day. I played in a piano class in college. I did not like the sound. I learned how to play the piano on an analog instrument. I decided to buy a mechanical piano.

Lucky Penny. Milton worked as a cashier at an electronics store. When he didn't get paid, he decided to go on a date with a stranger. The stranger brought in an extra coin. Milton couldn't believe it was a penny so he paid with the coin. The man accepted his date, and laughed at Milton.

The Speakers. There is a little white light in the room. I am excited to hear what is coming out of the speakers. I am looking for the speaker. I get up and walk down the hall to the speaker. I have my son get the speaker.

The Garden. The family went to the garden every summer. The kids liked to do different things on the lawn. They tried to use them to make a beautiful meal. They didn't have much use for them at the start of summer. The kids were happy to have a garden that was easy for them to use.

The Friend Fight. It was a cold summer day and Gina was about to go. She had just bought some ice cream and was heading home. Her friend arrived quickly and Gina was waiting on the bus. She didn't realize until the bus went over that it was a bus stop. It was a small but close one that was right around the corner.

Sleepy Cat. Aya went to her mother's house to feed her cat. But when she arrived, she found that the cat was sleeping. The cat began to jump and cry, and fell asleep. Aya told her mother that she had to call 911 and get it. Her mother called 911 and made the cat clean up and put her back in the house.

bottles. We went to the store to buy a bottle of wine. There were many bottles available. We went to pick the one we liked best. After selecting it, I looked at it. When I got home, I realized I didn't have a good bottle.
Bananas. I got some bananas. I decided to eat it. I felt terrible. I got angry and threw them at me. I threw them at the trash can.

Mother's Day Cruise. Tom wanted to take a vacation to New Orleans. Tom decided to take a cruise. Tom arrived at the end of the cruise. Tom felt ready to enjoy the cruise. Tom felt more alive than ever before.

Regrets. Sue was getting ready to go to a party. Her parents had just purchased her a dress. Her mother told her that the dress wasn't made for her. Sue's dad was annoyed, and promised to help. She was glad her father made her happy.
Tight Shoes. Kia had been wearing a pair of loose, untied heels. She wanted to be a lady. She knew that they would hurt badly. She worked out to change them. Soon they were tighter!

Christmas time. The kids all started having fun. They decided to buy a car. They all had a great Christmas. They all looked forward to spending a lot of money. They all spent that money the rest of the year on christmas.
Beads, Beads, Everywhere. Lily and Sally went to the beach. They were bored at first. Then Lily noticed something. Her baby was growing up! Lily was so excited!

Pizza. Gina was getting ready to eat her favorite pizzas. They were delivered out of the warehouse and waiting in line. Gina tried to leave as the line was long. When she tried to drive past she was stopped. Gina had to call the restaurant.

Good Spot. When Kelly's car got a flat tire it hit another car in a parking lot. She had to wait for the tow truck to come and tow her car. At that point the car was totaled. Kelly could only drive home without her favorite spot. Kelly was glad she did not have to wait for it.

Cartoons. Molly wanted to learn to draw but did not have a library. So she looked for a friend that could teach her. After a few weeks of trying, Molly decided to take a class. She learned to draw comic books. She now has her own library.

My New Puppy. I had to give my new puppy to a friend. I wanted the puppy to look a bit like me. I didn't want the puppy to grow to be like me. I tried different ways of letting the puppy feel me. But eventually, I realized I didn't need to have my friends know.
Tennis. Mike decided he needed to practice. His dad gave him lessons. They all loved it. Mike played for hours. It was great to get into the big game.
Movie. The movie was getting late. It was late and people wanted to see it. They came to the movie theater to watch it. The movie came on. They were disappointed.

Grumpy. Maurice had worked at a McDonald's for several Year's. One day, he was asked to take his lunch break. However, the manager told Maurice he would not be able to. Maurice was furious and yelled at the manager. After he left, the manager offered Maurice a second job.

Age Difference. Bob noticed that he was not growing old. He wondered what the difference was. He found out he was three. He decided he would try to start old age with his wife. He gave up and decided to try and just use the age difference.

What to do. Tom decided to do something for the first time. He took out the trash and put it on his patio. Tom went up to the trash can and began digging. His wife told him he was too dirty to do so. Tom left.

Summer Job. Jack loved helping out, but wanted to start a new career. He decided he would find an excellent summer job. He worked with many people, including many young women. Eventually, Jack got a good paying job. Jack became an internet entrepreneur, and is now a successful internet business.
Mints. I wanted to get some mints. I tried to get all the ingredients. After tasting the mix, I took a drink. I tasted the mints. I realized they weren't as good as I thought they were.
Bad ice cream. My husband bought some ice cream for us. He made it a week ago. He gave it a taste test. The drink came out really bad. We ordered more ice cream.
